Title: Abanyarwanda biga mu Ishuri rya Gisirikare mu Bubiligi basabanye na bagenzi babo mu gikorwa ndangamuco
Body:
Abasirikare bâ€™Abanyarwanda biga mu Ishuri rya Gisirikare ryo mu Bubiligi rizwi nka Ã‰cole Royale Militaire bifatanyije na bagenzi babo mu gikorwa ndangamuco.
Abasirikare bâ€™Abanyarwanda biga mu Ishuri rya Gisirikare ryo mu Bubiligi rizwi nka Ã‰cole Royale Militaire bifatanyije na bagenzi babo mu gikorwa ndangamuco.
Iki gikorwa ngarukamwaka cyiswe â€˜SoirÃ©e Internationaleâ€™ cyabereye mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi ku wa 6 Werurwe 2020.
Cyahuje abanyeshuri bâ€™abasirikare baturuka mu bihugu nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Luxembourg, u Budage, u Buholandi, u Bushinwa, u Busuwisi, u Rwanda, Congo Brazzaville, BÃ©nin, Togo, Niger, Mali, Tunizia, Liban, AlgÃ©rie, Burkina Faso na Maroc.
Mu kiganiro na Major Shyaka Jean Paul, Umunyarwanda uri gukurikirana amasomo ya gisirikare mu Bubiligi yabwiye IGIHE ko iki gikorwa gihuza abanyeshuri bâ€™abasirikare biga muri Ã‰cole Royale Militaire berekana umuco wâ€™ibihugu baturukamo.
Mu byo bibandaho harimo ibijyanye nâ€™imirire iranga abenegihugu runaka nâ€™imbyino mu rwego rwo gusabana nâ€™inshuti nâ€™abavandimwe baba batumiwe.
Yagize ati â€˜â€˜Twishimiye kubona Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo benshi batuye hano mu Bubiligi bitabiriye ubutumire bwacu, kugira ngo u Rwanda ruhagararirwe neza muri iki gikorwa.â€™â€™
Ã‰cole Royale Militaire ni Kaminuza ya Gisirikare iherereye mu Bubiligi. Niyo irera abofisiye bâ€™Ababiligi mu byiciro birimo icyâ€™Ingabo zirwanira ku butaka, izo mu kirere, izo mu mazi nâ€™izikora mu bijyanye no gutanga ubuvuzi.
Iherereye mu nyubako yahanzwe nâ€™abahanga mu bugeni bwo guhanga inyubako Henri Maquet na Henri Van Dievoet. Itanga amasomo mu Gifaransa, Icyongereza nâ€™Ikidage.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa basabye Sena kwitandukanya nâ€™ibiganiro byâ€™abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Ihuriro ryâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (CommunautÃ© Rwandaise de France, CRF), ndetse na Ibuka France, basabye Sena yâ€™iki gihugu kwitandukanya nâ€™inama igamije guha urubuga abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ihuriro ryâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (CommunautÃ© Rwandaise de France, CRF), ndetse na Ibuka France, basabye Sena yâ€™iki gihugu kwitandukanya nâ€™inama igamije guha urubuga abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ubusabe bwâ€™aba banyarwanda bwo kwamagana iyi nama, bugaragariza Perezida wa Sena yâ€™u Bufaransa, GÃ©rard Larcher nâ€™abasenateri muri rusange, ko batewe impungenge nâ€™inama iteganyijwe ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020 izabera mu ngoro ya Sena, ikaba iziga kuri bimwe mu bibazo biri mu karere kâ€™ibiyaga bigari.
Nkâ€™uko bigaragara kuri gahunda yâ€™ibizakorwa, iyi nama biteganyijwe ko izaha rugari abenshi mu bafite ubushakashatsi bwo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Bibutsa ko ibyo bikorwa bihanwa nâ€™ingingo ya 24 yâ€™itegeko ryo ku wa 29 Nyakanga 1881, ku birebana nâ€™ubwisanzure bwâ€™itangazamakuru.
Bati â€œNtabwo bikwiye ku rwego rwa leta rwubashywe nka sena byongeye rugomba kuba icyitegererezo mu kubahiriza itegeko, ko rwaba urubuga rwo gukwirakwiza ibiganiro bigamije konona amategeko yâ€™ikindi gihugu ndetse no gutesha agaciro kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, igihugu nkâ€™u Bufaransa kirimo kwitegura kwibuka mu mezi abiri ari imbere nkâ€™uko biri mu iteka nÂ° 2019-435 ryo kuwa 13 Gicurasi 2019â€.
Bukomeza bugira buti â€œTurabasaba Nyakubahwa Perezida kugira icyo mukora mu kwirinda ko urwego rwanyu rwakwifatanya nâ€™ibikorwa nka biriya, turasaba kandi abasenateri kwitandukanya mu buryo bweruye na bariya bantu nâ€™ubushakashatsi bwaboâ€.
Ubu busabe bumaze gusinywa nâ€™abagera ku 2,693 mu 5000 bakenewe, burakurikira abantu batandukanye ku mbuga nkorambaga, bakomeje kwamagana iyi nama yateguwe na Sena yâ€™u Bufaransa.
Igikomeje kubabaza benshi ni uburyo iyi nama izitabirwa nâ€™abantu bazwiho mu guhakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi barimo Charles Onana, Judi Rever na Hubert Vedrine, Vincent HervouÃ«t.
Vedrine yahoze ari umunyamabanga mukuru wa Perezida Mitterand mu Bufaransa, Leta izwiho kuba yarashyigikiye abakoze Jenoside mu Rwanda. Judi Rever ni umunyamakuru wo muri Canada akaba nâ€™umwanditsi wâ€™ibitabo bipfobya bikanahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kimwe na Charles Onana, naho Vincent Hervouet ni umunyamakuru wa Televiziyo yâ€™Abafaransa LCI yâ€™Ishyirahamwe TF1 ukunze guha rugari abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

Title: Abanyamuryango ba FPR Inkotanyi mu Bwongereza bakoze umwiherero baganira ku iterambere ryâ€™u Rwanda
Body:
Abanyamuryango bâ€™Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi baba mu Bwongereza bagize umwiherero wahuje abayobozi bakuru nâ€™abategurwa kujya mu buyobozi, wagarutse ku mateka yâ€™uwo muryango, amateka yâ€™Urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, ndi Umunyarwanda, icyerekezo 2050 nâ€™ibindi.
Abanyamuryango bâ€™Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi baba mu Bwongereza bagize umwiherero wahuje abayobozi bakuru nâ€™abategurwa kujya mu buyobozi, wagarutse ku mateka yâ€™uwo muryango, amateka yâ€™Urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, ndi Umunyarwanda, icyerekezo 2050 nâ€™ibindi.
Uwo mwiherero wabaye tariki 24 Gashyantare 2020 wahuje abayobozi bâ€™Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi baba mu Bwongereza nâ€™abagaragara ko bazaba abayobozi mu gihe kiri imbere bose hamwe bagera kuri 45. Intego nyamukuru yari iyo kagaragaza aho uwo muryango wavuye, aho ugeze nâ€™aho ugana ndetse no kuganira ku iterambere ryâ€™igihugu muri rusange.
Ni umwiherero watangiwemo ibiganiro bitandukanye bifasha abasanzwe mu buyobozi nâ€™abategurwa kurushaho kumenya Ibikorwa byâ€™Umuryango FPR Ikontanyi; aho wavuye, aho ugeze nâ€™aho wifuza kugana mu cyerekezo cyâ€™igihugu binagaruka ku mateka nâ€™iterambere ryâ€™u Rwanda muri rusange.
Ibiganiro byarimo amateka yâ€™u Rwanda guhera mu gihe cyâ€™abami, icyâ€™umwaduko wâ€™abazungu, icya Repubulika na Politiki rugenderaho muri iki gihe.
Umuyobozi wa FPR Inkotanyi mu Bwongereza, Egide Ruhashya yagarutse kuri ayo mateka ndetse yerekena nâ€™uburyo igihugu kiyobowe, ashimangira ko buha buri munyarwanda kwishimira iterambere ryâ€™igihugu cye.
Muri ibyo biganiro bigaruka ku mibereho yose yâ€™abanyarwanda, harimo icyatanzwe na Rev. Dr Malachie Munyaneza cyagarutse ku ruhare rwâ€™iyobokamana mu mateka yâ€™abanyarwanda. Yavuze ko amadini afite uruhare rukomeye mu mibereho yâ€™abanyarwanda kuva mu gihe cyâ€™abami kugeza muri iki gihe.
Muri Rwanda Day iheruka, Banki Nkuru yâ€™u Rwanda yerekanye ko kuva mu 2010 amafaranga Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bohereza imbere mu gihugu yiyongereye ku gipimo cya 158%. Yavuye kuri miliyoni 98.2 mu 2010 agera kuri miliyoni 253 zâ€™amadorali ya Amerika mu 2018 ni asaga miliyari 250 zâ€™amanyarwanda.
Muri uwo mwiherero naho uruhare rwâ€™abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga mu kubaka igihugu rwagarutsweho ndetse abawuteraniyemo bibutswa ko bigomba kujyana, no kubumbatira indangagaciro nâ€™umuco byâ€™abanyarwanda.
Umuyobozi wungirije wâ€™Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi mu Bwongereza, Tony Kanani abihuje nâ€™ubuzima abanyarwanda babayeho mu Bwongereza, yashimangiye ko abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga badakwiye gusigara inyuma mu kubaka igihugu.
Ubu u Rwanda ruri mu cyerekezo 2050 kigizwe nâ€™imyaka 30 igabanyije mu bice bibiri; birimo ikigizwe nâ€™imyaka 15 ya mbere kugera mu 2035 nâ€™imyaka 15 izakurikira. Muri icyo cyerekezo u Rwanda rufite intego yo kugira ubukungu buciriritse mu 2035 naho mu 2050 umunyarwanda yazaba yinjiza $12 476 ku mwaka, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 10 Frw ku mwaka.
Umwiherero wâ€™abo banyamuryango ba FPR baba mu Bwongereza watinze kuri iki cyerekezo, barushaho gusobanukira aho igihugu cyifuza kuganisha abanyawanda nâ€™icyo kibategerejeho kugira ngo ibyo byose bizabashe kugerwaho.
Icyo gikorwa ni ubwa mbere gikozwe mu Bwongereza abacyitabiriye bavuze ko babashije kumenya amateka ya FPR Inkotanyi nâ€™aho ishaka kuganisha igihugu.

Title: Ibyishimo byâ€™abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc mu kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wâ€™ururimi kavukire (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc bagaragaje ibyiza byâ€™umuco nyarwanda mu birori byo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wâ€™ururimi kavukire batumiwemo na Minisiteri yâ€™umuco muri icyo gihugu, ku ruhande rwabo, ubabera nâ€™umunsi wo gusabana mu Kinyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc bagaragaje ibyiza byâ€™umuco nyarwanda mu birori byo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wâ€™ururimi kavukire batumiwemo na Minisiteri yâ€™umuco muri icyo gihugu, ku ruhande rwabo, ubabera nâ€™umunsi wo gusabana mu Kinyarwanda.
Ni umunsi wabereye mu murwa mukuru wa Maroc i Rabat, wizihizwa mu mbyino no kwerekana umuco bya buri gihugu cyari cyatumiwe.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc barimo abanyeshuri, abahakora imirimo itandukanye nâ€™abahatuye bitabiriye uwo munsi.
Amashuri menshi muri icyo gihugu akoresha Igifaransa, byumvikana ko uretse abanyarwanda bashobora kuba bigana bakoresha Ikinyarwanda nabwo gake, naho ubundi kumva ikinyarwanda bidakunze kubaho.
Byari ibyishimo abanyarwanda batera urwenya mu Kinyarwanda cyabo banacinya akadiho berekana ibyiza byâ€™umuco wâ€™u Rwanda muri ibyo birori.
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Muhire Derrick wiga imibare na mudasobwa muri Kaminuza ya Ibn Tofail KÃ©nitra, iherereye mu mujyi wa KÃ©nitra aho muri Maroc, akaba ahagarariye abanyeshuri bo mu mijyi ya Rabat, Sale na KÃ©nitra, yavuze ko wababereye umunsi wo gusabana no kwisanzura mu rurimi kavukire rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda.
Muhire Derrick yagize, ati â€œTuba dusanzwe tuvuga tunakoresha Igifaransa kuko ari cyo twigamo rero nkâ€™uyu munsi wâ€™ururimi gakondo nkatwe nkâ€™abanywarwanda ni umunsi twereka amahanga umuco wacu ndetse tugahura tukavugana rwa rurimi rwâ€™iwacu twisanzuye.â€
Itorero ryâ€™abanyarwanda muri Maroc ryitwa Icyeza cyâ€™Indatwa niryo ryaserutse muri ibyo birori. Ndayambaje Albert uhagarariye abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc yabwiye IGIHE ko muri icyo gihugu hari abanyarwanda 90; barimo abanyeshuri, abakozi, imiryango ihatuye, nâ€™abimenyereza akazi mu nzego zitandukanye. Bakaba ari bamwe mu bitabiriye ibyo birori.

Title: U Rwanda rwizeye kungukira mu Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo muri Israel (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rubinyujije mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) nâ€™ibindi bitanga serivisi zâ€™ubukerarugendo ruhagarariwe mu Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo rizwi nka International Mediterranean Tourism Market (IMTM 2020) riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Tel Aviv muri Israel.
U Rwanda rubinyujije mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) nâ€™ibindi bitanga serivisi zâ€™ubukerarugendo ruhagarariwe mu Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo rizwi nka International Mediterranean Tourism Market (IMTM 2020) riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Tel Aviv muri Israel.
IMTM ni imurikagurisha ryagutse, rimeze nkâ€™igikorwa gihuza abashoramari bakomeye mu byâ€™ubukerarugendo mu bihugu byo mu Burasirazuba bwâ€™Inyanja ya MÃ©diterranÃ©e. Ryatangiye kuri uyu wa 11 Gashyantare mu gihe rizasozwa ku wa 12 Gashyantare 2020.
U Rwanda ruhagarariwe na RDB nâ€™ibigo bitanu birimo Sosiyete yâ€™Ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir, Palast Tours &Travel, Albertine Tours, Beautiful Rwanda na Rwanda Eco Company.
Iri murikagurisha ryitabiriwe nâ€™abantu batandukanye barimo na Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Israel, Joseph Rutabana.
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa Kane tariki ya 13, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda bazaganira nâ€™abikorera nâ€™abandika inkuru zâ€™ubukerarugendo baba muri IsraÃ«l.
Abanya-Israel bakora ingendo nibura 4,000,000 buri mwaka. Ishoramari nâ€™inyungu ishingiye ku bukerarugendo hagati ya Israel nâ€™u Rwanda yavuye kuri 3.6% mu 2015 igera kuri 25.9% mu 2019.
Ni imibare yitezweho kuzamuka cyane ko kuva ku wa 25 Kamena 2019 indege ya Sosiyete Nyarwanda ikora ingendo zo mu kirere, RwandAir, yageze i Tel Aviv muri Israel.
RwandAir yavuze ko izi ngendo nshya zerekeza muri Israel zizongera imbaraga mu mubano mwiza nâ€™ubuhahirane bisanzwe biri hagati yâ€™u Rwanda na Israel cyane mu rwego rwâ€™ubucuruzi.
U Rwanda rwishimiwe cyane binyuze ku hanyu hamurikiwe ibicuruzwa na serivisi zarwo byâ€™umwihariko ikawa iva mu rwâ€™imisozi 1000 yishimiwe cyane. Nirwo rwo gihugu cyonyine cyaserukanye ababyinnyi (Itorero Urukerereza) muri iri murikagurisha byanatumye abantu bagana aho ryamurikiye ibikorwa byarwo, barizihirwa.
IMTM iri mu bikorwa bihuza abantu benshi muri Israel kuko mu mwaka wa 2019 yasuwe nâ€™abasaga 26800. Iri murikagurisha rimaze imyaka 26 riba buri mwaka, ryitabirwa nâ€™ibihugu birenze 57; riberamo ibiganiro mbwirwaruhame bitandukanye bigera kuri 40, abaminisitiri bâ€™ubukerarugendo 14 bamaze kuryitabira.
Umwaka ushize abamuritse ibikorwa byâ€™ubukerarugendo bari bafite stands 265, amahoteli 57, abatanga serivisi zâ€™ubukerarugendo 126, abayobora nâ€™abafasha mu ngendo 29, ibigo byâ€™abatwara abantu nâ€™ibintu mu nzira yâ€™ikirere 19, abatwara abantu nâ€™ibintu mu nzira yâ€™ubutaka 18.
Ibikorwa byâ€™imurikagurisha rimenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda byiyongera ku bindi bikomeye birimo amasezerano rwasinye na Arsenal FC yo mu Bwongereza, Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa na Film mbarankuru ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.
RDB igaragaza ko mu 2017 u Rwanda rwinjije miliyoni $438 zivuye mu bukerarugendo, intego ya Guverinoma ni uko mu 2024 inyungu ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bubiligi bashyiriweho uburyo bwo kunganira Mutuelle de SantÃ©
Body:
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Bubiligi yashyiriyeho abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo baba muri iki gihugu na Luxembourg, uburyo bwo kunganira gahunda ya leta yâ€™ubwisungane mu kwivuza â€˜Mutuelle de SantÃ©â€™.
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Bubiligi yashyiriyeho abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo baba muri iki gihugu na Luxembourg, uburyo bwo kunganira gahunda ya leta yâ€™ubwisungane mu kwivuza â€˜Mutuelle de SantÃ©â€™.
Gushyiraho konti muri banki izajya ishyirwaho inkunga yo kunganira Mituweli, bikozwe nyuma yâ€™icyifuzo cyatangiwe mu nama yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Umushyikirano ya 17 yabaye kuwa 19-20 Ukuboza 2019.
Ku munsi wa kabiri wâ€™iyi nama, Safari Christine wo mu Ntara ya Diaspora yâ€™u Buholandi, yagaragaje ko hari uburyo abanyarwanda baba muri Diaspora, bashyigikira gahunda za leta ariko bigakorwa mu kajagari cyangwa mu buryo bwo gutatanya ingufu.
Yagize ati â€œHari ukuntu dufasha muri Mituelle de santÃ©, tukabikora mu matsinda nkabona bisa nkâ€™aho birimo akavuyo kandi biba birimo amafaranga menshi, nkaba nibaza niba twakorerwa ikigega kikaba ikigega cya Diaspora noneho ayo mafaranga ya za mituweli dukura hirya no hino tukayashyira muri icyo kigega kigafasha abantu batishoboyeâ€.
Iki cyifuzo cye cyafashweho umwanzuro muri iyi nama kuko uwa munani mu yayifatiwemo uvuga ku â€˜Gushyiraho uburyo bwo gufasha Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga kunganira ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda za Leta zinyuranye harimo Ubwisungane mu Kwivuza (Mutuelle de SantÃ©) no gukoresha ubumenyi bafite mu ngeri zitandukanye iyo baje mu kiruhuko mu Rwandaâ€™.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bubiligi, Amandin Rugira rivuga ko hashyizweho konti iri mu izina rya RSSB-CBHI, nimero yayo ni 440207884 iri muri Banki ya KCB Bank.
Iri tangazo rivuga ko â€œAmbasade yâ€™u Rwanda i Bruxelles, irahamagarira abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda batuye mu Bubiligi na Luxembourg, kwitabira iki gikorwa cyâ€™ingenzi ku bavandimwe bacu babikeneyeâ€.
Guhera muri uyu mwaka wâ€™ingengo yâ€™imari Guverinoma yongereye amafaranga ishyira mu bwisungane mu kwivuza â€˜Mutuelle de santÃ©â€™.
Ikigo cyâ€™Ubwiteganyirize mu Rwanda (Rwanda Social Security Board-RSSB) kivuga ko iyi nyongera ingana na miliyari 10 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda, izafasha muri gahunda yo kugeza ubuvuzi kuri bose.
Imibare ya RSSB igaragaza ko ingano yâ€™imisanzu yâ€™abanyamuryango ba mutuelle de santÃ© harimo nayo leta yabageneraga ari milyari 32.8, mu gihe ayo bakoresha angana na miliyari 47.4 ibintu byatumaga bagira igihombo cya miliyari 14.6 buri mwaka.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba mu Burusiya bizihije umunsi wâ€™intwari, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Burusiya biganjemo abatuye mu mujyi wa Moscow nâ€™inshuti zabo, ku cyicaro cyâ€™Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 1 Gashyantare 2020 bizihije umunsi wâ€™Intwari
Abanyarwanda baba mu Burusiya biganjemo abatuye mu mujyi wa Moscow nâ€™inshuti zabo, ku cyicaro cyâ€™Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 1 Gashyantare 2020 bizihije umunsi wâ€™Intwari
Ni umuhango wabaye mu gihe Abanyarwanda hirya no hino bifatanyaga mu kwibuka Intwari zâ€™igihugu, no gukomeza kuzirikana akamaro kâ€™ubutwari mu iterambere ryâ€™igihugu.
Colonel Gashaija Emmanuel, wari uhagarariye Ambasaderi muri uyu muhango, yashimiye abitabiriye umunsi wâ€™Intwari, anabashimira uburyo bitabira ibikorwa byose byâ€™Ambasade.
Yatanze ikiganiro cyibanze ahanini ku mpamvu uwo munsi ngarukamwaka wizihizwa, ku butwari mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, ku ndangagaciro yâ€™ubutwari, ku cyo intwari ari cyo, ku ntwari zâ€™u Rwanda no ku nsanganyamatsiko yâ€™uyu mwaka igira iti â€œUbutwari mu Banyarwanda, agaciro kacuâ€.
Yagize ati â€œLeta yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe icyemezo cyo gushyiraho uyu munsi ngarukamwaka wâ€™Intwari kuko ari inshingano zâ€™igihugu kuzirikana Intwari zacyo kandi ni umuco mwiza wo gushima Abanyarwanda nâ€™abanyamahanga bagaragaje ibikorwa nâ€™ibitekerezo bifitiye u Rwanda akamaro.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œ Kuzirikana Intwari zâ€™Igihugu kandi bituma Abanyarwanda bakomeza umuco wo gukunda Igihugu, kunga ubumwe, kubana neza no guharanira icyateza u Rwanda imbere. Kuzirikana Intwari zâ€™u Rwanda ni uburyo kandi bwo gushimangira ibyiza byagezweho mu mibereho nâ€™imibanire myiza byâ€™Abanyarwanda, hashyirwa imbere ibyubaka umuryango wacu nkâ€™Abenegihugu, abanyafurika nâ€™abatuye isi muri rusange.â€
Col Gashaija umunsi wâ€™intwari ari nâ€™umwanya wo kuzirikana no gushimira abana bâ€™u Rwanda bitanze bakabohora u Rwanda ingoyi yâ€™ubutegetsi bwâ€™igitugu bakanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, barangajwe imbere na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Hazirikanywe kandi abagize ibindi bikorwa byâ€™ubutwari nkâ€™abakomeye ku bunyarwanda nâ€™abarwanyiie akarengane ako ari ko kose.
Colonel Gashaija Emmanuel kandi yagarutse ku nsanganyamatsiko yâ€™uyu mwaka, avuga ko ari umukoro ku rubyiruko wo gukomeza gusigasira ibyagezweho.
Ati â€œNi insanganyamatsiko yatoranyijwe kugira ngo ikangurire Abanyarwanda cyane cyane urubyiruko guharanira ubutwari mu byo bakora byose hagamijwe kwihesha agaciro no kwigira, bijyana no guharanira iterambere ryâ€™abenegihugu bose, bikanajyana no kurangwa nâ€™umuco wo gukora cyane, guhanga udushya no gukunda ibyâ€™iwacu.â€
Umunsi wâ€™Intwari wizihijwe kuri uyu wa 1 Gashyantare wabanjirijwe nâ€™icyumweru cyâ€™Ubutwari cyatangiye ku wa 24 Mutarama 2020 gisozwa ku wa 31 Mutarama.
Cyaranzwe nâ€™imikino itandukanye nâ€™ibiganiro byabereye mu bigo bya Leta, ibyigenga no muri za kaminuza nâ€™amashuri makuru no hirya no hino ku Isi ahari abanyarwanda.
Intwari zâ€™u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe nâ€™Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka FÃ©licitÃ© nâ€™Abanyeshuri bâ€™Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu nâ€™Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari nâ€™imwe irashyirwamo.

Title: Paris: Agatsiko kâ€™Abanye-Congo kashatse kwigaragambya kuri Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda bamwe batabwa muri yombi
Body:
Abanye-Congo batuye mu Bufaransa bagerageje kwigaragambiriza hafi ya Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Mujyi wa Paris, inzego zâ€™umutekano zita muri yombi bamwe mu bashatse kuyisagarira.
Abanye-Congo batuye mu Bufaransa bagerageje kwigaragambiriza hafi ya Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Mujyi wa Paris, inzego zâ€™umutekano zita muri yombi bamwe mu bashatse kuyisagarira.
Iyi myigaragambyo yabereye i Paris kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, tariki ya 18 Mutarama 2020. Yakozwe nâ€™Abanye-Congo 30, bahagurutse saa kumi bagera aho bemerewe gukorera imyigaragambyo saa kumi nâ€™imwe na 45.
Yakomotse ku mvugo yo kwigabanya Uburasirazuba bwa RDC cyangwa â€œbalkanizationâ€, iheruka kugarukwaho nâ€™abarimo Arikiyepiskopi wa Kinshasa, Cardinal Fridolin Ambongo na Adolphe Muzito wabaye Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe wa RDC, ubu ni umuvugizi wâ€™Ihuriro Lamuka.
Cardinal Ambongo mu mpera zâ€™ukwezi gushize yavuze ko ubuyobozi bwa Congo bukwiye kumvisha ibihugu bituranye byâ€™u Rwanda, u Burundi na Uganda, guhagarika kwinjiza abaturage babyo ku butaka bwâ€™Uburasirazuba bwa RDC, ko hari umugambi wo kwigabanya igice cyâ€™Uburasirazuba bwa Congo.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, FranÃ§ois-Xavier Ngarambe, yabwiye IGIHE ko imyigaragambyo yabaye ariko yakorewe kure yâ€™inyubako ya Ambasade.
Yakozwe nâ€™Abanye-Congo ba APARECO [Ihuriro ryâ€™abaharanira impinduka muri Congo- Alliance des Patriotes pour la Refondation du Congo] bari barasabye banahabwa uruhushya rwo gukora imyigaragambyo bavuga ko bamagana Leta yâ€™u Rwanda.
Urwo rugendo rwabo rwagombaga kuva mu gace ka Paris Nord [Gare du Nord] saa munani rwerekeza kuri Parc Monceau aho bagombaga guhagarara, bagakora ibikorwa byabo.
Ambasaderi Ngarambe yavuze ko ari â€œahantu nko muri metero 700 aho batanashobora kurebesha ambasade amaso uretse no kuyegeraâ€. Kuri ambasade no ku mihanda iganayo hari harinzwe.
Abigaragambya bavugaga ko bamagana ibyo bo bita â€˜iyomekwa ryâ€™intara zimwe za Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ku Rwanda cyangwa â€˜balkanisation.â€™ Bari bitwaje amabendera ya ZaÃ¯re yaje guhinduka RDC.
Amashusho yakwirakwijwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga agaragaza abo Banye-Congo bari kwigaragambya. Yerekana aho bamwe bashatse kurenga aho bemerewe bagana kuri Ambasade, Polisi irabatangira. Abaharenze bose batawe muri yombi.
Amb. Ngarambe yavuze ko iyo myigaragambyo yamaze iminota igera kuri 15, ndetse nta na kimwe yahungabanyije.
Mu Ukuboza 2019, Adolphe Muzito wabaye Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe wa RDC, ubu ni Umuvugizi wâ€™Ihuriro ritavuga rumwe na Leta rya Lamuka yabwiye abanyamakuru ko kugira ngo igihugu cye gitekane, gikwiye gutera u Rwanda ndetse kikarwiyomekaho ngo kirangize ikibazo kimaze imyaka isaga 20 mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC.
Ati â€œNtabwo dushobora kubona amahoro tudateye u Rwanda, byaba ngombwa tukarufata.â€
Muzito yabaye Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe wa RDC hagati ya 2008 na 2012, yagiye ku buyobozi bwa Lamuka ku wa 2 Ukuboza 2019 asimbuye Jean-Pierre Bemba.
Imvugo ye yakongeje uburakari mu Banye-Congo, ndetse bayamaganiye kure! Ku ikubitiro abayobozi ba Lamuka barimo Jean Pierre Bemba na MoÃ¯se Katumbi, banenze ijambo rye, bamusaba kwisubiraho.
Minisitiri wâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga wâ€™u Rwanda, Dr Biruta Vincent, aheruka kubwira itangazamakuru ko hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bakeka ko bazamamara nibavuga nabi u Rwanda.
Ati â€œNi ibintu bibabaje, wakwiteguye ko ibyo bavuga biba bifite icyo bafite bashingiraho gifatika ariko nta gihari. Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere bene ibi bibazo bibaho, hashize igihe hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bumva ko kugira ngo abaturage babo babemere ari uko bavuga nabi u Rwanda.â€

Title: Me. Flamme wunganiraga Fabien Neretse yatsimbaraye ku ipfobya rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019, nibwo Urukiko rwa rubanda rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019, nibwo Urukiko rwa rubanda rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Neretse yari akurikiranyweho ibikorwa byâ€™ubwicanyi mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi i Nyamirambo no mu Mataba mu yahoze ari Komini Ndusu mu Ruhengeri hagati ya 6 Mata 1994 na 14 Nyakanga 1994.
Yarezwe gushishikariza abasirikari kwica Abatutsi, aho 13 biciwe i Nyamirambo. Yanashinze Umutwe wâ€™Interahamwe mu Mataba, awuha intwaro mbere yo kugaba ibitero ku Batutsi, ariko anabaha ibihembo byâ€™amafaranga.
Icyemezo cyâ€™Urukiko rwa Bruxelles cyo gukatira Neretse imyaka 25 gifite umwihariko kuko ni ubwa mbere u Bubiligi bwakurikiranye bukanahana icyaha cya Jenoside hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana. Cyanyuze uruhande rwâ€™abarega.
Umunyamategeko ubahagarariye, Me. Karongozi AndrÃ© Martin, yabwiye IGIHE ko nubwo rwitabiriwe nâ€™abagenzwa nâ€™impamvu zitandukanye, rwagenze neza.
Ati â€œKu bwacu urubanza rwagenze uko rwagombaga kugenda, nubwo byari bikomeye harimo ingorane nyinshi zuko hari abanyabuhamya baguriwe, zâ€™uko hari abaza guhimba ko mu Rwanda abantu batisanzura. Ibyo byose ikintu nishimiye ku giti cyanjye, ni ukubona ko Abanyarwanda bavuze badategwa abenshi berekanye ibyaha Neretse yakoze ari nabyo urukiko rwahereyeho. Harimo nâ€™abaje kwigamba, harimo nâ€™abaje guhakana Jenoside.â€
Urubanza rwa Neretse rwaranzwe nâ€™amagambo ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yavuzwe nâ€™umwunganira, Me Jean Flamme. Imvugo ze zatumye abari mu rubanza harimo nâ€™abacamanza bagaragaza ko yarengereye mu kuvuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri.
Nyuma yâ€™umwanzuro wâ€™urubanza yakomeje kwinangira ku bitekerezo bye bipfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Me Flamme waganiriye na IGIHE asa nâ€™uwabihiwe yavuze ko atishimye umwanzuro wâ€™urukiko ku mukiliya we.
Ati â€œUru rubanza rwatangiye nabi cyane, banze abatangabuhamya, rwatangiye nabi bikomeza mu rubanza rwose. Njye ntabwo mbyishimiye. Ni akaga ku butabera bwâ€™u Bubiligi.â€
Yavuze ko adahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ahubwo ko mbere yuko iba habayeho Jenoside na nyuma yayo haba indi.
Ati â€œSimpakana Jenoside, icyo navuze ni uko mbere yayo habaye Jenoside yakorewe abahutu kandi ko nyuma yayo, habaye Jenoside muri Congo yasize ibihumbi 10 byâ€™inzirakarengane.â€
Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE yamubajije niba yarigeze agera mu Rwanda ngo yihere ijisho ibyahabereye,yamusubije agira ati â€œMuri Kanama 1994 nari mu Rwanda ndi kumwe nâ€™abanyamategeko batagira umupaka, nzi ibyo mvuga.â€
Abajijwe niba yarabonye imibiri yâ€™inzirakarengane, mu ijambo rimwe arasubiza ati â€œyegoâ€. Yongeyeho ko ari ibintu bibabaje ariko akarenga akavuga ko uwo yunganiraga (Neretse) yarenganye.
Umwunganizi wâ€™abiciwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu manza zitandukanye zibera mu Bubiligi, MichÃ¨le Hirsch, yavuze ko ari urubanza rudasanzwe ruhamya akamaro gakomeye kâ€™urukiko rwâ€™abaturage rwa Bruxelles.
Yavuze ko rwagaragayemo ibintu bidasanzwe byinshi birimo nâ€™abatangabuhamya badasanzwe, abarokotse bagize imbaraga zo guhagaragara bakavuga aribyo byatumye umwanzuro wafashwe ufatwa.
Ati â€œNdatekereza ko icyemezo cyâ€™urukiko kizandikwa mu mateka yâ€™Urukiko rwa rubanda rwa Bruxelles kizandikwa mu mateka yâ€™u Bubiligi nâ€™ayâ€™ikiremwamuntu.â€™â€™
Urubanza rwa Fabien Neretse wâ€™imyaka 71 rwatangiye mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ryâ€™abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja nâ€™ubumushinjura. Nyuma yâ€™iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers nâ€™umugabo we IsaÃ¯e Bucyana nâ€™umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma yâ€™iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Neretse wahise atabwa muri yombi ajya gufungwa, afite iminsi 15 yo kujuririra umwanzuro wâ€™Urukiko rwa Bruxelles.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomera ku bumwe, barwanya abahakana Jenoside
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Babisabwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa bifatanyaga nâ€™Isi kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuhango wo kwibuka wahurije hamwe abanyarwanda basaga 550 baba mu Bushinwa hakoreshejwe uburyo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, James Kimonyo mu ijambo rye , yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa kurangwa nâ€™indangagaciro zâ€™ubwitange zaranze ingabo za RPA, ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ambasaderi Kimonyo yasabye abari bamukurikiye gukomeza kwimakaza ubumwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™ihakana ryayo.
Yasabye umuryango mpuzamahanga gufatanya nâ€™u Rwanda mu kugeza imbere yâ€™ubutabera abakidegembya bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Muri uyu muhango wo kwibuka, humviswe ubuhamya bwa Ntezimana Jean NÃ©pomucÃ¨ne warokotse Jenoside kuri ubu wiga mu Bushinwa, wavuze ku rugendo rwe mbere, muri Jenoside na nyuma yayo.
Ntezimana uri kwiga ibijyanye nâ€™ubuvuzi bwâ€™imbere mu mubiri yashimiye ingabo za RPA zamurokoye na Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yagaruriye icyizere abarokotse Jenoside, ibafasha mu kubaka ejo hazaza heza.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Buyapani bibutse Jenoside, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe byâ€™icuraburindi.
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe byâ€™icuraburindi.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu Buyapani bifatanyaga nâ€™Isi mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ubusanzwe ibikorwa byo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Buyapani byahurizaga hamwe abanyarwanda, inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™abayobozi muri Guverinoma yâ€™u Buyapani.
Uyu mwaka ibikorwa byo kwibuka biri gukorwa mu buryo bwihariye kubera ingamba zafashwe zo gukangurira abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, hahashywa icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda i Tokyo yahisemo gukora ibikorwa byo kwibuka mu buryo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga (video conference).
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buyapani, Ernest Rwamucyo mu ijambo yagejeje ku banyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zarwo mu Buyapani yagarutse ku mateka mabi yagejeje u Rwanda kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko kwibuka ari ngombwa â€œkuko biduha umwanya wo kwibuka abacu bambuwe ubuzima. Tuboneraho umwanya wo kwihanganisha abarokotse Jenoside nâ€™ubu bagifite ibikomere byaba ibigaragara ku mubiri ndetse nâ€™ibitagaragara.â€
Rwamucyo yavuze ko kwibuka ari umwanya wo gusubiza agaciro nâ€™icyubahiro abazize Jenoside bambuwe ubwo bicwaga urwâ€™agashinyaguro.
Yavuze ko ari nâ€™umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda nâ€™isi muri rusange kwirinda ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™ihakana nâ€™ipfobya bya Jenoside.
Ati â€œBiduha umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda, abatuye isi ndetse nâ€™imiryango mpuzamahanga kuzirikana ububi bwâ€™ingengabitecyerezo ya Jenoside, ingaruka mbi zo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside ndetse no kubashishikariza kwamagana ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ryaba irishingiye ku turere, amoko, amadini, cyangwa ibindi byose bishobora gutandukanya abantu.â€
Mu myaka 26 ishize, u Rwanda rwagiye rwiyubaka haba mu mibereho yâ€™abaturage nâ€™iterambere muri rusange.
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yashimye umuhate wâ€™ingabo zari iza RPA zahagaritse Jenoside, igihugu kikabona umusingi wo kubakiraho kigana imbere, ubu kikaba gikataje mu bumwe nâ€™ubwiyunge bwâ€™abanyarwanda, ukwisanzura kwa buri munyarwanda, umutekano nâ€™imiyoborere myiza.
Yashishikarije urubyiruko gutanga umusanzu warwo mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu.
Ati â€œMwebwe rubyiruko rwacu, mboneyeho umwanya wo kubakangurira gukunda igihugu cyababyaye. Kwitangira kubaka amateka meza mushyigikira umurongo wa politike nziza yubaka igihugu cyacu.â€
â€œByâ€™umwihariko mwebwe muri hano nkâ€™urubyiruko rufite ubumenyi bwihariye nâ€™imyumvire igomba kuba ihanitse murasabwa byinshi.â€
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yanasabye abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda gukomeza gufata mu mugongo abarokotse Jenoside muri ibi bihe bikomeye.
Ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside bizakomeza muri iki Cyumweru cyo kwibuka mu bihugu birimo Abanyarwanda barebererwa na Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buyapani. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 8 Mata hazibuka Abanyarwanda baba muri Philippines naho kuwa Gatanu tariki 10 hibuke abanyarwanda baba muri Malaysia.

Title: Diaspora mu guhangana nâ€™ingaruka za Coronavirus: Icyifuzo cyâ€™Umunyarwanda uba muri Canada
Body:
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cyâ€™uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cyâ€™uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abagera kuri 19 ni bo bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa na Coronavirus. Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe ingamba nyinshi, aho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yashyizeho izindi nshya.
Ingamba nshya zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus zatangajwe na Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, zategetse ko abakozi ba leta bose nâ€™abikorera basabwa gukorera akazi mu ngo zabo keretse abatanga serivisi zâ€™ingenzi.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Kijuli yavuze ko izi ngamba ari ingenzi cyane kandi zizatanga umusaruro, akifuza ko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora bahabwa igisa nkâ€™impuruza bakwishyira hamwe bakazagoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™izi ngamba cyane cyane abaryaga kuko bakoze uwo munsi â€˜nyakabyiziâ€™.
Ati â€œNkaba numva mfite igitekerezo cyâ€™uko Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga yakorana vuba na za ambasade zacu aho ziri hose zigashishikariza Abanyarwanda twese dutuye muri bino bihugu [nubwo nabo icyorezo cyabagezeho], bisa nâ€™aho bifite amikoro tukibumbira hamwe tugafasha abavandimwe bacu bazahura nâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™inzara.â€
Akomeza avuga ko abantu bagenda batanga nkâ€™amadolari 100$, 50$, 10$ gukomeza ariko icyo kintu cyo â€˜gutabara abavandimwe bacu kuko twese tuzi amikoro yâ€™ibihugu byacu byo muri Afurikaâ€™.
Kijuli wigeze kuba Perezida wa Diaspora muri Edmonton na Visi Perezida ku rwego rwâ€™Intara ya Canada, ahumuriza Abanyarwanda agira ati â€œTukaba tugira ngo tubakomeze ngo mushikame kandi nta kabuza iki cyorezo abanyarwanda tuzagitsinda.â€
Mu zindi ngamba Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe zirimo ko â€˜ubu imipaka yose irafunze, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha nâ€™abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe nâ€™amategeko, abo bose bakaba bazashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cyâ€™ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijweâ€™.
â€˜Ubwikorezi bwâ€™ibicuruzwa byinjira cyangwa bisohoka mu Rwanda burakomeza mu gihe ingendo hagati yâ€™imijyi nâ€™uturere twâ€™igihugu zitemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwaâ€™.
Nyuma yâ€™izi ngamba, Minisitiri wâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, yagarutse ku bantu barya kuko bakoze uwo munsi, abasaba gutekereza icyaba baramutse bagiye gushaka ayo mafaranga ariko ntibazabashe kuyabona kubera uburwayi; ahubwo abasaba gusaranganya na bagenzi babo muri bike bafite.
Minisitiri Prof Shyaka yatangaje ko Leta igiye kwishakamo ibisubizo bizafasha abantu barya ari uko bakoze ku munsi nâ€™abandi bafite amikoro make kugira ngo mu gihe cyo kwirinda Coronavirus batazicwa nâ€™inzara.
Ati "Hari ibizasaba nkâ€™igihugu ko abantu baba magirirane, niba hari urugo runaka rudafite icyo gusamura, tugomba kwishakamo ubushobozi ku buryo urwo rugo turwunganira kugira ngo abarurimo tutabarinda Coronavirus ariko bakicwa nâ€™inzara.â€™â€™
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro nâ€™inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyirwaye, cyane cyane mu kuramukanya abantu bahana ibiganza.

Title: LiÃ¨ge: Abanyarwanda bashinze ishuri rifasha abana babo kwiga Ikinyarwanda nâ€™umuco
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera nâ€™abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa LiÃ¨ge mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda nâ€™umuco nyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera nâ€™abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa LiÃ¨ge mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda nâ€™umuco nyarwanda.
Tariki ya 16 Gashyantare IGIHE yanyarukiye mu mujyi wa LiÃ¨ge ahari abanyarwanda batari bake bagize Diaspora nyarwanda, DRB-Rugari LiÃ¨ge, itembera mu ishiri â€˜Umucoâ€™.
Iryo shuri ryatangiye mu mpera zâ€˜umwaka ushize wa 2019, bagamije kwishakamo ibisubizo no gufasha abana babo guhorana indangagaciro zâ€™umuco nyarwanda.
Twagirimana uyobora DRB-Rugari-LiÃ¨ge yavuze ko igikorwa batangiye kizafasha abana bâ€™abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga kunga ubumwe no gusigasira umuco nyarwanda.
Ati â€œTwagerageje kwishakamo uburyo ngo dushyireho iri shuri aho abana bacu bazajya bahurira bakiga Ikinyarwanda, umuco wâ€˜aho bakomoka, rikababera kandi ihuriro ryo kumenyana, kunga ubumwe no gusabana mu gihe bari no kwiga ibijyanye nâ€˜imbyino, indirimbo nâ€˜imihamirizo kuko nabyo nâ€˜igice cyâ€˜amasomo biga.â€
Twagirimana yavuze ko iyo abana bigishijwe ayo masomo barushaho gusobanukirwa amateka yâ€™u Rwanda no kuvuga neza Ikinyarwanda.
Ati â€œKugira ngo tubigereho habayeho ko ababyeyi babigiramo uruhare batanga umusanzu, ariwo uvamo ibikoresho byâ€˜imfashanyigisho, ubwishingizi bwâ€˜aho dukorera hagize habaye impanuka nâ€˜ibindi. Iki gikorwa gihuza abana nâ€˜ababyeyi babo, usanga bahahurira bagakina igisoro, bakaganira mbese nâ€˜ihuriro nâ€˜ishuri kuri twese.â€
 Uyu muyobozi avuga ko icyabagoye ari ukubona abarimu bafite ubumenyi bwifuzwaga kandi bagakorera ubushake, gusa ngo baje kubabona.
Muri iryo shuri harimo ibyiciro bitatu. Abana bafite kuva ku myaka itatu kugeza kuri itandatu biga ukwabo, abo kuva kuri irindwi kugeza ku myaka icumi bakajya ukwabo no kuva kva kuri cumi ukazamura.
Bahabwa amasomo kabiri cyangwa gatatu mu kwezi kuko biga icyumeru kimwe bagasimbuka ikindi bityo bityo.
Isaha ya mbere biga Ikinyarwanda, isaha ikurikiyeho bakiga kubyina bya kinyarwanda nâ€˜ibijyanye nâ€˜umuco nâ€™amateka yâ€˜u Rwanda.
Umwe mu babyeyi bagize ubuyobozi bwa DRB Rugari Liege, Sakumi Sylvie yagize ati â€œ Ikintu gishimishije cyane ni ukubona ukuntu abana babikunze bitabira batinuba. Iyo umwana wanjye akoze nkâ€˜agakosa nkamubwira ko muhanisha kutaza mu ishuri Umuco, ubwo ntiyongera gukosa kuko kuri bo gusiba ibyo byiza babonye ntibishoboka.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œHari nâ€˜abana bakubwira bati ko icyumweru kitagera ngo tujye mu Rwanda kuko kuri bo kuza kwiga mu ishuri Umuco ni ukuza mu Rwanda, ibi byose rero biratunezaza cyane bikaduha imbaraga zo gukomeza.â€
Umwana witwa TimothÃ©e Kwizera ufite imyaka icumi yavuze ko kumenya Ikinyarwanda kuri we ari inyungu.
Ati â€œNdanezerewe cyane kuko kwiga Ikinyarwanda ni ikintu nemereye bene wacu bari mu Rwanda, ko ngomba kukimenya ngo njye nganira nabo kandi iyo nje aha mpura nâ€˜abandi banyarwanda tukamenyana.â€
 Ishuri Umuco gahunda yaryo ni ugutangira saa kumi kugeza saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba.
Twagirimana yifuza ko amashuri nkâ€˜aya bishobotse buri duce twa DRB Rugari mu Bubiligi twabikora nkâ€˜umuhigo kuko asanga bifasha ababyeyi nâ€™abana.

Title: USA: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah bizihije umwaka mushya (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata nâ€™ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata nâ€™ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Uwo muhango wabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 31 Mutarama 2020, ubera mu mujyi wa Salt Lake City muri Leta ya Utah. Witabiriwe na Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika Madamu Mathilde Mukantabana, abasenateri nâ€™abandi bayobozi muri Leta ya Utah.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana, yibukije Abanyarwanda gukomera ku ndangagaciro zabo ntibibagirwe aho bavuye kandi abasaba kuba ba ambasaderi bâ€™u Rwanda mu gihugu batuyemo.
Yagarutse kandi ku mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, yibutsa Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda aho igihugu cyavuye. Yavuze ko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igihugu cyasaga nkâ€™aho cyapfuye ariko bitewe nâ€™ubuyobozi bwiza ubu igihugu kiri ku myanya ya mbere mu bintu bitandukanye. Yatanze urugero rwâ€™umubare munini wâ€™abagore mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, kuza imbere mu korohereza ishoramari, kurwanya ruswa nâ€™ibindi.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana yasoje asaba Abanyarwanda gusigasira umuco wabo, no kudatakaza indanga gaciro zâ€™umunyarwanda.
Umuyobozi wa diaspora nyarwanda muri Leta ya Utah, Jean Claude Kamali yagaragaje ishusho rusange yâ€™abanyarwanda batuye muri iyo Leta, agaragaza ko hejuru ya 70% bagizwe nâ€™urubyiruko, aboneraho kubwira Abanyarwanda ko aribo mbaraga zâ€™u Rwanda ndetse nâ€™izâ€™igihugu batuye.
Kamali yagaragarije Ambasaderi Mathilde Mukantabana umubano mwiza bafitanye nâ€™inzego za leta, anashimira Guverineri wâ€™iyo ntara Gary Herbert , ko iyo hakozwe umunsi wo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, asohora itangazo ryo kwifatanya no gukomeza Abanyarwanda byâ€™umwihariko abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994.
Senateri Scott Howell yashimiye Ambasaderi Mukantabana kuba yagize uruzinduko muri Utah, anashimira Abanyarwanda byâ€™umwihariko umuco mwiza wo gushyira hamwe, abashishikariza gukomeza kwitabira gahunda za Leta batuyemo.
Uyu muhango wari witabiriwe nâ€™abantu barenga 250 barimo Abanyarwanda batuye Utah nâ€™inshuti zabo.

Title: Amb. Kirabo Kacyira yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana
Body:
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Dr. Aissa Kirabo yashyikirije Perezida Nana Addo izo mpapuro kuri uyu wa Mbere, tariki ya 27 Mutarama 2020 mu Ngoro ye iherereye mu Murwa Mukuru Accra.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, yijeje Abanyarwanda nâ€™Abanya-Ghana kuzarushaho kunoza inshingano yahawe ndetse anashimira Perezida Paul Kagame, wamugiriye icyizere cyo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana.
Mbere yo guhabwa inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana, Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yakoraga mu Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye rishinzwe imiturire.
Inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana yazihawe na Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame, tariki ya 15 Nyakanga 2019, ubwo hashyirwagaho abahagarariye u Rwanda mu bihugu 15 byâ€™amahanga.
Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira afite izina rizwi mu bijyanye na politiki mu Rwanda. Yayoboye Umujyi wa Kigali hagati ya 2006 na 2011, icyo gihe yari asimbuye Mutsindashyaka ThÃ©oneste. Uwo mwanya yawugezeho avuye no mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko yâ€™u Rwanda aho yari Intumwa ya rubanda.
Ghana yahawe guhagarariramo inyungu zâ€™u Rwanda ni igihugu gisanganywe umubano mwiza narwo. Stanislas Kamanzi ni we wari Ambasaderi warwo kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2017.
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda muri Ghana yafunguwe nkâ€™umusaruro wâ€™ibiganiro Perezida Kagame yagiye agirana na mugenzi we wâ€™icyo gihugu, Nana Akufo-Addo.
Muri gahunda yo kwihutisha iterambere no kuvugurura imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage (NST1) inajyanye nâ€™iya guverinoma yâ€™imyaka irindwi, igaragaza ko ishoramari ryâ€™abanyamahanga ari imwe mu nzira izafasha mu iterambere ryâ€™ubukungu bushingiye ku mubano u Rwanda rufitanye nâ€™ibindi bihugu.
Ghana nâ€™u Rwanda bifitanye umubano wihariye ugamije kunoza imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage babyo.
Ibihugu byombi byasinyanye amasezerano yâ€™ubufatanye mu byâ€™ikirere, yatumye kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2013, Sosiyete Nyarwanda yâ€™Ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir itangira ingendo zigana mu Mujyi wa Accra.
Ingendo za RwandAir zoroheje ubuhahirane hagati yâ€™ibihugu byombi, zinazamura imigenderanire mu bacuruzi nâ€™abashoramari babiturukamo cyane ko mu 2014 Urugaga rwâ€™Abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) rwasinyanye nâ€™Urwego rushinzwe Ubucuruzi muri Ghana amasezerano yâ€™ubufatanye agamije guteza imbere ishoramari mu buhinzi bwa kijyambere, ubukerarugendo, inganda zikora imyenda, ishoramari mu bwubatsi no mu bucukuzi bwâ€™amabuye yâ€™agaciro.

Title: Bahinduye umuvuno! Uko Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bisanga mu gihugu cyabibarutse
Body:
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari izâ€™abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya nâ€™imiryango kwishimira Noheli nâ€™Ubunani.
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari izâ€™abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya nâ€™imiryango kwishimira Noheli nâ€™Ubunani.
Iyo witegereje umwaka wa 2019 ingendo zakozwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda bagana mu biruhuko bya Noheli nâ€™ibisoza umwaka bavuye mu Bubiligi no mu bindi bihugu byâ€™u Burayi ubona ko bidasanzwe, abenshi bahisemo kubikorera mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bahageze mu buryo butandukanye mu mpande zose zâ€™Isi! Hari abahageze kera kubera amateka u Rwanda rwaciyemo mu bihe bitandukanye guhera 1959 na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Muri ubwo buzima usanga hari urubyiruko rwahavukiye cyangwa rwahakuriye, hakaba nâ€™abajyayo bagiye kwiga.
Nyuma yâ€™imyaka 26 Jenoside ihagaritswe usanga u Rwanda nâ€™Abanyarwanda barahinduye imyumvire. Kuri ubu abenshi bishimira kwitwa Abanyarwanda, nkâ€™ikintu bose bahuriyeho.
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi benshi bari barahinduye imvugo ingendo nâ€™indimi, batifuza kwitwa Abanyarwanda cyangwa kwitirirwa u Rwanda kubera amahano igihugu cyari kivuyemo.
Buhoro buhoro, ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Rwanda bwahinduye imyumvire nâ€™imitekerereze kugeza ubwo buri wese yifuje kwitirirwa rwa Rwanda kubera isura nziza rufite ugereranyije naho rwavuye, mu icuraburindi, imiborogo nâ€™amaraso yamenetse.
Ubu Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bazirikana igihugu cyabibarutse, ntibikandagira mu gihe bashaka kugaruka mu gihugu cyababyaye no gutanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka igihugu.
Mu biborohereza mu ngendo harimo no kuba Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubwikorezi bwâ€™Indege, RwandAir, gikorera ingendo mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™Isi mu byerekezo 28 bitandukanye.
Kuva mu ntangiriro za 2019, RwandAir yatangije ingendo zerekeza i Addis Ababa muri Ethiopie; i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, i Guangzhou mu Bushinwa nâ€™i Tel Aviv muri Israel.
IGIHE yegereye abayobozi batandukanye mu gihugu, bayisangiza uko bakiriye kuba Abanyarwanda bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo kandi bishimye.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali, Rubingisa Pudence, yavuze ko mu bikorwa byâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bagaragaza urukundo rwâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati â€œBuri muntu ubona uko u Rwanda rwihuta mu iterambere ari mu mahanga aba ashaka gushyiraho umuganda we, ikindi umuntu yashima ni ubukangurambaga bukorwa na za Ambasade zâ€™u Rwanda hirya no hino ku Isi, aho nâ€™imiryango yâ€™Abanyarwanda itanga uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru muri za Diaspora.â€™â€™
Yakomeje ati â€œIyo bageze mu Rwanda basanga harashyizweho uburyo bwo kwakirwa bwihariye muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga nâ€™Ubutwererane, nâ€™ahandi bagiye hose usanga bakirwa neza kandi byihuse nâ€™ubwo usanga hari serivisi zimwe zigomba kunozwa nabo ubwabo bakabyivugira kugira ngo bikosorwe.â€™â€™
Rubingisa yanavuze ko iyo Abanyarwanda basanze iterambere ryâ€™igihugu bibaha umurava wo kukigarukamo kenshi.
Ati â€œIbi kandi noneho si abo mu mahanga bibaho gusa kuko nâ€™Abanyarwanda baturuka mu zindi ntara usanga baza bagahaha ubumenyi bakanakopera ibyiza bikorerwa mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali bakabijyana mu turere batuyemo.â€™â€™
â€œMu baturuka mu mahanga, abo tuganira banifuza kuza gusangira ubumenyi mu byo bafitemo ubunararibonye bize cyangwa bakoramo bikaba ari ibintu byo kwishimira.â€™â€™
Mu gihe cyâ€™ibiruhuko, Abanyarwanda basura ibyiza nyaburanga biri mu gihugu birimo Ingoro Ndangamurage ziri mu Rwanda, Pariki zâ€™Igihugu zirimo iya Nyungwe, iyâ€™Ibirunga nâ€™ahandi hatuma binjiza amafaranga menshi ku bukerarugendo, bikanazamura ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa byâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu Mahanga muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Maziyateke Sandrine, yavuze ko mu mpera zâ€™umwaka ushize Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga benshi basuye igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati â€œNibyo koko mu mpera zâ€™umwaka twagize abantu benshi baturutse muri Diaspora mu Burayi, Canada, Afurika nâ€™ahandi.â€™â€™
Mu Nama yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Umushyikirano handitswe abantu bagera kuri 377 bavuye mu mahanga.
Yakomeje ati â€œIkindi kiza cyane ni uko nyuma bakomeza kugirana ibiganiro nâ€™inzego zitandukanye mu gihugu. Uyu mwaka bahuye na Sena bayigezaho ibitekerezo nâ€™ibyifuzo nkâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga. Baganira nâ€™izi nzego havamo nâ€™imyanzuro itandukanye harimo gufatanya cyane mu kurwanya abahezanguni, abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakomeje kwidegembya mu bihugu byâ€™amahanga.â€™â€™
Aba Banyarwanda kandi banaganiriye na Minisitiri wâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Dr Biruta Vincent; uwâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, ubuyobozi bwâ€™Agaciro Development Fund; ubwâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ubwiteganyirize (RSSB); Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) nâ€™ubwa Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutabera baganira ku ngingo zigarukwaho mu bikorwa byagutse nka za Rwanda Day.
Muri ibyo biganiro kandi hanazamo imikoranire ikwiye hagati yâ€™Abanyarwanda bâ€™imbere mu gihugu no hanze mu bijyanye nâ€™ishoramari.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga banahuye nâ€™itsinda riyobowe nâ€™Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, ryabasangije ku muco wo kuba Umunyafurika nyawe (Panafricanist). Ibi biganiro byavuyemo imyanzuro yo gushyigikira iyi gahunda no kuriganiriza abandi Banyafurika bari mu bihugu byâ€™amahanga.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basabye ko gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda zarushaho kwimakazwa bijyanye nâ€™igihe.
Maziyateke yanagarutse no ku biganiro byo gukangurira abana bato kumenya igihugu nâ€™amateka yacyo mu bijyanye nâ€™umuco nâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda, kubaha umwanya ku bitekerezo byabo, abana bakumva ko bafite igihugu cyâ€™ababyeyi babo.
Guverineri wâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yabwiye IGIHE ko Abanyarwanda benshi bakunze kwakirwa mu biruhuko bisoza umwaka.
Ati â€œMu mpera za 2019 Abanyarwanda baje ari benshi mu biruhuko, hari na gahunda iteganyijwe yo kubakira mu Majyaruguru ku bakiri mu Rwanda narabatumiye.â€™â€™
â€œAbo bose hari abaza nko mu Mushyikirano ariko bakazana nâ€™imiryango yabo nâ€™inshuti, bagasura ahantu hatandukanye, uko basura niko bazamura ubukungu kuko bishyura serivisi bahabwa, amahoteli babamo basura ahantu hatandukanye.â€™â€™
Gatabazi yavuze ko hari nâ€™ibiganiro byabayeho bamwe bemera kuzajya batanga amasomo mu bigo byâ€™amashuri atandukanye, abakora ubushakashatsi bakabisangiza amashuri yâ€™u Rwanda nta kiguzi.
Yakomeje ati â€œDufite nâ€™amahirwe ko nâ€™abanangiye kugaruka mu gihugu bohereza abana, abagore ku buryo bagenda bafunguka buhoro buhoro mu bikorwa byo kubaka igihugu. Aho usanga abatarabigeraho ni uko bafite ibibazo byihariye bibareba bya politiki.â€™â€™
Yashimye ko Abanyarwanda benshi bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo bazana ibitekerezo bishya kandi byiza bavanye mu mahanga bishyira itafari ryabo mu kucyubaka.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu rugendo rwo mu bwato rwâ€™amasaha 23, barasabana
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rwâ€™amasaha 23.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rwâ€™amasaha 23.
Ubwato buhagura saa moya zijoro bukazagaruka aho bwahagurukiye saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba zâ€™undi munsi.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de, kugira ngo bongere bahure bose umwaka utararangira, barebe ibyakozwe, aho bagifite intege nke bafashanye kuzongera ndetse basabane banifurizanye iminsi mikuru myiza ya Noheli nâ€™ubunani.
 Uyobora umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri iki gihugu, Madamu Gloria Sebalu, yabwiye IGIHE ko icyo gikorwa cyitabiriwe bishimishije, avuga ko hatangiwe ibiganiro byiza bitandukanye.
Mu biganiro byatanzwe harimo ikigaruka ku gukunda igihugu bakomokamo, gusigasira umuco nyarwanda ndetse nâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda. Hanatanzwe ibiganiro binyuranye bigaragaza uko bashora imari mu gihugu ndetse nâ€™ikiganiro kigisha uko bakwiteza imbere mu buryo bufatika mu gihugu barimo cy SuÃ¨de.
Muri uru rugendo rwâ€™ubwato kandi habayeho no gusabana banasangira amafunguro anyuranye ategurwa muri ubwo bwato .
Mu gusoza uyu mwaka kandi hateguwe umunsi wâ€™ubusabane wâ€™abana, wabereye ahitwa Leos Lekland, haba imikino itandukanye yâ€™abana.
Umuryango wâ€™abari nâ€™abategarugori batuye muri SuÃ¨de nibo bateguye iki gikorwa cyâ€™ubusabane, akaba ari nabo bayoboye gahunda yo kwigisha ururimi nâ€™umuco.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu bihugu bihugu byo mu Majyaruguru yâ€™u Burayi, Nkulikiyinka Christine, aganiriza abana bari bitabiriye uwo munsi, yabasabye gukomeza kwiga ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda asaba ababyeyi kujya bavugisha abana mu rugo mu Kinyarwanda, bityo bakabunganira ku byo baba bize.
Yagize ati â€œUmwana ntajye avuga Ikinyarwanda ari uko yagiye kukiga rimwe mu kwezi, ntibyaba bihagije ngo akimenye ababyeyi muramutse mutabunganiye.â€
Yasabye abari bahari batajya muri iyo gahunda yo kwiga Ikinyarwanda no kubyina kinyarwanda ko bajya bitabira ndetse abasaba ko babwira abatari baje uwo munsi ibyiza byo kwiga ururimi rwacu no gusigasira umuco.
Abana bishimiye kuba barahuye uwo munsi bagakina, ariko kandi bavuga ko guhura biga Ikinyarwanda byatumye bamenyana baba inshuti, bituma bishimira cyane kwitabira ibikorwa bihuza Abanyarwanda no kumenya igihugu cyabo kurushaho.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomera ku bumwe, barwanya abahakana Jenoside
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Babisabwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa bifatanyaga nâ€™Isi kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuhango wo kwibuka wahurije hamwe abanyarwanda basaga 550 baba mu Bushinwa hakoreshejwe uburyo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, James Kimonyo mu ijambo rye , yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa kurangwa nâ€™indangagaciro zâ€™ubwitange zaranze ingabo za RPA, ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ambasaderi Kimonyo yasabye abari bamukurikiye gukomeza kwimakaza ubumwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™ihakana ryayo.
Yasabye umuryango mpuzamahanga gufatanya nâ€™u Rwanda mu kugeza imbere yâ€™ubutabera abakidegembya bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Muri uyu muhango wo kwibuka, humviswe ubuhamya bwa Ntezimana Jean NÃ©pomucÃ¨ne warokotse Jenoside kuri ubu wiga mu Bushinwa, wavuze ku rugendo rwe mbere, muri Jenoside na nyuma yayo.
Ntezimana uri kwiga ibijyanye nâ€™ubuvuzi bwâ€™imbere mu mubiri yashimiye ingabo za RPA zamurokoye na Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yagaruriye icyizere abarokotse Jenoside, ibafasha mu kubaka ejo hazaza heza.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Buyapani bibutse Jenoside, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe byâ€™icuraburindi.
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe byâ€™icuraburindi.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu Buyapani bifatanyaga nâ€™Isi mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ubusanzwe ibikorwa byo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Buyapani byahurizaga hamwe abanyarwanda, inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™abayobozi muri Guverinoma yâ€™u Buyapani.
Uyu mwaka ibikorwa byo kwibuka biri gukorwa mu buryo bwihariye kubera ingamba zafashwe zo gukangurira abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, hahashywa icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda i Tokyo yahisemo gukora ibikorwa byo kwibuka mu buryo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga (video conference).
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buyapani, Ernest Rwamucyo mu ijambo yagejeje ku banyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zarwo mu Buyapani yagarutse ku mateka mabi yagejeje u Rwanda kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko kwibuka ari ngombwa â€œkuko biduha umwanya wo kwibuka abacu bambuwe ubuzima. Tuboneraho umwanya wo kwihanganisha abarokotse Jenoside nâ€™ubu bagifite ibikomere byaba ibigaragara ku mubiri ndetse nâ€™ibitagaragara.â€
Rwamucyo yavuze ko kwibuka ari umwanya wo gusubiza agaciro nâ€™icyubahiro abazize Jenoside bambuwe ubwo bicwaga urwâ€™agashinyaguro.
Yavuze ko ari nâ€™umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda nâ€™isi muri rusange kwirinda ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™ihakana nâ€™ipfobya bya Jenoside.
Ati â€œBiduha umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda, abatuye isi ndetse nâ€™imiryango mpuzamahanga kuzirikana ububi bwâ€™ingengabitecyerezo ya Jenoside, ingaruka mbi zo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside ndetse no kubashishikariza kwamagana ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ryaba irishingiye ku turere, amoko, amadini, cyangwa ibindi byose bishobora gutandukanya abantu.â€
Mu myaka 26 ishize, u Rwanda rwagiye rwiyubaka haba mu mibereho yâ€™abaturage nâ€™iterambere muri rusange.
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yashimye umuhate wâ€™ingabo zari iza RPA zahagaritse Jenoside, igihugu kikabona umusingi wo kubakiraho kigana imbere, ubu kikaba gikataje mu bumwe nâ€™ubwiyunge bwâ€™abanyarwanda, ukwisanzura kwa buri munyarwanda, umutekano nâ€™imiyoborere myiza.
Yashishikarije urubyiruko gutanga umusanzu warwo mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu.
Ati â€œMwebwe rubyiruko rwacu, mboneyeho umwanya wo kubakangurira gukunda igihugu cyababyaye. Kwitangira kubaka amateka meza mushyigikira umurongo wa politike nziza yubaka igihugu cyacu.â€
â€œByâ€™umwihariko mwebwe muri hano nkâ€™urubyiruko rufite ubumenyi bwihariye nâ€™imyumvire igomba kuba ihanitse murasabwa byinshi.â€
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yanasabye abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda gukomeza gufata mu mugongo abarokotse Jenoside muri ibi bihe bikomeye.
Ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside bizakomeza muri iki Cyumweru cyo kwibuka mu bihugu birimo Abanyarwanda barebererwa na Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buyapani. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 8 Mata hazibuka Abanyarwanda baba muri Philippines naho kuwa Gatanu tariki 10 hibuke abanyarwanda baba muri Malaysia.

Title: Rwandacash Africash yakoze impinduka muri serivisi zo kohererezanya amafaranga
Body:
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Sosiyete itanga serivisi ku bohereza amafaranga mu Rwanda no mu mahanga ya Rwanda Cash LTD yagaragaje ko yakomeje gukora ariko yifashishije uburyo bugezweho kandi bwizewe bwo guhererekanya amafaranga bwa mobile money.
Mu Bubiligi, ibiro byose bya Moneytrans-Africash zikorana na Rwandacash LTD byahawe uburenganzira bwo gufungura no kwakira abantu hakurikijwe ingamba zatanzwe nâ€™inzego zibishinzwe.
Naho mu Rwanda, Rwandacash LTD yabaye ifunze nkuko amabwiriza yatanzwe na Banki Nkuru yâ€™Igihugu (BNR) abisaba kugeza ubwo hazatangwa andi avuga ku kongera gukora kwâ€™ibigo byohererezanya amafaranga no kuvunja.
Bitewe nâ€™amasezerano iyi sosiyete isanzwe ifitanye na MTN Rwanda binyuze muri Mobile Money, abakiliya bose bakira amafaranga mu Rwanda bayashyirirwa kuri Mobile Money gusa.
Itangazo ryayo yavuze ko â€œHari nâ€™ahongerewe imbaraga mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ku bohererezanya amafaranga kuri application ya https://www.moneytrans.eu/belgium/imoneytrans/.â€™â€™
Yanamenyesheje ko ishami rya Matonge i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo rizafungura nihamara kugaruka agahenge nyuma yâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Abashaka kohererezanya amafaranga bifashishije Rwanda Cash-Africash-Moneytrans bashyiriweho imirongo ya telefoni bashobora kubazaho andi makuru zirimo +32 2 227 18 20 ku bari mu Bubiligi na +250 788 35 87 87 ku bo mu Rwanda.
Ikwirakwira cya Coronavirus mu mpande zose zâ€™Isi ryahinduye imibereho ya muntu kugeza no ku ikoranabuhanga yifashisha mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Ubu imibereho yâ€™Isi yubakiye ku bukungu bushingiye ku kudahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020 ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi bitewe nâ€™uburyo umubare wâ€™abayandura wiyongera kuva yaboneka mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Coronavirus imaze guhitana abantu 45 334, mu gihe abayanduye bagera ku 903 799, muri bo 190 675 barayikize.

Title: Diaspora mu guhangana nâ€™ingaruka za Coronavirus: Icyifuzo cyâ€™Umunyarwanda uba muri Canada
Body:
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cyâ€™uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cyâ€™uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abagera kuri 19 ni bo bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa na Coronavirus. Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe ingamba nyinshi, aho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yashyizeho izindi nshya.
Ingamba nshya zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus zatangajwe na Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, zategetse ko abakozi ba leta bose nâ€™abikorera basabwa gukorera akazi mu ngo zabo keretse abatanga serivisi zâ€™ingenzi.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Kijuli yavuze ko izi ngamba ari ingenzi cyane kandi zizatanga umusaruro, akifuza ko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora bahabwa igisa nkâ€™impuruza bakwishyira hamwe bakazagoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™izi ngamba cyane cyane abaryaga kuko bakoze uwo munsi â€˜nyakabyiziâ€™.
Ati â€œNkaba numva mfite igitekerezo cyâ€™uko Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga yakorana vuba na za ambasade zacu aho ziri hose zigashishikariza Abanyarwanda twese dutuye muri bino bihugu [nubwo nabo icyorezo cyabagezeho], bisa nâ€™aho bifite amikoro tukibumbira hamwe tugafasha abavandimwe bacu bazahura nâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™inzara.â€
Akomeza avuga ko abantu bagenda batanga nkâ€™amadolari 100$, 50$, 10$ gukomeza ariko icyo kintu cyo â€˜gutabara abavandimwe bacu kuko twese tuzi amikoro yâ€™ibihugu byacu byo muri Afurikaâ€™.
Kijuli wigeze kuba Perezida wa Diaspora muri Edmonton na Visi Perezida ku rwego rwâ€™Intara ya Canada, ahumuriza Abanyarwanda agira ati â€œTukaba tugira ngo tubakomeze ngo mushikame kandi nta kabuza iki cyorezo abanyarwanda tuzagitsinda.â€
Mu zindi ngamba Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe zirimo ko â€˜ubu imipaka yose irafunze, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha nâ€™abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe nâ€™amategeko, abo bose bakaba bazashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cyâ€™ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijweâ€™.
â€˜Ubwikorezi bwâ€™ibicuruzwa byinjira cyangwa bisohoka mu Rwanda burakomeza mu gihe ingendo hagati yâ€™imijyi nâ€™uturere twâ€™igihugu zitemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwaâ€™.
Nyuma yâ€™izi ngamba, Minisitiri wâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, yagarutse ku bantu barya kuko bakoze uwo munsi, abasaba gutekereza icyaba baramutse bagiye gushaka ayo mafaranga ariko ntibazabashe kuyabona kubera uburwayi; ahubwo abasaba gusaranganya na bagenzi babo muri bike bafite.
Minisitiri Prof Shyaka yatangaje ko Leta igiye kwishakamo ibisubizo bizafasha abantu barya ari uko bakoze ku munsi nâ€™abandi bafite amikoro make kugira ngo mu gihe cyo kwirinda Coronavirus batazicwa nâ€™inzara.
Ati "Hari ibizasaba nkâ€™igihugu ko abantu baba magirirane, niba hari urugo runaka rudafite icyo gusamura, tugomba kwishakamo ubushobozi ku buryo urwo rugo turwunganira kugira ngo abarurimo tutabarinda Coronavirus ariko bakicwa nâ€™inzara.â€™â€™
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro nâ€™inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyirwaye, cyane cyane mu kuramukanya abantu bahana ibiganza.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye i Burayi bahagaritse ibikorwa bibahuza mu kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu byâ€™ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo nâ€™umuti wo guhangana nâ€™iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu byâ€™ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo nâ€™umuti wo guhangana nâ€™iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo [pandÃ©mie] cyugarije Isi mu itangazo ryashyize hanze ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020.
Coronavirus imaze gukwirakwira mu bihugu 123 bitandukanye ndetse kugeza ubu abarenga 125 000 barayanduye mu gihe abasaga 5000 yabahitanye. Ibi byatumye mu bihugu bitandukanye hashyirwaho ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Ingamba zafashwe mu bihugu byinshi zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi nkâ€™imikino, ibitaramo, inama ndetse bimwe byafunze amashuri mato na za kaminuza kugeza igihe kitaramenyekana, amaduka nkâ€™uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
U Butaliyani ku wa 12 Werurwe 2020, bwafunze amaduka yose uretse ububiko bwâ€™ibiribwa na za farumasi, nkâ€™uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iki gihugu cyafunze amashuri, inzu zikorerwamo siporo, inzu ndangamateka nâ€™utubyiniro mu gihe na Shampiyona yâ€™igihugu mu mupira wâ€™amaguru [Serie A] nayo yahagaritswe. Abantu barenga ibihumbi 12 ni bo bamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Butaliyani, naho abagera kuri 830 yarabahitanye.
Ibihugu byâ€™i Burayi biri mu byugarijwe na Coronavirus yagize ingaruka ku bikorwa byari biteganyijwe, birimo nâ€™ibyâ€™Abanyarwanda.
Guhera mu ntangiriro za Werurwe 2020 hirya no hino mu Burayi hari hateganyijwe ibikorwa bitandukanye bisanzwe bihuza Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo buri mwaka.
Ibyo bikorwa bigizwe nâ€™amahuriro atandukanye, inama zari ziteganyijwe ku bava mu Rwanda bazikorera hirya no hino ku Isi, amamurikagurisha yâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™ingendo zari ziteganyijwe bijyanye nâ€™ibirori bibera muri Diaspora nâ€™ibindi.
Ingamba zafashwe nâ€™ibihugu byâ€™i Burayi zinubahirizwa nâ€™Abanyarwanda babibamo ndetse na bo mu kwirinda barabihagarika mu gukaza ubwirinzi.
Mu bikorwa byasubitswe byagombaga guhuza Abanyarwanda birimo ibyâ€™Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore ku Isi [ni igikorwa cyitabirwa cyane ko kigaragaza intambwe yâ€™u Rwanda mu gusubiza umugore agaciro no kumwubakiraho iterambere ryâ€™igihugu].
Kugeza magingo aya, Abanyarwanda baba mu Butaliyani, u Bufaransa, u Bubiligi, Budage, u Buholandi nâ€™ibihugu byo muri Scandinavie byasubitse ibyo birori.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26, Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ntibiramenyekana uko bizakorwa mu gihe iki cyorezo cyaba kigifite ubukana. Abahagarariye imiryango irengera inyungu zâ€™abarokotse Jenoside baracyarebera hamwe uko iki gihe bizagenda.
Guverinoma yâ€™u Bubiligi nayo yaraye iteranye ifata ibyemezo bikakaye aho amashuri abanza, ayisumbuye na za Kaminuza byafunzwe.
Kuva kuri uyu wa Gatanu kandi ahahurira abantu benshi hafunzwe usibye gusa amaduka yo guhahiramo azakomeza gufungura ndetse ibihumbi byâ€™abaturage byazindutse bijya guhaha ku buryo hanitabajwe abashinzwe umutekano mu kuborohereza.
Uretse imiryango yâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye mu mahanga yagizweho ingaruka zikomeye zo gusubika ibikorwa byayo, Coronavirus yanazahaje ibikorwa byâ€™ubukerarugendo kubera ihagarikwa ryâ€™ingendo.
Isuzuma ryâ€™Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutwara abantu nâ€™ibintu mu Kirere, IATA, ryerekanye ko ibigo mpuzamahanga bitwara abagenzi mu ndege bizahomba miliyari $113 Coronavirus nikomeza gukwirakwira.
Abaganga bagaragaza ko nubwo Coronavirus ari indwara ikomeye, ishobora kwirindwa byoroshye ariko ikanakwirakwira byoroshye. Gukaraba intoki no guhagarika kuramukanya byafasha mu kwirinda.
Umuganga Dr Soentens waganiriye na IGIHE yavuze ko umubare munini wâ€™abarwaye Coronavirus bakira ndetse ko abapfa babiterwa nuko ibikoresho byo kubaramira biba bike, bageze mu zabukuru cyangwa basanganywe izindi ndwara zikomeye zidakira.
Kugira ngo umuntu yandure Coronavirus ni uko uyifite ayiha undi mu buryo bwâ€™amatembabuzi ava mu mazuru cyangwa mu kanwa kâ€™uyirwaye, kuko yandurira mu myanya yâ€™ubuhumekero nubwo ishobora guca nâ€™ahandi. Ni nayo mpamvu umuntu wayanduye ahita ahabwa akato.
Iyo iyi virusi imaze kugera mu bihaha niho itura, ari nayo mpamvu ibuza abantu guhumeka neza bakarwara umusonga, ari nawo ubahitana.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia bizihije umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth
Body:
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwifatanyaga nâ€™Isi mu kwizihiza umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia nabo bifatanyije nâ€™icyo gihugu mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ukomeye.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwifatanyaga nâ€™Isi mu kwizihiza umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia nabo bifatanyije nâ€™icyo gihugu mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ukomeye.
Uyu muhango wo kwizihiza ibikorwa bya Commonwealth wabaye mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura muri Kamena, kwakira inama izahuza abakuru bâ€™ibihugu na za Guverinoma bigize Umuryango wâ€™Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza, CHOGM.
Ibirori byâ€™Abanyarwanda muri Australia byabereye mu mujyi wa Brisbane, aho bashimiwe uruhare rwabo mu gutanga urugero rwiza mu ruhando rwâ€™amahanga.
Ni ibirori ngarukamwaka bihagurutsa Abanyarwanda bâ€™ingeri zose; abana nâ€™abakuru bagahagarika ibikorwa byabo kugirango baserukire u Rwanda.
Abitabiriye ibi birori basusurukijwe nâ€™umuhanzi wâ€™umunyarwanda, Ras Banamungu umaze kumenyerwa muri ibi birori, afatanije nâ€™itsinda rye the Det-n-ators International, baririmba indirimbo bise â€œInkaâ€, irimo ubutumwa bwâ€™uko akunda igihugu cyamubyaye.
Ni ibirori byitabiriwe nâ€™abayobozi barimo Depite Paul de Jersey na Madamu we Kaye de Jersey, uhagarariye Umwamikazi muri Queensland, Umuvugizi wa Polisi ya Queensland, Barry Dinneen na Noela Oâ€™Donnell, Musenyeri Phillip Aspinall, Reverend Dr. Peter Catt, Bill Willcocks na Vicki Howard.

Title: Maroc yatangirijwemo igikorwa cyo gufasha urubyiruko rwâ€™Abanyarwanda guhanga udushya
Body:
Mu rwego rwo gufasha Abanyarwanda biga mu mahanga guhanga imirimo izabagirira akamaro nibava ku ntebe yâ€™ishuri, hatangijwe igikorwa cyiswe â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ kigamije gushyigikira imishinga yabo no kubahuza nâ€™ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda.
Mu rwego rwo gufasha Abanyarwanda biga mu mahanga guhanga imirimo izabagirira akamaro nibava ku ntebe yâ€™ishuri, hatangijwe igikorwa cyiswe â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ kigamije gushyigikira imishinga yabo no kubahuza nâ€™ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda.
Iki gikorwa cyatangirijwe muri Maroc ku wa 8 Werurwe 2020 cyahuriranye nâ€™ibirori byo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore.
Mu kiganiro bahawe hibanzwe ku gufasha Abanyarwanda guhanga udushya bakiri ku ishuri mu kwitegura kugana ku isoko ryâ€™umurimo no guhesha abandi akazi.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ikoranabuhanga mu Rugaga rwâ€™Abikorera (PSF), Ntare Alex, yabwiye abitabiriye igikorwa cyo gutangiza â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ ko bari guhaha ubumenyi bufite ireme bwazabafasha kwiteza imbere.
Yakomeje ati â€œNi igikorwa kizahoraho kigamije gushaka udushya no gufasha abari muri diaspora bafite imishinga bahanze. Twahereye ku banyeshuri kuko baba bafite aho bakorera, bafite abarimu nâ€™izindi nzego zibafasha nka kaminuza bashobora gukorana udushya twagirira u Rwanda na bo ubwabo akamaro.â€™â€™
Iki gikorwa cyatekerejweho nyuma yo kubona ko hari abakitinya kandi bafite ibikorwa byatanga impinduka mu buzima bwâ€™abenegihugu.
Ati â€œMu Rwanda twamaze kubona ko biri gukora kuko twatangije K-Lab na Fab Lab [inzu zihangirwamo imishinga yâ€™ikoranabuhanga]. Abari hanze hari icyuho ko nta muntu ubakurikirana.â€™â€™
Urubyiruko ruzatoranywa nyuma yo kugaragaza impano mu mishinga yâ€™ikoranabuhanga ruzahabwa ubufasha burimo ubwo guhuzwa nâ€™ibigo bitandukanye.
Ati â€œAbanyeshuri batazi gahunda zabafasha bigatuma batinya kugaruka, bakagira ubwoba bwo gutangiza udushya twabo bavuga ko ntacyo byamara, nta bushobozi bafite, nta nâ€™ubufasha babona. Turashaka kubakangurira no kubabwira ko hari ubufasha. Tugomba kubaba hafi ku buryo twabahuza na bagenzi babo cyangwa izindi nzego dusanzwe dukorana.â€™â€™
Ntare yifashishije urugero rwâ€™ikoranabuhanga rya Tap&Go ryatangiye kubyara amafaranga no kugirira akamaro abarihanze.
Mu 2015 nibwo Patrick Buchana Nsenga yashinze AC Group, ikigo kiri mu byâ€™imbere mu gutanga ibisubizo byâ€™ikoranabuhanga, birimo iryo kwishyura amafaranga yâ€™urugendo hakoreshejwe ikarita izwi nka Tap&Go.
Imibare yo mu 2019 igaragaza ko abantu bari bamaze gukoresha Tap&Go inshuro zirenga miliyoni 80 ndetse nibura ku munsi abagenzi bashobora kuyakoresha inshuro ibihumbi 250. Amakarita amaze gutangwa arenga miliyoni 1.5 mu gihe ifite aba-agents 311 baha serivisi abagenzi mu bice bitandukanye.
Mu butumwa bwe, Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasangije abitabiriye iki gikorwa uko bagera kuri byinshi bifashishije ubumenyi bafite.
Ati â€œNabaganirije ku ruhare rwâ€™umwari nâ€™umutegarugori ku ruhembe rwâ€™iterambere ryâ€™igihugu nkâ€™insanganyamatsiko yahawe Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Umugore nuko bahera ku gishoro gito bakagera kuri byinshi.â€™â€™
Abitabiriye â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ basusurukijwe nâ€™urubyiruko rwâ€™abahungu nâ€™abakobwa bibumbiye mu itorero ribyina gakondo ryo muri Maroc.
Muri gahunda ya Guverinoma yâ€™imyaka irindwi izarangira mu 2024, biteganyijwe ko i Kigali hazubakwa ahantu hihariye hazafasha Abanyarwanda nâ€™abanyamahanga bafite impano zihariye kurushaho guhanga ibishya (Kigali Innovation City), gushyiraho Ikigega kigamije guteza imbere imishinga yâ€™ikoranabuhanga nâ€™ibindi.
U Rwanda na Maroc bifitanye umubano mwiza ushingiye ku ngeri nyinshi zirimo nkâ€™uburezi, aho magingo aya hari Abanyarwanda basaga 100 biga muri icyo gihugu, mu mashami arimo Ubuvuzi, Engineering nâ€™ibindi.
Mu minsi ishize, Ambasaderi Habimana yasuye ibigo byashyiriweho guhanga udushya mu ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda, birimo K Lab, asobanurirwa imikorere nâ€™umusanzu bimaze gutanga mu iterambere ryâ€™u Rwanda.
