Title: NorvÃ¨ge: Urubyiruko rwasabwe kubakira ku ndangagaciro Nyarwanda nkâ€™umusingi wâ€™iterambere
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge biganjemo urubyiruko bibukijwe ko kubakira ku ndangagaciro na kirazira byâ€™umuco Nyarwanda , ari wo musingi uzabafasha kugira ejo hazaza heza, bagira uruhare mu iterambere ryâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge biganjemo urubyiruko bibukijwe ko kubakira ku ndangagaciro na kirazira byâ€™umuco Nyarwanda , ari wo musingi uzabafasha kugira ejo hazaza heza, bagira uruhare mu iterambere ryâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Ubu butumwa babuherewe mu biganiro byabaye ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019, byateguwe nâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge, bafite intego yo kwigisha urubyiruko rwâ€™Abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu amateka yâ€™u Rwanda.
Uhagarariye Umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo muri NorvÃ¨ge, Mugisha Peter, yashimiye urubyiruko rwitabiriye icyo gikorwa, arubwira ko arirwo bayobozi bâ€™ahazaza, kandi ko rusabwa kwitanga, kugira ubushake no gukoresha neza igihe rufite.
Dr Benda Munyurangabo Richard, Umwarimu muri Kaminuza za Luther King College, Manchester na Chester zo mu Bwongereza, ubu akaba ari gukorana ubushakashatsi na Kaminuza ya Stellenbosch muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo ku ngaruka Jenoside na Apartheid bifite ku bana nâ€™urubyiruko, cyane cyane abavutse nyuma yâ€™ayo mahano, yatanze ikiganiro ku mateka yâ€™u Rwanda mbere na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yagaragaje ibyaranze igihe cyâ€™abami, ubukoloni, impinduramatwara yo mu 1959, amacakubiri, ivangura, irondakoko nâ€™irondakarere, uko Abatutsi bahejwe mu gihugu cyabo, uko bishwe, bakanatotezwa nâ€™ibindi.
Yanavuze kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, igahagarikwa nâ€™Ingabo za RPF zari ziyobowe na Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame; imiyoborere myiza u Rwanda rufite ubu, nâ€™uko Abanyarwanda babashije kwishakamo ibisubizo ku bibazo byâ€™inzitane u Rwanda rwarimo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, atanga urugero kuri Gacaca na gahunda ya â€˜Ndi Umunyarwandaâ€™.
Muhigana FÃ©lix umwe mu Banyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge, yatanze ikiganiro kivuga kuri Afurika mu cyiswe â€œPanafricanismeâ€™â€™ asobanura uburyo yatangiye, asaba urubyiruko kugira imyumvire iboneye ku mugabane bavukamo wa Afurika.
Ati â€œMukwiye kugira imyumvire ishaka ibisubizo aho kwibanda ku kunenga ibitagenda. Twese turi bamwe, turi Abanyafurika dufatanye mu rugamba rwo kwiteza imbere no kwihesha agaciro; isoko rusange Nyafurika â€˜AfCTAâ€™ ni urugero rwiza mukwiye kubona.â€
Haganiriwe kandi ku ruhare rwâ€™ urubyiruko mu iterambere ryâ€™ u Rwanda. Umwe witwa Serge yasangije abari muri iyo nama ibikorwa akora mu Rwanda aho afite ikipe yâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru yitwa â€˜Juatotoâ€™ ibarizwa mu karere ka Rubavu, akaba anafite umushinga ugamije guteza imbere injyana ya â€˜Hip hopâ€™ mu Rwanda.
Kayihura Chelsy utuye muri Denmark na we yasangije urubyiruko ibyiza byo kwitabira â€˜Itorero Indangamirwaâ€™ mu Rwanda, ababwira ko ryamufashije kwiga byinshi ku gihugu cye kandi yarushijeho kugikunda no gutegura neza imbere he hazaza.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Urubyiruko rutuye muri NorvÃ¨ge, Gatete Gilles, yabwiye abitabiriye iki gikorwa ko bagomba kwigirira icyizere.
Yitanzeho urugero ko ubwo yigaga, yari afite akazi ka buri munsi, ubu akaba afite Impamyabumenyi yâ€™Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza (Engineer) muri gaz na petrol, yiyongera ku yindi Mpamyabumenyi yâ€™Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya kaminuza mu byo gutunganya amazi; kandi akaba akomeje kwiga abangikanyije amasomo nâ€™akazi ke.
Gatete yasabye urubyiruko kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite muri NorvÃ¨ge.
Umunyamabanga wa mbere muri Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Burayi bwâ€™Amajyaruguru, ufite icyicaro mu Mujyi wa Stockholm muri SuÃ¨de, Umulisa Marie Elise, yashimiye abateguye icyo gikorwa, abatanze ibiganiro nâ€™urubyiruko rwitabiriye.
Yasabye urubyiruko kumenya no gukurikiza indangagaciro Nyarwanda aho ruri muri NorvÃ¨ge.
Ati â€œGukurikiza ibi bizatuma mugera kuri byinshi byiza mukeneye kugira ngo mugire ejo heza, ari nabyo ababyeyi nâ€™igihugu cyacu u Rwanda kibategerejeho kandi kibifuriza.â€
Yakomeje abasaba kumenya ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda ku bataruzi nkuko biririmbwa mu ndirimbo yubahiriza igihugu aho mu gika cya kabiri ikomoza ku muco uhuriweho uranga abenegihugu, ururimi rukabahuza, ubwenge umutima amaboko bikarukungahaza bikwiye, rugatera imbere ubutitsa.
Umulisa yasabye urubyiruko kubizirikana, kandi buri wese mu bushobozi bwe agakomeza guhuriza hamwe imbaraga na bagenzi be, mu rwego rwo kurushaho kubaka u Rwanda rwifuzwa.
Yibukije urubyiruko ko rufite ubuyobozi budahwema kuruzirikana muri gahunda zitandukanye, atanga urugero rwâ€™Itorero Indangamirwa, anarushishikariza kuryitabira.
Ku musozo wâ€™ibiganiro, urubyiruko rwakoze igikorwa cyo kwitoramo abayobozi ndetse abitabiriye iyi gahunda baranasabana.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu rugendo rwo mu bwato rwâ€™amasaha 23, barasabana
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rwâ€™amasaha 23.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rwâ€™amasaha 23.
Ubwato buhagura saa moya zijoro bukazagaruka aho bwahagurukiye saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba zâ€™undi munsi.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de, kugira ngo bongere bahure bose umwaka utararangira, barebe ibyakozwe, aho bagifite intege nke bafashanye kuzongera ndetse basabane banifurizanye iminsi mikuru myiza ya Noheli nâ€™ubunani.
 Uyobora umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri iki gihugu, Madamu Gloria Sebalu, yabwiye IGIHE ko icyo gikorwa cyitabiriwe bishimishije, avuga ko hatangiwe ibiganiro byiza bitandukanye.
Mu biganiro byatanzwe harimo ikigaruka ku gukunda igihugu bakomokamo, gusigasira umuco nyarwanda ndetse nâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda. Hanatanzwe ibiganiro binyuranye bigaragaza uko bashora imari mu gihugu ndetse nâ€™ikiganiro kigisha uko bakwiteza imbere mu buryo bufatika mu gihugu barimo cy SuÃ¨de.
Muri uru rugendo rwâ€™ubwato kandi habayeho no gusabana banasangira amafunguro anyuranye ategurwa muri ubwo bwato .
Mu gusoza uyu mwaka kandi hateguwe umunsi wâ€™ubusabane wâ€™abana, wabereye ahitwa Leos Lekland, haba imikino itandukanye yâ€™abana.
Umuryango wâ€™abari nâ€™abategarugori batuye muri SuÃ¨de nibo bateguye iki gikorwa cyâ€™ubusabane, akaba ari nabo bayoboye gahunda yo kwigisha ururimi nâ€™umuco.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu bihugu bihugu byo mu Majyaruguru yâ€™u Burayi, Nkulikiyinka Christine, aganiriza abana bari bitabiriye uwo munsi, yabasabye gukomeza kwiga ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda asaba ababyeyi kujya bavugisha abana mu rugo mu Kinyarwanda, bityo bakabunganira ku byo baba bize.
Yagize ati â€œUmwana ntajye avuga Ikinyarwanda ari uko yagiye kukiga rimwe mu kwezi, ntibyaba bihagije ngo akimenye ababyeyi muramutse mutabunganiye.â€
Yasabye abari bahari batajya muri iyo gahunda yo kwiga Ikinyarwanda no kubyina kinyarwanda ko bajya bitabira ndetse abasaba ko babwira abatari baje uwo munsi ibyiza byo kwiga ururimi rwacu no gusigasira umuco.
Abana bishimiye kuba barahuye uwo munsi bagakina, ariko kandi bavuga ko guhura biga Ikinyarwanda byatumye bamenyana baba inshuti, bituma bishimira cyane kwitabira ibikorwa bihuza Abanyarwanda no kumenya igihugu cyabo kurushaho.

Title: Amb. Habimana Saleh yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite
Body:
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bwami bwa Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri icyo gihugu kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yose bafite, abasezeranya ko igihugu cyabo kibari hafi kandi kizakomeza kubafasha.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bwami bwa Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri icyo gihugu kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yose bafite, abasezeranya ko igihugu cyabo kibari hafi kandi kizakomeza kubafasha.
Ni ikiganiro yagiranye nabo ku mugoroba wo ku wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, cyitabirwa nâ€™abiganjemo abanyeshuri biga mu murwa mukuru Rabat. Ni ikiganiro cyabaye ingirakamaro, gihurirana nâ€™uko Abanyarwanda bari bakoraniye mu nama yâ€™igihugu yâ€™umushyikirano, bungurana ibitekerezo ku iterambere ryâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Amb Habimana yabahaye impanuro zitandukanye, anabasezeranya ko nubwo biga kure yâ€™igihugu cyabo batari bonyine.
Yibanze ku kubaganiriza ku mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, ababwira imibereho yâ€™Abanyarwanda bo hambere kugeza ku mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ariko abibutsa ko amateka mabi u Rwanda rwanyuzemo yarangiye.
Yagarutse kuri gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda, ashimangira ko igamije gukumira no kurwanya amacakubiri aho ava akagera. Amb. Habimana yabagaragarije ko bagomba guharanira kuba umwe, bikabafasha kugera ku zindi ntego zikomeye zo kwiteza imbere no guteza imbere igihugu.
Yabibukije inshingano zabo nkâ€™Abanyarwanda
Mu gice cya kabiri cyâ€™icyo kiganiro, Amb Habimana yibanze ku ruhare rwabo nkâ€™Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc, abashishikariza kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite yo kwiga muri iki gihugu.
Yabakanguriye kwirinda ibishuko byabayobya, ahubwo ko bakwiriye gukomeza kugendera ku ndangaciro nâ€™umuco nyarwanda, bikabafasha gukora cyane mu masomo yabo no mu bindi bakora.
Yahise abagenera ishimwe rizajya rihabwa buri mwaka umunyeshuli uzajya ahiga abandi mu byo yiga.
Yabasabye kandi gushyira ingufu mu gufatikanya amasomo yabo nâ€™umuhate wo kumenya indimi, anabakangurira kwita cyane Icyarabu gikoreshwa muri Maroc, cyane ko u Rwanda rurimo kwagura umubano nâ€™ibindi bihugu byâ€™abarabu.
Ni ikiganiro Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc bishimiye, ndetse bashimangira ko bazakomeza kuzirikana inshingano zabo, bakaba indashyikirwa mu byo bakora.

Title: Neretse Fabien yakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 25
Body:
Urukiko rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Urukiko rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Uyu mwanzuro watangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019.
Ubushinjacyaha bwari bwasabiye Neretse gufungwa imyaka 30 ariko Urukiko rutegeka ko afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha yaregwaga.
Ku wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza, Urukiko Mpanabyaha rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi rwaburanishije Neretse, rwamuhamije icyaha cya Jenoside nâ€™ibyaha byâ€™intambara.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 byâ€™intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Neretse yari akurikiranyweho ibikorwa byâ€™ubwicanyi mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi i Nyamirambo no mu Mataba mu yahoze ari Komini Ndusu mu Ruhengeri hagati ya 6 Mata 1994 na 14 Nyakanga 1994.
Yarezwe gushishikariza abasirikari kwica Abatutsi, aho 13 biciwe i Nyamirambo. Yanashinze Umutwe wâ€™Interahamwe mu Mataba, awuha intwaro mbere yo kugaba ibitero ku Batutsi, ariko anabaha ibihembo byâ€™amafaranga.
Icyemezo cyâ€™Urukiko rwa Bruxelles cyo gukatira Neretse imyaka 25 gifite umwihariko kuko ni ubwa mbere u Bubiligi bukurikiranye bukanahana icyaha cya Jenoside hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana.
Mbere ya Neretse, hari Abanyarwanda baburanishijwe nâ€™inkiko zâ€™u Bubiligi hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana ibyaha byibasira inyokomuntu nâ€™ibyâ€™intambara.
Urubanza rwe rwaranzwe nâ€™amagambo ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yavuzwe nâ€™uwunganira Neretse, Me Jean Flamme, aho abari mu rubanza, harimo nâ€™abacamanza basanze arengera avuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri.
Kuva mu ntangiriro yâ€™urubanza rwa Neretse, umwunganira, Me Flamme yakoresheje imvugo ihakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi avuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri. Uyu mugambi we kandi watumye atumira mu rubanza abantu basanzwe bazwiho kuyihakana nka Judi Rever, Joseph Matata, Johann Swinnen nâ€™abandi.
Intego ye kwari ukwerekana ko nta Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yabayeho, ko rero uwo yunganira nta ruhare abifitemo kuko icyaha akurikiranyweho kitabayeho.
Iyi mvugo yatangaje benshi mu rukiko bituma umucamanza asaba uwunganira Neretse kuyirinda. Flamme azwiho kuba umuhakanyi nkâ€™uko yabigaragaje mu rubanza rwa Tharcisse Renzaho yunganiraga.
Neretse yanashyizeho itsinda ryagombaga gutanga ruswa kugira ngo abatangabuhamya bamushinjure, atanga imirima nâ€™amafaranga.
Urubanza rwa Fabien Neretse wâ€™imyaka 71 rwatangiye mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ryâ€™abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja nâ€™ubumushinjura. Nyuma yâ€™iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers nâ€™umugabo we IsaÃ¯e Bucyana nâ€™umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma yâ€™iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Neretse afite iminsi 15 yo kujuririra umwanzuro wâ€™Urukiko rwa Bruxelles.
Izindi nkuru wasoma:

Â 	CNLG yashimye icyemezo ku rubanza rwa Neretse, icyita ugutsindwa ku bahakana Jenoside

Title: Urukiko rwo mu Bubiligi rwahamije Neretse Fabien ibyaha bya Jenoside
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, nyuma yo gusesengura ibyatangajwe nâ€™impande zombi, Urukiko rwa Bruxelles rwatangaje ko Neretse Fabien ahamwa nâ€™ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, nyuma yo gusesengura ibyatangajwe nâ€™impande zombi, Urukiko rwa Bruxelles rwatangaje ko Neretse Fabien ahamwa nâ€™ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 byâ€™intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Mu byaha yahamijwe nâ€™urukiko birimo ubwicanyi yakoze, gushishikariza abantu kwica, kurema umutwe wâ€™abicanyi nâ€™ibindi yakoreye mu Mujyi wa Kigali nâ€™i Mataba.
Umunyamategeko uhagarariye abakorewe Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Me. Karongozi AndrÃ© Martin, yabwiye IGIHE ko ibyaha byose yarezwe byamuhamye.
Yavuze ko bishimiye ko icyaha cya Jenoside yaburanye ahakana mu gihe gisaga ukwezi urubanza rwari rumaze cyamuhamye.
Ati â€œIkintu cya mbere twishimiye, ni uko icyaha cya Jenoside cyongeye gushimangirwa, ku muntu wayihakanye kuva urubanza rwatangira kugera rurangiye.â€
Mu iburanisha ryâ€™uru rubanza, Neretse nâ€™abamwunganira bakunze kugaragaza ko mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside ebyiri zirimo iyakorewe Abahutu nâ€™iyâ€™Abatutsi ndetse mu riheruka abanyamategeko be banongeyeho iya gatatu ngo yabereye muri Congo Kinshasa.
Me. Karongozi yasobanuye ko mu bantu yashinjwaga kwica, babiri aribo urukiko rutamuhamije kugira uruhare mu rupfu rwabo.
Ati â€œIcya kabiri ni uko ibyaha byose bamureze, byamuhamye uretse gusa abantu babiri barimo Ildephonse waherekeje umwana wari wakomeretse akicirwa kuri bariyeri ngira ngo ni hafi ya Kiliziya Charles Lwanga. Ntibavuze ko ari Neretse kuko ataguye aho barasiye abandi, undi ni uwitwa Rutonesha Sixbert, we yari yihishe mu gisenge cyâ€™inzu ariko nyuma avamo aza kugwa ahandi bavuga yuko yaguye mu bafurere bâ€™Aba-Jesuites i Nyamirambo, ni abo bonyine.â€
Me. Karongozi yavuze ko ari ubwa mbere bibaye mu Bubiligi guca urubanza mu bushishozi nkâ€™ubwo babonye.
Ati â€œKu bindi byaba byose, ibyâ€™i Kigali, abantu yishe, ibyâ€™i Mataba harimo bariya bantu barimo abitwa Mpendwanzi na Nzamwita, ariko cyane cyane nâ€™umubare wâ€™abantu batazwi, biciwe i Mataba. Bivuze ngo perezida asobanuye ko icyemezo cyo kwica abantu, bâ€™Abatutsi kiraturuka no kuri abo bantu bose yagiye yica, interahamwe yari afite amagambo yabwiraga abantu aho yacaga byose yabisobanuye neza ni ubwa mbere bibaye mu Bubiligi.â€
Yavuze ko nkâ€™abanyamategeko batazura inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ariko nibura babona ko batabibagiwe kuko babonye ubutabera.
Yashimye abarokotse bemeye kubaha ububasha bwo kubahagararira ndetse kuri we asanga akazi kakozwe karatanze umusaruro.
Ku wa Kabiri tariki 17 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo urukiko rwari rwasoje kumva abarega nâ€™abaregwa ubwo humvwaga abaregera indishyi, nâ€™uruhande rwâ€™abunganira Neretse mbere yâ€™uko rwiherera rusuzuma ishingiro ryâ€™uko buri ruhande rwireguye.
Perezida wa Ibuka MÃ©moire & Justice, Ryamukuru FÃ©licitÃ©, yabwiye IGIHE ko yashimye ubutabera bwâ€™u Bubiligi avuga ko umwanzuro wâ€™urukiko ubahaye kuruhuka nkâ€™abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ati â€œBiraturuhuye, kuko twategereje amasaha ahagije, iminsi ibiri yari imaze kurenga, twibazaga aho biri bubere ariko biraturuhuye kuko ntabwo yashoboraga kuba umwere ibyaha byose byamuhamaga ibyaha byâ€™intambara ariko icyiza ni uko icyaha cya Jenoside nacyo kimuhamye. Birerekana ubutabera bwo mu Bubiligi nabwo bwakoze umurimo ukomeye.â€™â€™
Yavuze ko guhamwa nâ€™icyaha hari icyo bisobanuye no ku batekerezaga guhakana Jenoside.
Ati â€œUmuntu umwe uhamwe nâ€™icyaha cya Jenoside ni ukuvuga ngo iba yemewe kandi biruhura nâ€™abacitse ku icumu nubwo bitagarura nâ€™umuntu nâ€™umwe ni ubutabera bugaragaje umurimo wabwo.â€
Biteganyijwe ko urukiko ruzatangaza ibihano ku byaba Neretswe yahamijwe ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019.
Uru rubanza rwa Fabien Neretse wâ€™imyaka 71 rwatangiye ku wa 4 Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ryâ€™abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja nâ€™ubumushinjura. Nyuma yâ€™iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers nâ€™umugabo we IsaÃ¯e Bucyana nâ€™umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma yâ€™iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Beckers nâ€™umuryango we bashatse uko bahunga bakava aho bari batuye, kuwa 9 Mata 1994 bajya ku Ngabo za Loni zari mu Rwanda, bahagarikirwa kuri bariyeri bararaswa. Bikekwa ko Neretse ari we wagize uruhare mu ihagarikwa rya Beckers nâ€™umuryango we ndetse akaba yaranagize uruhare mu rupfu rwâ€™abandi bantu icumi bari baturanye .
Aregwa kandi ubwicanyi yakoreye iwa mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Ruhengeri ahitwa i Mataba barimo Mpendwanzi bivugwa ko yagiye kumushaka mu rugo rwe amushinja kuba icyitso cya FPR Inkotanyi nubwo yari Umuhutu.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 byâ€™intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Karirima Ngarambe / Palais de Justice Bruxelles

Title: U Bwongereza: Umunyarwandakazi bikekwa ko yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitabye Imana
Body:
Gatera Cynthia wabaga mu Mujyi wa Nottingham mu Bwongereza yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitaba Imana.
Gatera Cynthia wabaga mu Mujyi wa Nottingham mu Bwongereza yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitaba Imana.
Gatera yaguye mu Mujyi wa Birmingham ku wa Gatandatu, tariki ya 14 Ukuboza 2019, aho yari yasuye inshuti yâ€™umuryango wabo yitwa Eric Gashema.
Uyu mukobwa wâ€™imyaka 31 yageze i Birmingham ku wa Kane, aho yari afitanye gahunda na Gashema yo kujyana mu masengesho.
Gashema yagiye gutabara inshuti ye yapfushije umubyeyi mu Mujyi wa Manchester, ariko ntibajyana, uwo mukobwa aguma mu rugo.
Uyu yerekeje i Manchester nyuma yo gusangira ifunguro rya mu gitondo na Gatera wari umeze neza, wanamusabye kumusigira ibitabo ngo abe asenga.
Amakuru Polisi yo muri ako gace yahawe nâ€™umuturanyi ni uko Gatera yaguye hasi ahagana saa Moya nâ€™igice zâ€™umugoroba. Yari asanzwe afata imiti yâ€™indwara yâ€™agahinda gakabije izwi nka â€™dÃ©pressionâ€™.
Gashema ngo yageze aho yari atuye ahagana saa Yine asanga polisi yahagose, aza kwemererwa kugera mu igorofa rya 19 yabagamo, ahageze asanga idirishya rifunguye ariko Gatera atarimo.
Uyu musore yarebye hasi abona hashyizweho amahema ya Polisi, ahita ajya kubaza aza gusanga ari Gatera witabye Imana.
Umurambo wa Gatera wari ugihari ariko yaba Gashema nâ€™ababyeyi ba nyakwigendera [bahageze saa Sita] ntibabashije kuwubona kugeza utwawe na Polisi ahagana saa kumi zo mu rukerera rwo ku Cyumweru.
Amakuru yizewe IGIHE ifite ni uko Gatera yari amaze igihe kirekire afite dÃ©pression ndetse yafataga imiti ku buryo yari yaratangiye kumererwa neza yiteguraga no gusubira ku ishuri.
Gashema asanzwe ari inshuti nâ€™umuryango wa Gatera, baragenderanira kuko bubatse ubucuti akiri mu Burundi.
Gatera yabyinaga mu itorero aho yanatumirwaga muri gahunda zitandukanye za Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda. Yatangiye kubyina afite imyaka itatu aho yanyuze muri Troupe Urunana yo mu Busuwisi.
DÃ©pression ni indwara irangwa nâ€™agahinda gakabije no kwiheba. Ishobora gufata uwo ari we wese, ku myaka iyo ariyo yose kandi iyo itavuwe ishobora gutuma uyirwaye afata imyanzuro yo kwiyambura ubuzima.
Iyo iyi ndwara itavuwe kandi igira ingaruka zikomeye ku bukungu ndetse nâ€™imibereho muri rusange kuko uyirwaye adashobora kugira icyo yimarira cyangwa ngo agire icyo akora cyamuteza imbere.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomera ku bumwe, barwanya abahakana Jenoside
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Babisabwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa bifatanyaga nâ€™Isi kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuhango wo kwibuka wahurije hamwe abanyarwanda basaga 550 baba mu Bushinwa hakoreshejwe uburyo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, James Kimonyo mu ijambo rye , yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa kurangwa nâ€™indangagaciro zâ€™ubwitange zaranze ingabo za RPA, ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ambasaderi Kimonyo yasabye abari bamukurikiye gukomeza kwimakaza ubumwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™ihakana ryayo.
Yasabye umuryango mpuzamahanga gufatanya nâ€™u Rwanda mu kugeza imbere yâ€™ubutabera abakidegembya bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Muri uyu muhango wo kwibuka, humviswe ubuhamya bwa Ntezimana Jean NÃ©pomucÃ¨ne warokotse Jenoside kuri ubu wiga mu Bushinwa, wavuze ku rugendo rwe mbere, muri Jenoside na nyuma yayo.
Ntezimana uri kwiga ibijyanye nâ€™ubuvuzi bwâ€™imbere mu mubiri yashimiye ingabo za RPA zamurokoye na Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yagaruriye icyizere abarokotse Jenoside, ibafasha mu kubaka ejo hazaza heza.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Buyapani bibutse Jenoside, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe byâ€™icuraburindi.
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe byâ€™icuraburindi.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu Buyapani bifatanyaga nâ€™Isi mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ubusanzwe ibikorwa byo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Buyapani byahurizaga hamwe abanyarwanda, inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™abayobozi muri Guverinoma yâ€™u Buyapani.
Uyu mwaka ibikorwa byo kwibuka biri gukorwa mu buryo bwihariye kubera ingamba zafashwe zo gukangurira abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, hahashywa icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda i Tokyo yahisemo gukora ibikorwa byo kwibuka mu buryo bwâ€™ikoranabuhanga (video conference).
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buyapani, Ernest Rwamucyo mu ijambo yagejeje ku banyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zarwo mu Buyapani yagarutse ku mateka mabi yagejeje u Rwanda kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko kwibuka ari ngombwa â€œkuko biduha umwanya wo kwibuka abacu bambuwe ubuzima. Tuboneraho umwanya wo kwihanganisha abarokotse Jenoside nâ€™ubu bagifite ibikomere byaba ibigaragara ku mubiri ndetse nâ€™ibitagaragara.â€
Rwamucyo yavuze ko kwibuka ari umwanya wo gusubiza agaciro nâ€™icyubahiro abazize Jenoside bambuwe ubwo bicwaga urwâ€™agashinyaguro.
Yavuze ko ari nâ€™umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda nâ€™isi muri rusange kwirinda ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside nâ€™ihakana nâ€™ipfobya bya Jenoside.
Ati â€œBiduha umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda, abatuye isi ndetse nâ€™imiryango mpuzamahanga kuzirikana ububi bwâ€™ingengabitecyerezo ya Jenoside, ingaruka mbi zo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside ndetse no kubashishikariza kwamagana ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ryaba irishingiye ku turere, amoko, amadini, cyangwa ibindi byose bishobora gutandukanya abantu.â€
Mu myaka 26 ishize, u Rwanda rwagiye rwiyubaka haba mu mibereho yâ€™abaturage nâ€™iterambere muri rusange.
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yashimye umuhate wâ€™ingabo zari iza RPA zahagaritse Jenoside, igihugu kikabona umusingi wo kubakiraho kigana imbere, ubu kikaba gikataje mu bumwe nâ€™ubwiyunge bwâ€™abanyarwanda, ukwisanzura kwa buri munyarwanda, umutekano nâ€™imiyoborere myiza.
Yashishikarije urubyiruko gutanga umusanzu warwo mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu.
Ati â€œMwebwe rubyiruko rwacu, mboneyeho umwanya wo kubakangurira gukunda igihugu cyababyaye. Kwitangira kubaka amateka meza mushyigikira umurongo wa politike nziza yubaka igihugu cyacu.â€
â€œByâ€™umwihariko mwebwe muri hano nkâ€™urubyiruko rufite ubumenyi bwihariye nâ€™imyumvire igomba kuba ihanitse murasabwa byinshi.â€
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yanasabye abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda gukomeza gufata mu mugongo abarokotse Jenoside muri ibi bihe bikomeye.
Ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside bizakomeza muri iki Cyumweru cyo kwibuka mu bihugu birimo Abanyarwanda barebererwa na Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buyapani. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 8 Mata hazibuka Abanyarwanda baba muri Philippines naho kuwa Gatanu tariki 10 hibuke abanyarwanda baba muri Malaysia.

Title: Rwandacash Africash yakoze impinduka muri serivisi zo kohererezanya amafaranga
Body:
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Sosiyete itanga serivisi ku bohereza amafaranga mu Rwanda no mu mahanga ya Rwanda Cash LTD yagaragaje ko yakomeje gukora ariko yifashishije uburyo bugezweho kandi bwizewe bwo guhererekanya amafaranga bwa mobile money.
Mu Bubiligi, ibiro byose bya Moneytrans-Africash zikorana na Rwandacash LTD byahawe uburenganzira bwo gufungura no kwakira abantu hakurikijwe ingamba zatanzwe nâ€™inzego zibishinzwe.
Naho mu Rwanda, Rwandacash LTD yabaye ifunze nkuko amabwiriza yatanzwe na Banki Nkuru yâ€™Igihugu (BNR) abisaba kugeza ubwo hazatangwa andi avuga ku kongera gukora kwâ€™ibigo byohererezanya amafaranga no kuvunja.
Bitewe nâ€™amasezerano iyi sosiyete isanzwe ifitanye na MTN Rwanda binyuze muri Mobile Money, abakiliya bose bakira amafaranga mu Rwanda bayashyirirwa kuri Mobile Money gusa.
Itangazo ryayo yavuze ko â€œHari nâ€™ahongerewe imbaraga mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ku bohererezanya amafaranga kuri application ya https://www.moneytrans.eu/belgium/imoneytrans/.â€™â€™
Yanamenyesheje ko ishami rya Matonge i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo rizafungura nihamara kugaruka agahenge nyuma yâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Abashaka kohererezanya amafaranga bifashishije Rwanda Cash-Africash-Moneytrans bashyiriweho imirongo ya telefoni bashobora kubazaho andi makuru zirimo +32 2 227 18 20 ku bari mu Bubiligi na +250 788 35 87 87 ku bo mu Rwanda.
Ikwirakwira cya Coronavirus mu mpande zose zâ€™Isi ryahinduye imibereho ya muntu kugeza no ku ikoranabuhanga yifashisha mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Ubu imibereho yâ€™Isi yubakiye ku bukungu bushingiye ku kudahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020 ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi bitewe nâ€™uburyo umubare wâ€™abayandura wiyongera kuva yaboneka mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Coronavirus imaze guhitana abantu 45 334, mu gihe abayanduye bagera ku 903 799, muri bo 190 675 barayikize.

Title: Diaspora mu guhangana nâ€™ingaruka za Coronavirus: Icyifuzo cyâ€™Umunyarwanda uba muri Canada
Body:
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cyâ€™uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cyâ€™uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abagera kuri 19 ni bo bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa na Coronavirus. Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe ingamba nyinshi, aho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yashyizeho izindi nshya.
Ingamba nshya zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus zatangajwe na Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, zategetse ko abakozi ba leta bose nâ€™abikorera basabwa gukorera akazi mu ngo zabo keretse abatanga serivisi zâ€™ingenzi.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Kijuli yavuze ko izi ngamba ari ingenzi cyane kandi zizatanga umusaruro, akifuza ko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora bahabwa igisa nkâ€™impuruza bakwishyira hamwe bakazagoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka nâ€™izi ngamba cyane cyane abaryaga kuko bakoze uwo munsi â€˜nyakabyiziâ€™.
Ati â€œNkaba numva mfite igitekerezo cyâ€™uko Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga yakorana vuba na za ambasade zacu aho ziri hose zigashishikariza Abanyarwanda twese dutuye muri bino bihugu [nubwo nabo icyorezo cyabagezeho], bisa nâ€™aho bifite amikoro tukibumbira hamwe tugafasha abavandimwe bacu bazahura nâ€™ikibazo cyâ€™inzara.â€
Akomeza avuga ko abantu bagenda batanga nkâ€™amadolari 100$, 50$, 10$ gukomeza ariko icyo kintu cyo â€˜gutabara abavandimwe bacu kuko twese tuzi amikoro yâ€™ibihugu byacu byo muri Afurikaâ€™.
Kijuli wigeze kuba Perezida wa Diaspora muri Edmonton na Visi Perezida ku rwego rwâ€™Intara ya Canada, ahumuriza Abanyarwanda agira ati â€œTukaba tugira ngo tubakomeze ngo mushikame kandi nta kabuza iki cyorezo abanyarwanda tuzagitsinda.â€
Mu zindi ngamba Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe zirimo ko â€˜ubu imipaka yose irafunze, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha nâ€™abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe nâ€™amategeko, abo bose bakaba bazashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cyâ€™ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijweâ€™.
â€˜Ubwikorezi bwâ€™ibicuruzwa byinjira cyangwa bisohoka mu Rwanda burakomeza mu gihe ingendo hagati yâ€™imijyi nâ€™uturere twâ€™igihugu zitemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwaâ€™.
Nyuma yâ€™izi ngamba, Minisitiri wâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, yagarutse ku bantu barya kuko bakoze uwo munsi, abasaba gutekereza icyaba baramutse bagiye gushaka ayo mafaranga ariko ntibazabashe kuyabona kubera uburwayi; ahubwo abasaba gusaranganya na bagenzi babo muri bike bafite.
Minisitiri Prof Shyaka yatangaje ko Leta igiye kwishakamo ibisubizo bizafasha abantu barya ari uko bakoze ku munsi nâ€™abandi bafite amikoro make kugira ngo mu gihe cyo kwirinda Coronavirus batazicwa nâ€™inzara.
Ati "Hari ibizasaba nkâ€™igihugu ko abantu baba magirirane, niba hari urugo runaka rudafite icyo gusamura, tugomba kwishakamo ubushobozi ku buryo urwo rugo turwunganira kugira ngo abarurimo tutabarinda Coronavirus ariko bakicwa nâ€™inzara.â€™â€™
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro nâ€™inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyirwaye, cyane cyane mu kuramukanya abantu bahana ibiganza.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye i Burayi bahagaritse ibikorwa bibahuza mu kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu byâ€™ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo nâ€™umuti wo guhangana nâ€™iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu byâ€™ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo nâ€™umuti wo guhangana nâ€™iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo [pandÃ©mie] cyugarije Isi mu itangazo ryashyize hanze ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020.
Coronavirus imaze gukwirakwira mu bihugu 123 bitandukanye ndetse kugeza ubu abarenga 125 000 barayanduye mu gihe abasaga 5000 yabahitanye. Ibi byatumye mu bihugu bitandukanye hashyirwaho ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Ingamba zafashwe mu bihugu byinshi zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi nkâ€™imikino, ibitaramo, inama ndetse bimwe byafunze amashuri mato na za kaminuza kugeza igihe kitaramenyekana, amaduka nkâ€™uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
U Butaliyani ku wa 12 Werurwe 2020, bwafunze amaduka yose uretse ububiko bwâ€™ibiribwa na za farumasi, nkâ€™uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ryâ€™icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iki gihugu cyafunze amashuri, inzu zikorerwamo siporo, inzu ndangamateka nâ€™utubyiniro mu gihe na Shampiyona yâ€™igihugu mu mupira wâ€™amaguru [Serie A] nayo yahagaritswe. Abantu barenga ibihumbi 12 ni bo bamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Butaliyani, naho abagera kuri 830 yarabahitanye.
Ibihugu byâ€™i Burayi biri mu byugarijwe na Coronavirus yagize ingaruka ku bikorwa byari biteganyijwe, birimo nâ€™ibyâ€™Abanyarwanda.
Guhera mu ntangiriro za Werurwe 2020 hirya no hino mu Burayi hari hateganyijwe ibikorwa bitandukanye bisanzwe bihuza Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo buri mwaka.
Ibyo bikorwa bigizwe nâ€™amahuriro atandukanye, inama zari ziteganyijwe ku bava mu Rwanda bazikorera hirya no hino ku Isi, amamurikagurisha yâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™ingendo zari ziteganyijwe bijyanye nâ€™ibirori bibera muri Diaspora nâ€™ibindi.
Ingamba zafashwe nâ€™ibihugu byâ€™i Burayi zinubahirizwa nâ€™Abanyarwanda babibamo ndetse na bo mu kwirinda barabihagarika mu gukaza ubwirinzi.
Mu bikorwa byasubitswe byagombaga guhuza Abanyarwanda birimo ibyâ€™Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore ku Isi [ni igikorwa cyitabirwa cyane ko kigaragaza intambwe yâ€™u Rwanda mu gusubiza umugore agaciro no kumwubakiraho iterambere ryâ€™igihugu].
Kugeza magingo aya, Abanyarwanda baba mu Butaliyani, u Bufaransa, u Bubiligi, Budage, u Buholandi nâ€™ibihugu byo muri Scandinavie byasubitse ibyo birori.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26, Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ntibiramenyekana uko bizakorwa mu gihe iki cyorezo cyaba kigifite ubukana. Abahagarariye imiryango irengera inyungu zâ€™abarokotse Jenoside baracyarebera hamwe uko iki gihe bizagenda.
Guverinoma yâ€™u Bubiligi nayo yaraye iteranye ifata ibyemezo bikakaye aho amashuri abanza, ayisumbuye na za Kaminuza byafunzwe.
Kuva kuri uyu wa Gatanu kandi ahahurira abantu benshi hafunzwe usibye gusa amaduka yo guhahiramo azakomeza gufungura ndetse ibihumbi byâ€™abaturage byazindutse bijya guhaha ku buryo hanitabajwe abashinzwe umutekano mu kuborohereza.
Uretse imiryango yâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye mu mahanga yagizweho ingaruka zikomeye zo gusubika ibikorwa byayo, Coronavirus yanazahaje ibikorwa byâ€™ubukerarugendo kubera ihagarikwa ryâ€™ingendo.
Isuzuma ryâ€™Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutwara abantu nâ€™ibintu mu Kirere, IATA, ryerekanye ko ibigo mpuzamahanga bitwara abagenzi mu ndege bizahomba miliyari $113 Coronavirus nikomeza gukwirakwira.
Abaganga bagaragaza ko nubwo Coronavirus ari indwara ikomeye, ishobora kwirindwa byoroshye ariko ikanakwirakwira byoroshye. Gukaraba intoki no guhagarika kuramukanya byafasha mu kwirinda.
Umuganga Dr Soentens waganiriye na IGIHE yavuze ko umubare munini wâ€™abarwaye Coronavirus bakira ndetse ko abapfa babiterwa nuko ibikoresho byo kubaramira biba bike, bageze mu zabukuru cyangwa basanganywe izindi ndwara zikomeye zidakira.
Kugira ngo umuntu yandure Coronavirus ni uko uyifite ayiha undi mu buryo bwâ€™amatembabuzi ava mu mazuru cyangwa mu kanwa kâ€™uyirwaye, kuko yandurira mu myanya yâ€™ubuhumekero nubwo ishobora guca nâ€™ahandi. Ni nayo mpamvu umuntu wayanduye ahita ahabwa akato.
Iyo iyi virusi imaze kugera mu bihaha niho itura, ari nayo mpamvu ibuza abantu guhumeka neza bakarwara umusonga, ari nawo ubahitana.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia bizihije umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth
Body:
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwifatanyaga nâ€™Isi mu kwizihiza umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia nabo bifatanyije nâ€™icyo gihugu mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ukomeye.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwifatanyaga nâ€™Isi mu kwizihiza umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia nabo bifatanyije nâ€™icyo gihugu mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ukomeye.
Uyu muhango wo kwizihiza ibikorwa bya Commonwealth wabaye mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura muri Kamena, kwakira inama izahuza abakuru bâ€™ibihugu na za Guverinoma bigize Umuryango wâ€™Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza, CHOGM.
Ibirori byâ€™Abanyarwanda muri Australia byabereye mu mujyi wa Brisbane, aho bashimiwe uruhare rwabo mu gutanga urugero rwiza mu ruhando rwâ€™amahanga.
Ni ibirori ngarukamwaka bihagurutsa Abanyarwanda bâ€™ingeri zose; abana nâ€™abakuru bagahagarika ibikorwa byabo kugirango baserukire u Rwanda.
Abitabiriye ibi birori basusurukijwe nâ€™umuhanzi wâ€™umunyarwanda, Ras Banamungu umaze kumenyerwa muri ibi birori, afatanije nâ€™itsinda rye the Det-n-ators International, baririmba indirimbo bise â€œInkaâ€, irimo ubutumwa bwâ€™uko akunda igihugu cyamubyaye.
Ni ibirori byitabiriwe nâ€™abayobozi barimo Depite Paul de Jersey na Madamu we Kaye de Jersey, uhagarariye Umwamikazi muri Queensland, Umuvugizi wa Polisi ya Queensland, Barry Dinneen na Noela Oâ€™Donnell, Musenyeri Phillip Aspinall, Reverend Dr. Peter Catt, Bill Willcocks na Vicki Howard.

Title: Maroc yatangirijwemo igikorwa cyo gufasha urubyiruko rwâ€™Abanyarwanda guhanga udushya
Body:
Mu rwego rwo gufasha Abanyarwanda biga mu mahanga guhanga imirimo izabagirira akamaro nibava ku ntebe yâ€™ishuri, hatangijwe igikorwa cyiswe â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ kigamije gushyigikira imishinga yabo no kubahuza nâ€™ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda.
Mu rwego rwo gufasha Abanyarwanda biga mu mahanga guhanga imirimo izabagirira akamaro nibava ku ntebe yâ€™ishuri, hatangijwe igikorwa cyiswe â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ kigamije gushyigikira imishinga yabo no kubahuza nâ€™ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda.
Iki gikorwa cyatangirijwe muri Maroc ku wa 8 Werurwe 2020 cyahuriranye nâ€™ibirori byo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore.
Mu kiganiro bahawe hibanzwe ku gufasha Abanyarwanda guhanga udushya bakiri ku ishuri mu kwitegura kugana ku isoko ryâ€™umurimo no guhesha abandi akazi.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ikoranabuhanga mu Rugaga rwâ€™Abikorera (PSF), Ntare Alex, yabwiye abitabiriye igikorwa cyo gutangiza â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ ko bari guhaha ubumenyi bufite ireme bwazabafasha kwiteza imbere.
Yakomeje ati â€œNi igikorwa kizahoraho kigamije gushaka udushya no gufasha abari muri diaspora bafite imishinga bahanze. Twahereye ku banyeshuri kuko baba bafite aho bakorera, bafite abarimu nâ€™izindi nzego zibafasha nka kaminuza bashobora gukorana udushya twagirira u Rwanda na bo ubwabo akamaro.â€™â€™
Iki gikorwa cyatekerejweho nyuma yo kubona ko hari abakitinya kandi bafite ibikorwa byatanga impinduka mu buzima bwâ€™abenegihugu.
Ati â€œMu Rwanda twamaze kubona ko biri gukora kuko twatangije K-Lab na Fab Lab [inzu zihangirwamo imishinga yâ€™ikoranabuhanga]. Abari hanze hari icyuho ko nta muntu ubakurikirana.â€™â€™
Urubyiruko ruzatoranywa nyuma yo kugaragaza impano mu mishinga yâ€™ikoranabuhanga ruzahabwa ubufasha burimo ubwo guhuzwa nâ€™ibigo bitandukanye.
Ati â€œAbanyeshuri batazi gahunda zabafasha bigatuma batinya kugaruka, bakagira ubwoba bwo gutangiza udushya twabo bavuga ko ntacyo byamara, nta bushobozi bafite, nta nâ€™ubufasha babona. Turashaka kubakangurira no kubabwira ko hari ubufasha. Tugomba kubaba hafi ku buryo twabahuza na bagenzi babo cyangwa izindi nzego dusanzwe dukorana.â€™â€™
Ntare yifashishije urugero rwâ€™ikoranabuhanga rya Tap&Go ryatangiye kubyara amafaranga no kugirira akamaro abarihanze.
Mu 2015 nibwo Patrick Buchana Nsenga yashinze AC Group, ikigo kiri mu byâ€™imbere mu gutanga ibisubizo byâ€™ikoranabuhanga, birimo iryo kwishyura amafaranga yâ€™urugendo hakoreshejwe ikarita izwi nka Tap&Go.
Imibare yo mu 2019 igaragaza ko abantu bari bamaze gukoresha Tap&Go inshuro zirenga miliyoni 80 ndetse nibura ku munsi abagenzi bashobora kuyakoresha inshuro ibihumbi 250. Amakarita amaze gutangwa arenga miliyoni 1.5 mu gihe ifite aba-agents 311 baha serivisi abagenzi mu bice bitandukanye.
Mu butumwa bwe, Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasangije abitabiriye iki gikorwa uko bagera kuri byinshi bifashishije ubumenyi bafite.
Ati â€œNabaganirije ku ruhare rwâ€™umwari nâ€™umutegarugori ku ruhembe rwâ€™iterambere ryâ€™igihugu nkâ€™insanganyamatsiko yahawe Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Umugore nuko bahera ku gishoro gito bakagera kuri byinshi.â€™â€™
Abitabiriye â€˜Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challengeâ€™ basusurukijwe nâ€™urubyiruko rwâ€™abahungu nâ€™abakobwa bibumbiye mu itorero ribyina gakondo ryo muri Maroc.
Muri gahunda ya Guverinoma yâ€™imyaka irindwi izarangira mu 2024, biteganyijwe ko i Kigali hazubakwa ahantu hihariye hazafasha Abanyarwanda nâ€™abanyamahanga bafite impano zihariye kurushaho guhanga ibishya (Kigali Innovation City), gushyiraho Ikigega kigamije guteza imbere imishinga yâ€™ikoranabuhanga nâ€™ibindi.
U Rwanda na Maroc bifitanye umubano mwiza ushingiye ku ngeri nyinshi zirimo nkâ€™uburezi, aho magingo aya hari Abanyarwanda basaga 100 biga muri icyo gihugu, mu mashami arimo Ubuvuzi, Engineering nâ€™ibindi.
Mu minsi ishize, Ambasaderi Habimana yasuye ibigo byashyiriweho guhanga udushya mu ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda, birimo K Lab, asobanurirwa imikorere nâ€™umusanzu bimaze gutanga mu iterambere ryâ€™u Rwanda.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Mozambique bakoze umuganda mu Mujyi wa Maputo (Amafoto)
Body:
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda muri Mozambique ifatanyije na Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutaka nâ€™Ibidukikije nâ€™Umujyi wa Maputo, bakoze Umuganda rusange witabiriwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye Maputo, inshuti zabo nâ€™abaturage batuye ahitwa Mafalala aho umuganda wakorewe.
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda muri Mozambique ifatanyije na Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutaka nâ€™Ibidukikije nâ€™Umujyi wa Maputo, bakoze Umuganda rusange witabiriwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye Maputo, inshuti zabo nâ€™abaturage batuye ahitwa Mafalala aho umuganda wakorewe.
Abitabiriye umuganda wakozwe ku nshuro ya mbere muri Mozambique bageraga kuri 350, bazibuye ruhurura yâ€™amazi, basukura umuhanda witwa Rua de Timor, bakuraho nâ€™ibyatsi birebire byarengereye iyo ruhurura.
Igikorwa cyakozwe cyatumye amazi yari yararetse muri iyo ruhurura agatera indwara nâ€™umwuka mubi abahaturiye, yongera gutemba.
Abari bahagarariye Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutaka nâ€™Ibidukikije ndetse nâ€™abari bahagarariye ubuyobozi bwâ€™umujyi wa Maputo, bashimye igikorwa cyakozwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda ku bufatanye nâ€™abaturage bâ€™aho, bizeza ubufatanye no kugikangurira abandi.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Mozambique, Nikobisanzwe Claude, yasobanuye ko Umuganda ugaragaza umuco mwiza Abanyarwanda bafite wo gufatanya no gushyira hamwe mu bikorwa rusange byâ€™amajyambere, babungabunga ibidukikije, gusukura aho batuye ndetse hirindwa nâ€™indwara zâ€™ibyorezo.
Yashimiye abitabiriye umuganda bagaragaje urugero rwiza ku baturage ba Maputo, anabakangurira kuzitabira ari benshi umuganda utaha maze bakereka ubuyobozi nâ€™abaturage babakiriye muri Mozambique, ko bafatanyije bagira uruhare mu iterambere ryâ€™umujyi wa Maputo nâ€™igihugu muri rusange.
Abaturage ba Mozambique bitabiriye umuganda ari benshi bishimiye igikorwa cyo gusukura aho batuye, banashima ubwitange nâ€™umurava wakoranywe ndetse na Ambasade yawuteguye.
Uyu muganda washimangiye umubano mwiza hagati yâ€™u Rwanda na Mozambique, unaba uburyo bwo gusabana hagati yâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™abaturage ba Maputo.

Title: Itsinda ryâ€™Abanyarwandakazi baba mu Bubiligi riri mu bikorwa byâ€™ubugiraneza mu Rwanda
Body:

Abanyarwandakazi umunani baba mu Bubiligi barimo Depite muri Wallonie, JoÃ«lle KapompolÃ© unafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bari mu gihugu mu bikorwa byo gutera inkunga imishinga yâ€™Abanyarwandakazi isanzwe ikora ibikorwa bitandukanye byâ€™ubugiraneza.
Ni ibikorwa bamazemo iminsi kuva bagera mu Rwanda ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020, aho basuye imiryango itandukanye irimo uwitwa Nka Tabita ufasha abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye kubona irerero ugafasha nâ€™ababyeyi babo mu bikorwa byâ€™iterambere.
Indi miryango yasuwe nâ€™iri tsinda ni uwitwa Komeza Intambwe ufasha abakobwa babyariye iwabo kwigira, uboroza amatungo magufi nâ€™uwitwa Izere Mubyeyi ubarizwamo abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe basanzwe bafashwa na Uwitonze ClÃ©mentine [Tonzi].
Umuyobozi uhagarariye abagore muri Diaspora Rugali mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi akaba nâ€™umwe mu bagize iri tsinda, Uwamariya Goretti, yavuze ko iki gitekerezo bakigize nyuma ya Rwanda Day yabereye i Bon mu Budage maze batangira gukusanya inkunga bagamije kugira icyo bafasha abategarugori bo mu Rwanda batagize amahirwe nkâ€™ayabo.
Yavuze ko bahisemo abagore kubera ko basa nkâ€™abakiri inyuma mu bijyanye no kwigira.
Ati â€œMurabizi neza ko abagore aribo bakiri inyuma, baracyafite ibibazo mu byâ€™ubukungu hari bamwe batize ndetse hari abana bâ€™abakobwa batewe inda bakiri bato bibabuza gukomeza kwiga. Izo ni zimwe mu mpamvu zatumye dutekereza guhera ku badamu ariko nitubarangiza nâ€™abagabo nabo tuzabageraho.â€
Kuri Uwamariya ibi bikorwa bamazemo iminsi byaberetse ko umugore wo mu cyaro ashoboye mu gihe cyose yaba yahawe ubushobozi.
Ati â€œKuba twakoze iki gikorwa byaduhaye ishusho ya nyayo yâ€™umugore wo mu cyaro. Ni abagore bâ€™intwari, bafite imbaraga uramutse ubafashije kwifasha barazamuka vuba cyane, icyo bakeneye ni ukuba umuntu yabafata akaboko akabatinyura mbese bakigirira icyizere bikozwe hirya no hino umugore yazamuka vuba cyaneâ€
Nâ€™ubwo iri tsinda ritashatse gutangaza umubare wâ€™amafaranga ritanga muri ibi bikorwa buri muryango risuye riwusigira inkunga yâ€™amafaranga.
Imiryango yasuwe nâ€™iri tsinda yashimye iki gikorwa cyâ€™ubugiraneza yakorewe ivuga ko inkunga yahawe igiye kuyifasha kunoza ibyo yakoraga.
Umuyobozi wa â€˜Komeza Intambweâ€™, Kandutiye FranÃ§oise, yavuze ko inkunga yahawe nâ€™iri tsinda izamufasha kwagura ibikorwa byâ€™ubugiraneza umuryango we usanzwe ukorera mu Murenge wa Mageragere birimo koroza inkwavu abakobwa babyariye iwabo no kubaha amafaranga yo gutangira imishinga yâ€™ubucuruzi.
Ati â€œInkunga izadufasha cyane, harimo abo nka â€˜Komeza Intambweâ€™ twagiye dufasha ariko bagishaka gukomeza gutera imbere ariko tukaba nta bundi bushobozi twari dufite bwo guhita tubafasha gukomeza kugera aho bifuza kugera nonaha. Turumva iyo nkunga batugeneye izadufasha mu gukomeza gushyigikira iriya mishinga yabo twatangiranye kuko yari igeze ahantu heza ariko nta bushobozi bwo gukomeza kuyishyigikira.â€
Iri tsinda ryâ€™abagore baba mu Bubiligi ryagize umwanya wo kwicarana nâ€™abari nâ€™abategarugori baba muri â€˜Komeza Intambweâ€™ bumva aho bavuye naho bageze maze babagaragariza nâ€™imbogamizi bagihura nazo nabo biyemeza kubafasha kuzikemura.
Mungwarakarama Esther umwe mu bategarugori basanzwe bafashwa na Komeza Intambwe yavuze ko inkunga yâ€™iri tsinda izamushoboza kugira ibindi yakora binyuze muri uyu muryango asanzwe abarizwamo.
Ati â€œMu byâ€™ukuri nubwo dufite uyu mushinga wâ€™inkwavu tworojwe ariko hari ibindi tuzi gukora hari nâ€™ibyo dushoboye numva wenda hari ubushobozi hari icyo bamfasha bantera inkunga ngashobora no gukora ibindi.â€™â€™
Iri tsinda ryâ€™Abanyarwandakazi baba mu Bubiligi kandi ryasuye umuryango â€˜Izere Mubyeyiâ€™ usanzwe ufasha abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe, riwizeza kuzakomeza kuwufasha mu bikorwa byâ€™ubugiraneza ukora.
Ibikorwa byâ€™iri tsinda ryâ€™Abanyarwandakazi byashimwe nâ€™abayobozi bo mu nzego zâ€™ibanze barimo nâ€™Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wâ€™Umurenge wa Mageragere, Ntirushwa Christophe, wibukije abarigize ko amazi adakwiye gushyuha ngo yibagirwe iwabo wa mbeho.
Iritsinda kandi ryagize umwanya wo kubonana nâ€™abayobozi batandukanye mu Rwanda barimo Perezida wâ€™Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yâ€™u Rwanda, Umutwe wâ€™Abadepite, Mukabalisa Donatille nâ€™uwahoze ari Minisitiri wâ€™Uburinganire nâ€™Iterambere ryâ€™Umuryango, Nyirahabimana Solina aho baganiriye ku iterambere ryâ€™umugore nâ€™umwana wâ€™umukobwa muri rusange nâ€™amategeko abarengera.

Title: LiÃ¨ge: Abanyarwanda bashinze ishuri rifasha abana babo kwiga Ikinyarwanda nâ€™umuco
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera nâ€™abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa LiÃ¨ge mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda nâ€™umuco nyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera nâ€™abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa LiÃ¨ge mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda nâ€™umuco nyarwanda.
Tariki ya 16 Gashyantare IGIHE yanyarukiye mu mujyi wa LiÃ¨ge ahari abanyarwanda batari bake bagize Diaspora nyarwanda, DRB-Rugari LiÃ¨ge, itembera mu ishiri â€˜Umucoâ€™.
Iryo shuri ryatangiye mu mpera zâ€˜umwaka ushize wa 2019, bagamije kwishakamo ibisubizo no gufasha abana babo guhorana indangagaciro zâ€™umuco nyarwanda.
Twagirimana uyobora DRB-Rugari-LiÃ¨ge yavuze ko igikorwa batangiye kizafasha abana bâ€™abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga kunga ubumwe no gusigasira umuco nyarwanda.
Ati â€œTwagerageje kwishakamo uburyo ngo dushyireho iri shuri aho abana bacu bazajya bahurira bakiga Ikinyarwanda, umuco wâ€˜aho bakomoka, rikababera kandi ihuriro ryo kumenyana, kunga ubumwe no gusabana mu gihe bari no kwiga ibijyanye nâ€˜imbyino, indirimbo nâ€˜imihamirizo kuko nabyo nâ€˜igice cyâ€˜amasomo biga.â€
Twagirimana yavuze ko iyo abana bigishijwe ayo masomo barushaho gusobanukirwa amateka yâ€™u Rwanda no kuvuga neza Ikinyarwanda.
Ati â€œKugira ngo tubigereho habayeho ko ababyeyi babigiramo uruhare batanga umusanzu, ariwo uvamo ibikoresho byâ€˜imfashanyigisho, ubwishingizi bwâ€˜aho dukorera hagize habaye impanuka nâ€˜ibindi. Iki gikorwa gihuza abana nâ€˜ababyeyi babo, usanga bahahurira bagakina igisoro, bakaganira mbese nâ€˜ihuriro nâ€˜ishuri kuri twese.â€
 Uyu muyobozi avuga ko icyabagoye ari ukubona abarimu bafite ubumenyi bwifuzwaga kandi bagakorera ubushake, gusa ngo baje kubabona.
Muri iryo shuri harimo ibyiciro bitatu. Abana bafite kuva ku myaka itatu kugeza kuri itandatu biga ukwabo, abo kuva kuri irindwi kugeza ku myaka icumi bakajya ukwabo no kuva kva kuri cumi ukazamura.
Bahabwa amasomo kabiri cyangwa gatatu mu kwezi kuko biga icyumeru kimwe bagasimbuka ikindi bityo bityo.
Isaha ya mbere biga Ikinyarwanda, isaha ikurikiyeho bakiga kubyina bya kinyarwanda nâ€˜ibijyanye nâ€˜umuco nâ€™amateka yâ€˜u Rwanda.
Umwe mu babyeyi bagize ubuyobozi bwa DRB Rugari Liege, Sakumi Sylvie yagize ati â€œ Ikintu gishimishije cyane ni ukubona ukuntu abana babikunze bitabira batinuba. Iyo umwana wanjye akoze nkâ€˜agakosa nkamubwira ko muhanisha kutaza mu ishuri Umuco, ubwo ntiyongera gukosa kuko kuri bo gusiba ibyo byiza babonye ntibishoboka.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œHari nâ€˜abana bakubwira bati ko icyumweru kitagera ngo tujye mu Rwanda kuko kuri bo kuza kwiga mu ishuri Umuco ni ukuza mu Rwanda, ibi byose rero biratunezaza cyane bikaduha imbaraga zo gukomeza.â€
Umwana witwa TimothÃ©e Kwizera ufite imyaka icumi yavuze ko kumenya Ikinyarwanda kuri we ari inyungu.
Ati â€œNdanezerewe cyane kuko kwiga Ikinyarwanda ni ikintu nemereye bene wacu bari mu Rwanda, ko ngomba kukimenya ngo njye nganira nabo kandi iyo nje aha mpura nâ€˜abandi banyarwanda tukamenyana.â€
 Ishuri Umuco gahunda yaryo ni ugutangira saa kumi kugeza saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba.
Twagirimana yifuza ko amashuri nkâ€˜aya bishobotse buri duce twa DRB Rugari mu Bubiligi twabikora nkâ€˜umuhigo kuko asanga bifasha ababyeyi nâ€™abana.

Title: Abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Amerika bahawe imihigo yo kwesa
Body:
Ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika basinye imihigo yâ€™ibyo bagomba gukora mu mwaka wa 2020- 2021 ku isonga birimo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda no guhangana nâ€™abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika basinye imihigo yâ€™ibyo bagomba gukora mu mwaka wa 2020- 2021 ku isonga birimo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda no guhangana nâ€™abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Iyi mihigo yasinyiwe mu mwiherero ngarukamwaka wahuje abayobozi 27 ba za diaspora bahuriye Washington DC. Wigiwemo ibyateza imbere umuryango Nyarwanda nâ€™uruhare rwâ€™abo mu mahanga mu guteza imbere igihugu cyababyaye binajyanye nâ€™icyerekerezo 2050.
Perezida wâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda baba muri Amerika yashimiye abayobozi nâ€™abafatanyabikorwa babo bitabiriye uwo mwiherero wabaga ku nshuro ya gatandatu.
Babwiwe ko mu byo biyemeje umwaka ushize byo kongeraho RCA nshya eshanu mu rwego rwo kwegera Umunyarwanda ahari hose muri Amerika bawurengejeho bakaba uyu mwaka bawutangiye barashyizeho zirindwi.
Yagize ati â€œIntambwe twateye ntisubira inyuma kandi tuzakomeza kwegera Umunyarwanda aho ari hose muri gahunda izagera muri leta 50.â€™â€™
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Mukantabana Mathilde, yashimiye abayobozi ibikorwa byiza bakora mu kugaragaza isura nziza yâ€™u Rwanda.
Yabasabye gushyira hamwe kugira ngo biyubake kandi banigira hamwe icyateza imbere u Rwanda.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana yijeje ubufatanye bwa Ambasade mu gihe cyose bazayiyambaza.
Minisitiri wâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof Anastase Shyaka, yibukije abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda ko aribo bahanzwe amaso nkâ€™abareberera inyungu zâ€™intara ya gatandatu yâ€™u Rwanda.
Yakomeje ati â€œNimwe ba meya na ba guverineri mu ntara ya gatandatu. Mufite inshingano zo kumenya neza umubare wâ€™abaturage mufite bityo bikabafasha gufata ingamba zifatika no kwesa imihigo mukoresheje imibare nâ€™ibipimo bifatika.â€™â€™
Yabibukije ko bakwiye gushyira Ubunyarwanda muri byose kugira ngo binabafashe kugaruza intama zatakaye.
Muri uyu mwiherero hanabaye ibiganiro byagaragarijwemo intambwe imiryango yâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga (RCA) bagezeho biyubaka, uko bateza imbere ishoramari nâ€™izindi gahunda zigamije guteza imbere ubukungu bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™imibereho yâ€™abaturage.
Abawitabiriye bemeje ko mu mwaka wa 2020-2021 imihigo yahurijweho izatangirwa raporo kuri Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu.
Mu mihigo yasinyiwe harimo kugaragaza ubumwe nâ€™ubwiyunge muri za RCA no gushyira Ubunyarwanda imbere mu rwego rwo gucyura intama zatakaye, kurwanya abifuriza u Rwanda nabi nâ€™abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi; kongera imbaraga mu gukangurira Abanyamerika gusura u Rwanda binyuze muri gahunda yo kumenyekanisha ibyiza birurimo â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™, aha buri RCA izajya igaragaza ibyiza byâ€™u Rwanda binyuze mu mamurikagurisha yâ€™ubukerarugendo abera mu mijyi 27 ya Amerika; gushakira isoko ibicuruzwa bya Made In Rwanda mu isoko rya Amerika; kubaka ubucuti hagati yâ€™imijyi batuyemo nâ€™iyo mu Rwanda ndetse no kwigisha umuco, ururimi, imbyino nâ€™indangagaciro Nyarwanda.
Buri muyobozi yasabwe kuzatanga raporo yâ€™ibyakozwe nyuma yâ€™umwaka. Uyu mwiherero wasojwe abayobozi bifatanya nâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo mu gusengera u Rwanda no kururagiza Imana.

Title: USA: Minisitiri Shyaka yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gukomeza kuba umwe
Body:
Minisitiri wâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof Anastase Shyaka, yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gukomeza kuba umwe no guhorana u Rwanda ku mutima mu byo bakora byose.
Minisitiri wâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof Anastase Shyaka, yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gukomeza kuba umwe no guhorana u Rwanda ku mutima mu byo bakora byose.
Yabitangaje tariki 8 Gashyantare muri Leta ya Maryland, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu muhango ngarukamwaka wo gusengera u Rwanda uzwi nka Annual Rwanda Prayer Banquet wabereye muri Sheraton Hotel.
Ni ku nshuro ya 18 abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga, inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda bavuye mu bice bitandukanye bya Amerika birimo Washington DC, Maryland na Virginia nâ€™ahandi, bahura bagashimira Imana ibyo yagejeje kuri bo nâ€™igihugu cyabo, no kuyiragiza umwaka mushya.
Mu myaka 18 ishize, intego yâ€™uyu muhango wo gusengera u Rwanda iracyari ukuragiza Imana u Rwanda, gusengera abayobozi barwo, abaturage barwo, guteza imbere ubumwe, kwizera nâ€™urukundo.
Minisitiri Anastase Shyaka wari umushyitsi mukuru, yasobanuriye abari aho indangangaciro zigaragaraza umuyobozi mwiza kandi ukomeye, aboneraho umwanya wo gusaba abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga gukomeza kunga ubumwe no kuzirikana u Rwanda mu byo bakora byose.
Perezida wa Rwanda Prayer Banquet, Antoinette Kanyabutembo, yashimiye abitabiriye iryo sengesho rigamije kuragiza Imana u Rwanda, abasaba gusengera amezi make asigaye ngo icyerecyezo igihugu cyari cyarihaye cya 2020 kirangire no kuyiragiza icyerecyezo gishya 2050.
Umushoramari Dale Dawson uri no mu bajyanama ba Perezida Paul Kagame, yahishuye uburyo bwa mbere aza mu Rwanda yabitewe na Musenyeri John Rucyahana, yahagera akumva ahamagariwe gufasha abanyarwanda.
Yahise ashinga umuryango Bridge2Rwanda ufasha abanyeshuri bâ€™abanyarwanda bâ€™abahanga kubona uburezi mpuzamahanga no gukurura abashoramari kuza gushora imari yabo mu Rwanda. Guhera mu 2002, Dawson na Bridge2Rwanda bagize uruhare mu gutangiza no guteza imbere ubucuruzi butandukanye nâ€™indi mishinga igamije guteza imbere abaturage.
Umuyobozi wungirije wa Kaminuza yâ€™u Rwanda ushinzwe iterambere, Dr Charles Muligande yagarutse ku rugendo rwe ubwo yagarukaga mu Rwanda mu 1994 avuye i Washington DC , avuga ku ngorane igihugu cyahuye nazo nâ€™uburyo cyongeye kwiyubaka . Muligande kandi yavuze ko kwizera nâ€™agakiza aribyo byagiye bimuyobora mu mirimo yose yagiye ashingwa.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Mathilde Mukantabana yasabye umwanya wo gusengera abayobozi ba diaspora nyarwanda, abateguye ayo masengesho nâ€™abandi kugira ngo babashe gusohoza inshingano bahawe.
Uyu mwaka insanganyamatsiko yâ€™umuhango wo gusengera u Rwanda yari ijambo riboneka muri Zaburi igice cya 100:5 rivuga riti â€œKuko Uwiteka ari mwiza, Imbabazi ze zihoraho iteka ryose, Umurava we uhoraho ibihe byose.â€

Title: IBUKA France yabonye umuyobozi mushya
Body:
Nsanzimana Etienne yatorewe kuyobora Umuryango uharanira Inyungu zâ€™Abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Bufaransa (IBUKA France) asimbuye Dr Kabanda Marcel wari umaze igihe kitari gito awuyobora, wanashimiwe aho yarawugejeje.
Nsanzimana Etienne yatorewe kuyobora Umuryango uharanira Inyungu zâ€™Abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Bufaransa (IBUKA France) asimbuye Dr Kabanda Marcel wari umaze igihe kitari gito awuyobora, wanashimiwe aho yarawugejeje.
Umuyobozi mushya wa IBUKA France ifite icyicaro i Paris yemerejwe mu Nteko Rusange isanzwe yateraniye i Paris ku wa 8 Gashyantare 2020.
Iyi nteko yagaragarijwemo ibikorwa byakozwe mu 2019, byemejwe binatorwa ku bwiganze bwâ€™abayitabiriye. Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa IBUKA France, Ngaruye Ildephonse, yanagaragaje raporo ku mikoreshereze yâ€™amafaranga na yo yemejwe.
Inteko rusange yemeje Nsanzimana Etienne ku mwanya wa Perezida; Visi Perezida ni Jessica Mwiza GÃ©rondal; Ngaruye Ildephonse yongeye kugirwa Umunyamabanga Mukuru akaba yungirijwe na Munderere Enatha; Umubitsi ni Umugwaneza Gloriose na Kalisa Christian umwungirije. Aba bayobozi batorewe manda yâ€™imyaka itatu.
Inshingano Nsanzimana yahawe azazifatanya no kuyobora IBUKA Europe, kuko u Bufaransa aribwo bugezweho, bugomba kuyobora uwo muryango hashingiwe ku mitererere yawo igena ko ibihugu bisimburana ku buyobozi.
Ibuka-Europe ni ihuriro ryatangiye mu 2003, amasezerano yo gukora byemewe nâ€™amategeko ashyirirwaho umukono i Paris tariki ya 20 Ugushyingo 2010.
Nsanzimana wâ€™imyaka 45 atuye i Paris mu Bufaransa aho abana nâ€™umuryango we, umugore nâ€™abana babiri. Uyu mugabo yari amaze igihe kirekire ari umwe mu bagaragara bya hafi mu bikorwa bitandukanye bitegurwa na IBUKA, haba mu Burayi cyangwa mu Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Nsanzimana yavuze ko yishimiye icyizere yagiriwe cyo guhabwa inshingano zo kuyobora IBUKA France.
Yagize ati â€œNishimiye kuba natorewe kuba Perezida wa IBUKA France. Ndashimira Dr Kabanda wayoboraga uyu muryango ku bikorwa yawugejejeho. Ngiye gutera ikirenge mu cye. Nzakomereza aho yari ageze kuko yakoze ibikorwa bikomeye.â€™â€™
IBUKA France yatangiye kugirana ibihe byiza nâ€™iki gihugu. Umwaka wa 2019 wagaragaje agacu ko guhindura intekerezo ku ruhare rwâ€™u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no kwibuka ayo mahano nkâ€™uburyo bwo guha agaciro inzirakarengane zâ€™Abatutsi basaga miliyoni bambuwe ubuzima.
Mu 2019 u Bufaransa bwasohoye iteka rya Perezida wa Repubulika nÂ° 2019-435 ryo ku wa 13 Gicurasi 2019, rigena ko kuwa 7 Mata, ari itariki ngarukamwaka yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ingingo ya Mbere yâ€™iri teka ivuga ko â€˜Itariki ngarukamwaka yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ni 7 Mataâ€™.
Ingingo ya Kabiri ivuga ko â€˜Buri mwaka kuri iyi tariki, ibikorwa byo kwibuka bizajya bitegurwa i Paris. Ibikorwa nkâ€™ibi kandi bishobora gutegurwa kandi muri buri ntara bigizwemo uruhare nâ€™umuyobozi wayo [Perefe]â€™.
Ingingo ya Gatatu yaryo ivuga ko Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe afite inshingano zo gushyira mu bikorwa iri teka, rizasohoka mu igazeti ya leta ya Repubulika yâ€™u Bufaransa.
Iteka ryashyizweho rizafungura amarembo ku bikorwa byo kwibuka bizajya bitegurirwa i Paris nkuko bisanzwe ariko bikanagera mu zindi ntara.
IBUKA France yagaragaje ko iki cyemezo ari intangiriro nziza mu kongera kunoza umubano wâ€™impande zombi. Uyu muryango ufite inzibutso za Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, zirenze 10 mu Bufaransa.

Title: U Buholandi: Itsinda ryâ€™abanyarwanda mu rugendo shuri ku bikorwa byâ€™ubuhinzi bugezweho
Body:
Guhera tariki ya 3 kugeza tariki ya 9 Gashyantare 2020, Itsinda rigizwe nâ€™abantu 15 bavuye mu Rwanda, bagiriye urugendo shuri mu gihugu cyâ€™u Buholandi rugamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Guhera tariki ya 3 kugeza tariki ya 9 Gashyantare 2020, Itsinda rigizwe nâ€™abantu 15 bavuye mu Rwanda, bagiriye urugendo shuri mu gihugu cyâ€™u Buholandi rugamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Abagize iryo tsinda baturutse muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ubuhinzi nâ€™Ubworozi, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe ubuhinzi nâ€™ubworozi (RAB) no muri Minisiteri yâ€™Uburezi.
Urugendo shuri rukaba rwari rugamije kureba no kugereranya uko gahunda zâ€™u Rwanda zo gusangira amakuru, ubumenyi nâ€™ubuhanga mu buhinzi zihagaze ugereranyije nâ€™izo muri Leta yâ€™u Buholandi mu buhinzi kugira ngo habeho ubufatanye bwo guhindura no kujyana nâ€™imikorere igezweho mu bigo byigenga, ibya Leta, mu burezi hagendewe ku byo u Buholandi bwagezeho mu mu mikoranire yâ€™inzego zâ€™iterambere muri gahunda bwise â€˜Triple Helixâ€™.
Ubu buryo bwâ€™imikorere (The Triple Helix Model of Innovation), ni uburyo bwâ€™imikoranire bukoreshwa mu bashakashatsi muri za Kaminuza no mu bindi bigo bitandukanye, byaba ibya Leta yâ€™u Buholandi cyangwa ibyigenga, mu rwego rwo guteza imbere ubukungu nâ€™imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage.
Iri tsinda ryavuye mu Rwanda ryashoboye kandi kwibonera uburyo mbarutso u Buholandi bwashoboye guhindura imikorere nâ€™imikoranire ku buryo izo serivisi zo gutanga ubumenyi nâ€™amakuru mu buhinzi byavuye mu maboko ya leta bikajya mu maboko yâ€™abikorera mu buryo bwa tekiniki burambye kandi bwihagije mu ngengo yâ€™imari.
Ni uburyo mbarutso buboneye buzafasha kunoza gahunda ya Minagri yitwa â€˜Twigire Muhinziâ€™, igamije kuzakoreshwa mu kwagura ibikorwa byâ€™iterambere mu buhinzi bwitwa â€˜Customized Agriculture Extension System (CAES)â€™ mu Cyongereza.
Mu buryo bwimbitse rero iyi gahunda yari igamije kurebera hamwe uburyo habaho ubufatanye hagati yâ€™ibihugu byombi mu bihe biri imbere, kongera imbaraga mu buvugizi mu bijyanye na gahunda zâ€™ubuhinzi no gukomeza kongera ibibura ngo habeho ubumenyi bwifuzwa ku banyeshuri bajya kwiga mu Buholandi ibijyanye nâ€™ubuhinzi.
Abanyarwanda bagize iri tsinda bagize umwanya kandi wo gusura ahantu hatandukanye, ibiro bikuru bya Minisiteri yâ€™ubuhinzi mu Buholandi, Kaminuza yâ€™Ubuhinzi ya Wageningen nâ€™iya Van Hall Larenstein, Ikigo cyâ€™ubworozi cya Deventer, Ikigo mpuzamahanga cyâ€™ibirayi (World Potato City) mu mujyi wa Emmeloord, aha hakaba hazwi ko hera ibirayi cyane.
Basuye kandi ishuri tekiniki ryâ€™ubworozi (Dairy Campus) mu ntara ya Friesland izwi ku rwego mpuzamahanga mu kwigisha uburyo bugezweho bwo korora kijyambere hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga nka za mudasobwa.
Iyi gahunda yashobotse ku bufatanye bwa Minagri, Ambasade yâ€™u Buholandi mu Rwanda, RDB, RAB, RVO, NUFFIC nâ€™Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi.
Itsinda ryavuye mu Rwanda kandi ryakiriwe na Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi Jean Pierre Karabaranga nâ€™abakozi ba Ambassade, banahura nâ€™abanyeshuri bâ€™Abanyarwanda biga mu Buholandi byâ€™umwihariko abarimo bakurikira amasomo mu bijyanye nâ€™Ubuhinzi.
Baganiriye uko ibyo urugendo shuri rwagenze nâ€™uburyo bazajya babihererekanyaho amakuru buri muntu ku rwego rwe ngo bigirire u Rwanda akamaro.
