Title: U Bufaransa: Abanyarwanda bizihije Umunsi wâ€™Intwari, banakira Ambasaderi Ngarambe i Paris
Body:
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo batuye mu gihugu cyâ€™u Bufaransa kuri uyu wa Gatandatu bakiriye Ambasaderi mushya, Dr. FranÃ§ois Xavier Ngarambe banifatanya kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wâ€™intwari.
Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo batuye mu gihugu cyâ€™u Bufaransa kuri uyu wa Gatandatu bakiriye Ambasaderi mushya, Dr. FranÃ§ois Xavier Ngarambe banifatanya kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wâ€™intwari.
Ni nyuma yâ€™uko ambasaderi Dr. FranÃ§ois Xavier Ngarambe atanze impapuro zo guhagararira u Rwanda mu Bufaransa no mu biro bya Louise Mushikiwabo Umunyamabanga mukuru wâ€˜Umuryango mpuzamahanga wâ€™Ibihugu bivuga Igifaransa (OIF).
Ambasaderi Dr. Ngarambe ku mugaragaro yakiriwe nâ€˜ abanyarwanda nâ€˜ inshuti zabo batuye mu Bufaransa, umuhango wabereye i Paris mu nzu yâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™agace kâ€™Umujyi wa Paris yitwa â€™Mairie du 3e arrondissement de Parisâ€™.
Mu ijambo ryo guha ikaze Amb. Ngarambe, Uwase Angelique uyobora Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Bufaransa, yashimiye abanyarwanda nâ€˜inshuti zabo baje ari benshi kwakira bwa mbere ku mugaragaro Ambasaderi mushya waje guhagararira u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, no kwizihiriza hamwe umunsi mukuru wâ€˜Intwari.
Uwase yijeje ambasaderi Ngarambe ubufatanye kandi anamwereka Komite nshya baherutse gutora iyoboye Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Bufaransa, anifuriza abanyarwanda umwaka mushya muhire .
Amb. Ngarambe na we yafashe ijambo, ashimira abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa uburyo baje kumwakirana urugwiro.
Yagize ati â€œUyu munsi ntabwo uri uwo kuvuga amagambo menshi, ni uwo kwishimana. Nishimiye kubabona muri benshi tugasangira kandi tukifurizanya umwaka mushya muhire wa 2020. Igihe nitwe tukigena kwifurizanya umwaka nâ€˜ubu birashoboka.â€
Amb. Ngarambe yavuze ko bibaye mahire kuko bihuriranye nâ€˜umunsi mukuru ukomeye mu mateka yaranze u Rwanda mu bihe bishize, aho rwibuka kandi rugashimira Intwari zitanze ngo Abanyarwanda bagere aho bageze ubu.
 Ati â€œ Habayeho abagabo nâ€˜abagore bitanze bamwe bahasiga ubuzima bwabo. Uyu munsi ni uwo kubibuka bidasanzwe ahubwo dutera ikirenge mu cyabo.â€
 Amb. Ngarambe yababwiye urubyiruko kugera ikirenge mu cyâ€™intwari zâ€™u Rwanda, bahiga kudatatira icyo gihango.
Ati "Kwifurizanya umwaka mushya; dukwiriye guhiga ko tutazatatira igihango cyâ€™intwari zatwitangiye ari nazo dukesha uko turi uyu munsi; dukwiye kwiyemeza kandi birashoboka kuba intwari buri wese mu kigero cye mu nshingano ze. Twese duhuriza ku ntego yo kubumbatira ubumwe bwâ€™abanyarwanda, kubaka igihugu kigendera ku amategeko, igihugu gitekanye kandi gikungahaye kibikomora ku murimo wacu, igihugu cyasubiranye agaciro kacyo mu ruhando rwâ€™amahanga".
Yavuze ko inshingano yahawe azazikora neza, aha serivisi nziza abamugana bose ntawe aheje.
Pierre Aidenbaum uyobora ako gace kâ€™Umujyi wa Paris, na we mu ijambo rye yahaye ikaze Amb. Ngarambe, ati â€œMurisanga muri uyu mujyi nyobora, murisanga mu Bufaransa.â€
Umugoroba wanavugiwemo kandi uko abanyarwanda bo mu Bufaransa bakora igikorwa cya Connect Rwanda kigamije kugeza telefone zigezweho buri muryango mu Rwanda, bamwe bahava biyemeje kuyishyira mu bikorwa.
Ni umugoroba waranzwe nâ€˜ubusabane kandi witabiriwa nâ€˜abantu benshi bavuye mu nguni zose zâ€˜u Bufaransa. Bwabaye uburyo kandi bwo gukomeza guhanahana amakuru berekana ibikorwa bafite mu minsi iri mbere.
 Abahanzi barimo Ben Kayiranga nâ€˜ababyinnyi nâ€˜intore zo mu itorero Inyambo za Lille mu majyaruguru yâ€˜u Bufaransa basusurukije abitabiriye.

Title: Amb Masozera yasabye Abanyarwanda gukomeza kuba intwari kugira ngo bagere ku cyerecyezo 2050
Body:
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Kenya, Dr Richard Masozera, yavuze ko umunsi mukuru wâ€™intwari ari umunsi ukomeye ku banyarwanda aho bari hose, kuko ubafasha kwibuka abakoze ibikorwa bidasanzwe, ari nabyo bizafasha mu kugera ku cyerecyezo gishya, 2050.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Kenya, Dr Richard Masozera, yavuze ko umunsi mukuru wâ€™intwari ari umunsi ukomeye ku banyarwanda aho bari hose, kuko ubafasha kwibuka abakoze ibikorwa bidasanzwe, ari nabyo bizafasha mu kugera ku cyerecyezo gishya, 2050.
Ambasaderi Masozera yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa 1 Gashyantare 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba muri Kenya nâ€™inshuti zabo, bizihizaga umunsi wâ€™Intwari.
Uyu ni umuhango wabaye mu gihe Abanyarwanda hirya no hino bifatanyaga mu kwibuka Intwari zâ€™igihugu, no gukomeza kuzirikana akamaro kâ€™ubutwari mu iterambere ryâ€™igihugu.
Mu butumwa yatanze, Ambasaderi Dr Mosozera yibukije abari bitabiriye iki gikorwa ko mu gutangira uyu mwaka, ubutumwa umukuru wâ€™igihugu yatanze, yabwiye Abanyarwanda ko umwaka wa 2019 warangiye neza, akabasaba gukora ngo umwaka mushya uzabe mwiza kurushaho.
Yagize ati â€œPerezida wa Repubulika yavuze ko hari byinshi u Rwanda rwagezeho kandi tugomba kubyishimira, harimo umutekano wakomeje kugaragara mu gihugu, ubukungu bwiyongereye, imibereho yâ€™Abanyarwanda yateye imbere nubwo mu bice bimwe na bimwe habaye ibibazo biturutse ku ngaruka yâ€™ibiza, ibi byose bikaba byarakozwe kubera ubufatanye bwâ€™Abanyarwanda.â€
Masozera yavuze ko umunsi wâ€™ intwari ufasha abanyarwanda kwibuka abakoze ibikorwa bidasanzwe kugira ngo u Rwanda rube igihugu gikomeye kandi kirangwa nâ€™indangagaciro, ubumwe, gukora cyane kandi ugakora akazi kanoze, gukunda igihugu no kuba indakemwa.
Yavuze ko izi ndangagaciro ari ngombwa ko zivugwa zikanasubirwamo kenshi, cyane cyane kugira ngo hibutswe urubyiruko kutazigera ruzibagirwa kuko arizo zatumye u Rwanda rugera aho rugeze uyu munsi.
Ati â€œUyu munsi urubahirizwa aho abanyarwanda bari hose kugira ngo intwari zacu tuzubahe, tuzihe agaciro ariko na none dushimire ibyiza biri mu gihugu tunarebe imbere. U Rwanda dufite uyu munsi ni ukubera izi ntwari, ubu igihugu kimaze gutera imbere mu buryo bugaragarira Isi.â€
Yavuze ko uyu mwaka abanyarwanda batangiye, bari bafite icyerekezo 2020 kandi hari byinshi byakozwemo.
Yagize ati â€œYego ntabwo byose byagezweho ariko ibyinshi byateganyagwa byagezweho. Uyu munsi turavuga icyerekezo 2050, kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzakigereho ni uko indangagaciro zâ€™intwari zigomba gukomeza gushyirwa imbere.â€
Yavuze ko urubyiruko arirwo rusabwa cyane kugira uruhare muri iki cyerekezo.
Ati â€œIntwari zivuka buri munsi kandi ubutwari bugaragarira kuva mu bikorwa bito kugera ku bikomeye harimo nkâ€™abasirakare batanga cyangwa batanze ubuzima bwabo ku rugamba, tugomba kuzirikana ko intwari zatubanjirije zitanze kugira ngo buri munyarwanda yaba umugore, umwana cyangwa umugabo agire uburenganzira busesuye mu gihugu cye.â€
Yavuze ko mu gihe abantu bibuka intwari, batagomba kwibagirwa intwari zitazwi ziri mu bikorwa bitandukanye byâ€™ingirakamaro mu gihugu harimo abarimu, abaganga, abasirikare, ababyeyi nâ€™abandi.
Intwari zâ€™u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe nâ€™Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka FÃ©licitÃ© nâ€™Abanyeshuri bâ€™Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu nâ€™Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari nâ€™imwe irashyirwamo.

Title: USA: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah bizihije umwaka mushya (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata nâ€™ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata nâ€™ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Uwo muhango wabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 31 Mutarama 2020, ubera mu mujyi wa Salt Lake City muri Leta ya Utah. Witabiriwe na Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika Madamu Mathilde Mukantabana, abasenateri nâ€™abandi bayobozi muri Leta ya Utah.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana, yibukije Abanyarwanda gukomera ku ndangagaciro zabo ntibibagirwe aho bavuye kandi abasaba kuba ba ambasaderi bâ€™u Rwanda mu gihugu batuyemo.
Yagarutse kandi ku mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, yibutsa Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda aho igihugu cyavuye. Yavuze ko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igihugu cyasaga nkâ€™aho cyapfuye ariko bitewe nâ€™ubuyobozi bwiza ubu igihugu kiri ku myanya ya mbere mu bintu bitandukanye. Yatanze urugero rwâ€™umubare munini wâ€™abagore mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, kuza imbere mu korohereza ishoramari, kurwanya ruswa nâ€™ibindi.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana yasoje asaba Abanyarwanda gusigasira umuco wabo, no kudatakaza indanga gaciro zâ€™umunyarwanda.
Umuyobozi wa diaspora nyarwanda muri Leta ya Utah, Jean Claude Kamali yagaragaje ishusho rusange yâ€™abanyarwanda batuye muri iyo Leta, agaragaza ko hejuru ya 70% bagizwe nâ€™urubyiruko, aboneraho kubwira Abanyarwanda ko aribo mbaraga zâ€™u Rwanda ndetse nâ€™izâ€™igihugu batuye.
Kamali yagaragarije Ambasaderi Mathilde Mukantabana umubano mwiza bafitanye nâ€™inzego za leta, anashimira Guverineri wâ€™iyo ntara Gary Herbert , ko iyo hakozwe umunsi wo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, asohora itangazo ryo kwifatanya no gukomeza Abanyarwanda byâ€™umwihariko abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994.
Senateri Scott Howell yashimiye Ambasaderi Mukantabana kuba yagize uruzinduko muri Utah, anashimira Abanyarwanda byâ€™umwihariko umuco mwiza wo gushyira hamwe, abashishikariza gukomeza kwitabira gahunda za Leta batuyemo.
Uyu muhango wari witabiriwe nâ€™abantu barenga 250 barimo Abanyarwanda batuye Utah nâ€™inshuti zabo.

Title: CG Rwigamba na Bishop Rucyahana bagaragaje ipfundo ryâ€™ubutwari bwa RPA nâ€™ubwo mu gihe cyâ€™abami
Body:
Abanyeshuri bâ€™abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc basabwe kwigira ku bikorwa byâ€™indashyikirwa byaranze intwari zâ€™igihugu bubakiye ku muco waranze abanyarwanda kuva kera, bakiyemeza kuba intwari bahereye mu kubyaza umusaruro ibyo biga.
Abanyeshuri bâ€™abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc basabwe kwigira ku bikorwa byâ€™indashyikirwa byaranze intwari zâ€™igihugu bubakiye ku muco waranze abanyarwanda kuva kera, bakiyemeza kuba intwari bahereye mu kubyaza umusaruro ibyo biga.
Tariki ya 1 Gashyantare buri mwaka u Rwanda rwizihiza Umunsi wâ€™Intwari, hibukwa ibikorwa byâ€™indashyikirwa byaranze abantu batandukanye kugeza nâ€™ubwo bamwe bahara ubuzima bwabo bitangira igihugu nâ€™abagituye.
Komiseri Mukuru wâ€™Urwego rwâ€™Igihugu rwâ€™Imfungwa nâ€™Abagororwa, Gen George Rwigamba na Bishop Rucyahana John bahaye ikiganiro abanyeshuri bâ€™abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc bari bitabiriye umuhango wo kwizihiza umunsi wâ€™intwari.
Bombi bari muri Maroc aho bari bitabiriye inama nyafurika ku micungire yâ€™amagereza yabereye mu Mujyi wa Rabat, ikitabirwa nâ€™ibihugu bya Afurika 36. Yareberaga hamwe ibijyanye no kunoza imiyoborere yâ€™amagereza ndetse nâ€™imbogamizi mu byâ€™umutekano urwego rwâ€™amagereza ruhura narwo.
Mu kiganiro yatanze, Bishop Rucyahana yibukije urubyiruko ubutwari mu mateka yâ€™abanyarwanda, agaragaza uburyo bari bariyubatse, bafite abakuru, ubutaka ndetse bunze nâ€™ubumwe, aho yashimangiye ko byatumye abakoloni barushaho kubanga cyane ko umwami yari afite gahunda inoze yo kurengera abaturage be.
Yagaragaje ko ubwo bumwe aribwo bwatumye mu gihe abacakara bakurwaga muri Afurika, ibindi bihugu byakuwemo abaturage ariko mu Rwanda birananirana kuko umwami yavuze ko â€œnta munyarwanda ucuruzwa nkâ€™itungoâ€.
Rucyahana yavuze ko mu gushaka gusenya ubumwe bwâ€™abanyarwanda, abakoloni babashyizemo umwiryane utarigeze ubaho kuko bose â€œbari rubanda rwâ€™umwamiâ€ biza no kugeza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko ubutwari bwizihizwa kuri uyu munsi â€œbushobora kuba intandaro yâ€™uko uhemukirwa nâ€™abatinya ubutwari bwawe, cyangwa bukagufasha kwisubiza agaciro kaweâ€.
Komiseri wa RCS, CG George Rwigamba, nkâ€™umwe mu basirikare bagize uruhare mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, yavuze ibihamya ubutwari bwo kubohora igihugu, aho yababwiye ko â€œbwagaragaye mu mitunganyirize nâ€™imitegurire yâ€™urugamba, Perezida Kagame yayoboye. Yateguye urugamba rwacu nka RPA ategura nâ€™urugamba rwo gutsinda Habyarimanaâ€.
Yavuze ko ari umwe mu basirikare 600 ba RPA bari i Kigali muri CND aho na none ubutwari bwa Perezida Kagame wari uyoboye urugamba bwongeye kwigaragaza, kubera uburyo yabaremyemo icyizere, akababwira ko nubwo bakikijwe na batayo esheshatu ntacyo bazaba.
Rwigamba yavuze ko ubutwari bwaranze Perezida Kagame mu gutegura urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu aribwo bwagejeje ku guhagarika Jenoside.
Yavuze ko magingo aya, urugamba rwâ€™amasasu rwarangiye, ko urubyiruko rukwiye kugaragaza ubutwari bwarwo rurwana intambara ikomeza urugendo rwâ€™iterambere ryâ€™igihugu.
Ati â€œ Urugamba rwanyu rugomba intwari muri siyansi, rugakumira ibikorwa byashingira ku bumenyi byibasira igihugu, ugiye kubatera mukamurwanya mwifashishije ikoranabuhanga, ubutwari bwanyu buri mu kubungabunga ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu, buri mu kwiga mukazavura neza abanyarwanda.â€
Abanyeshuri 44 nibo bari bitabiriye ibi biganiro, aba ni abiga mu Mujyi wa Rabat kuko mu yindi mijyi bari mu gihe cyâ€™ibizamini.
Umunsi wâ€™Intwari wizihijwe kuri uyu wa 1 Gashyantare wabanjirijwe nâ€™icyumweru cyâ€™Ubutwari cyatangiye ku wa 24 Mutarama 2020 gisozwa ku wa 31 Mutarama.
Cyaranzwe nâ€™imikino itandukanye nâ€™ibiganiro byabereye mu bigo bya Leta, ibyigenga no muri za kaminuza nâ€™amashuri makuru no hirya no hino ku Isi ahari abanyarwanda.
Intwari zâ€™u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe nâ€™Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka FÃ©licitÃ© nâ€™Abanyeshuri bâ€™Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu nâ€™Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari nâ€™imwe irashyirwamo.
Urwego rushinzwe Intwari zâ€™Igihugu, Imidari nâ€™Impeta byâ€™Ishimwe rutangaza ko hamaze gukorwa urutonde rwâ€™abazongerwa mu ntwari zâ€™u Rwanda ndetse rushobora gushyirwa ahagaragara bidatinze.
Kuva mu myaka itatu ishize hakozwe ubushakashatsi bwasize hatanzwe abantu 76 bazavamo abagirwa intwari nâ€™abazahabwa impeta zâ€™ishimwe.
Izo mpeta zamaze no gutumizwa ziri mu byiciro birindwi zizambikwa abagaragaje ibikorwa byâ€™ubutwari bijyanye nâ€™ubwitange bushobora no gutwara ubuzima bwabo; ibyo gutsura umubano wâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™amahanga; kurwanya ibinyoma; guteza imbere umuco no kuba indashyikirwa mu kunoza umurimo uteza imbere igihugu.

Title: U Buholandi: Abanyarwanda bishimiye ibyagezweho mu 2019, basabwa kwinjira muri Connect Rwanda
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Buholandi bifatanyije nâ€™inshuti zabo mu gikorwa cyo kwifurizanya umwaka wa 2020, kwishimira ibyagezweho no gufata ingamba nshya mu kunoza ibyakozwe cyangwa ibitaragenze neza.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Buholandi bifatanyije nâ€™inshuti zabo mu gikorwa cyo kwifurizanya umwaka wa 2020, kwishimira ibyagezweho no gufata ingamba nshya mu kunoza ibyakozwe cyangwa ibitaragenze neza.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe na Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda ifatanyije na Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Buholandi cyabereye muri Hilton Hotel i Den Haag ku wa 25 Mutarama 2020.
Mu ijambo rye Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Jean Pierre Karabaranga yifurije Umwaka mushya muhire wa 2020 Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo.
Yashimiye Komite ya Diaspora ku bikorwa byâ€™indashyikirwa byagezweho mu 2019 nâ€™Abanyarwanda bayibaye hafi bakabyitabira uko batumirwaga.
Yagize ati â€œUmwaka ushize wabaye mwiza cyane kuko watanze umusaruro mu mihigo myinshi yari yifujwe kugerwaho. Ubu u Rwanda ruhagaze neza haba mu bukungu, umutekano nâ€™ububanyi nâ€™amahanga.â€™â€™
â€œKu rwego rwa Ambasade twakoze byinshi dufatanyije, ndabashimira ko twafatanyije umuhango wo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi; nyuma habayeho na gahunda yo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 25 ndetse no kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wâ€™Abagore.â€™â€™
Ibi bikorwa ni bimwe mu bihuza Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bikababera ahantu ho guhurira no gukura amasomo ku bo baribo, kubaka ubumwe no gukomeza inzira yâ€™iterambere.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yagize ati â€œUmubare wâ€™inshuti zâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™uwâ€™abashoramari urakomeza kwiyongera. Ku rwego rwa diaspora, twagize abantu benshi bitabiriye Umushyikirano kandi baduhagarariye neza. Abanyarwanda benshi bakomeje kujya bataha bakajya gusura igihugu cyabo kandi igishimishije nuko harimo nâ€™urubyiruko rwinshi. Hari abitabiriye Youth Connect 2019 nâ€™itorero 2019.â€™â€™
Abanyarwanda bitabiriye iki gikorwa banibukijwe serivisi bashobora kubona babwiwe ko bashobora kuzisanga muri Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi.
Amb. Karabaranga yakomoje ku buryo bushya bwo gusaba urupapuro rwâ€™inzira (Passport) rushya rwâ€™u Rwanda.
Ati â€œAbifuza gusaba Passport nshya cyangwa se kwandikisha imitungo, mugane ambasade yanyu tubahe izo serivisi.â€™â€™
Yakomeje abasaba kwinjira muri gahunda igamije kugeza telefoni zigezweho ku baturage bâ€™u Rwanda. Ati â€œNagira ngo kandi mbashishikarize kandi kwitabira Connect Rwanda.â€™â€™
Ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo MTN Rwanda yatangije ubukangurambaga bwa Connect Rwanda Challenge, maze ibigo nâ€™abantu ku giti cyabo batangira kwiyemeza umubare wa telefoni zigezweho bazatanga zigahabwa abadafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira hirya no hino mu gihugu.
MTN Rwanda iteganya ko abantu bose bazahabwa izi telefone muri ubu bukangurambaga bazahabwa na Sim Card iriho na 1GB ya Internet mu gihe cyâ€™amezi atatu ya mbere, mu kugabanya imbogamizi ku bantu bazitirwa no kubura internet.
Muri telefoni ibihumbi 40 zimaze kwiyemezwa nâ€™abantu batandukanye izigera ku bihumbi 20 ni izikorerwa mu Rwanda nâ€™Uruganda rwa Mara Phone.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yasabye Abanyarwanda kwitabira gahunda igamije gufasha Abanyarwanda bari muri Dispora gutanga umusanzu mu kubaka igihugu cyabo bakoresheje ubumenyi nâ€™ubunararibonye bahahiye mu mahanga.
Ubu busabe bushingiye ku mwanzuro wa munani wavuye mu gitekerezo cyatanzwe nâ€™Umunyarwanda utuye mu Buholandi mu Nama yâ€™Umushyikirano ya 2019.
Umuyobozi wa Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Buholandi, Ndabarasa Claude, yashimiye abitabiriye igikorwa.
Ati â€œMumfashe dushimire ubuyobozi bwa Ambasade bwemeye ko dufatanya iki gikorwa, tunabashimire uburyo batuba hafi mu bikorwa byose dutegura hano mu Buholandi nkâ€™Abanyarwanda. Turabyishimira cyane.â€™â€™
Mu ijambo rye yagaragaje ibyo Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Buholandi yagezeho mu 2019 ndetse anamurika ibyo bifuza kugeraho mu 2020.
Umugoroba wasojwe mu isangira nâ€™ubusabane bwabereyemo igitaramo gakondo cyacinyiwemo akadiho.

Title: U Bufaransa: Hamuritswe urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi rwubatswe i Strasbourg
Body:
Mu Mujyi wa Strasbourg mu Bufaransa, hamuritswe ku mugaragaro urukuta rwâ€™urwibutso nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka ubuziraherezo jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Mu Mujyi wa Strasbourg mu Bufaransa, hamuritswe ku mugaragaro urukuta rwâ€™urwibutso nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka ubuziraherezo jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Iki gikorwa cyabaye kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 27 Mutarama, akaba ari nâ€™umunsi wo kwibuka Jenoside no kurwanya ibyaha byibasira inyokomuntu.
Uru rukuta rwanditseho interuro ivuga ko â€˜mu Rwanda muri 1994 hishwe abarenze Miliyoni yâ€™abantu bazira ko bavutse ari Abatutsi gusa. Ntibizongere kubaho ukundiâ€™.
Umuhango wo kumurika uru rukuta witabiriwe na Amb. Dr Ngarambe Jean FranÃ§ois-Xavier, uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, Umuyobozi wâ€™Umujyi wa Strasbourg, Roland Ries, Umuyobozi wâ€™ishyirahamwe Amariza dâ€™Alsace, ImmaculÃ©e Mpinganzima Cattier na Jeanne Kayigirwa Allaire wari uhagarariye umuryango Ibuka-France.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Umuyobozi wâ€™umujyi wa Strasbourg, Roland Ries, yavuze ko gushyira uru rukuta muri uyu mujyi byatewe nâ€™impamvu ebyiri nyamukuru. Iya mbere ni uko aherutse mu Rwanda akibonera nâ€™amaso amwe mu mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi nâ€™uburyo asigasirwa.
Avuga ko indi mpamvu ari uko ari umuyobozi wâ€™umujyi uzwiho kubahiriza ukwishyira ukizana kwâ€™ikiremwamuntu mu Burayi, ibyabaye mu Rwanda bikaba binyuranye cyane nâ€™ubwo burenganzira bwa muntu bashyigikiye.
Roland Ries asaba aabarokotse Jenoside kutibagirwa ariko bakarenga akababaro ntikabaherane kugira ngo babeho neza nâ€™abazabakomokaho bose.
Ati â€œBakomeze biyubakire igihugu kitarangwamo amacakubiri nkâ€™uko nabibonye mu Rwanda, igihugu gikomeye mu kwiyubaka bishingiye mu mbaraga bikuyemo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsiâ€.
Uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, Amb.Dr Ngarambe Jean FranÃ§ois-Xavier, yashimiye abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo zituye mu nkengero za Strasbourg, bitabiriye uyu muhango wo kumurika ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka ubuziraherezo jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda 1994.
Ati â€œNi igikorwa gikomeye rero ku mpamvu nyinshi, cyane cyane abacitse ku icumu rya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi babone aho kwibukira ababo, kandi babone ko ababo bahawe agaciro hano mu Bufaransa, nâ€™abahatuye cyangwa bahagenda bakaba basobanukirwa nâ€™uko iyi jenoside yateguwe ikanashyirwa mu bikorwaâ€.
Yakomeje avuga kandi ko ari no kwereka abahakana ku nyungu zabo bwite ko jenoside yakozwe, ko bibeshya.
Ati â€œNtituzemera ko babica kandi bgashaka no kubasiba mu bantu babayeho mu Isi dutuyeâ€.
Uwari uhagarariye Ibuka-France, Jeanne Allaire, yavuze ko iki gikorwa giteye ishema kuko abarokotse jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi batuye muri aka karere babonye ahantu bazajya byibura bajya kwibukira imiryango nâ€™inshuti zabo bishwe bazira uko bavutse.
Ati â€œTukaba nka Ibuka-France, duhamagariye indi mijyi isigaye yose kuduha aho twajya twibukira kandi bikaba biri mu byo twiyemeje ko buri Mujyi wa hano waduha ahantu dushyira urwibutso rwâ€™amateka yacu muri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwandaâ€.
Jeanne Allaire avuga ko bamaze kugira ho kwibukira mu mijyi nka Paris, Strasbourg, Toulouse nâ€™ahandi ariko bidahagije bazakomeza kubwira nâ€™abandi basigaye ndetse bategereje ko no ku rwego rwâ€™igihugu cyose babaha aho kwibukira kuko kugeza uyu munsi bigarukira mu bayobozi bâ€™imijyi gusa.
Mpinganzima Cattier ImmaculÃ©e, uyobora ishyirahamwe ryafatanyije nâ€™umujyi wa Strasbourg gutegua iki gikorwa yashimiye Umuyobozi wâ€™umujyi wa Strasbourg Roland Ries kuko yabigizemo uruhare rukomeye kuko bitari byoroshye.
Ati â€œTwabisabye hashize imyaka 10 none bibaye impamo, ubu rero tubonye koko aho dushobora kujya tuza kwibukira nko muri Mata, ku bwanjye rwose ndishimye kuko iki gikorwa cyararwanyijwe ariko ababirwanyaga turabatsinzeâ€.
Akomeza avuga ko ari ibyâ€™agaciro kuko iki kimenyetso gishyizwe mu mujyi ukomeye ufatwa nkâ€™umurwa mukuru wâ€™ u Burayi, kandi ukaba umujyi ufite amateka akomeye mu gihugu cyâ€™u Bufaransa.
Alain Gauthier yongeyeho ko iki gikorwa kiri no mu rwego rwo kwereka abakoze jenoside bidegembya ko byose bishoboka, ko abacitse ku icumu batazahwema kurengera uburenganzira bwabo, ko ibyo bakoze bazabibazwa uko byagenda kose.
Yakomeje avuga ko aho batuye i Reims basabye urwibutso ariko bagitegereje bizeye ko umunsi uzagera bakabereka aho bashyira urwibutso.

Title: Amb. Kirabo Kacyira yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana
Body:
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Dr. Aissa Kirabo yashyikirije Perezida Nana Addo izo mpapuro kuri uyu wa Mbere, tariki ya 27 Mutarama 2020 mu Ngoro ye iherereye mu Murwa Mukuru Accra.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, yijeje Abanyarwanda nâ€™Abanya-Ghana kuzarushaho kunoza inshingano yahawe ndetse anashimira Perezida Paul Kagame, wamugiriye icyizere cyo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana.
Mbere yo guhabwa inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana, Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yakoraga mu Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye rishinzwe imiturire.
Inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana yazihawe na Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame, tariki ya 15 Nyakanga 2019, ubwo hashyirwagaho abahagarariye u Rwanda mu bihugu 15 byâ€™amahanga.
Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira afite izina rizwi mu bijyanye na politiki mu Rwanda. Yayoboye Umujyi wa Kigali hagati ya 2006 na 2011, icyo gihe yari asimbuye Mutsindashyaka ThÃ©oneste. Uwo mwanya yawugezeho avuye no mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko yâ€™u Rwanda aho yari Intumwa ya rubanda.
Ghana yahawe guhagarariramo inyungu zâ€™u Rwanda ni igihugu gisanganywe umubano mwiza narwo. Stanislas Kamanzi ni we wari Ambasaderi warwo kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2017.
Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda muri Ghana yafunguwe nkâ€™umusaruro wâ€™ibiganiro Perezida Kagame yagiye agirana na mugenzi we wâ€™icyo gihugu, Nana Akufo-Addo.
Muri gahunda yo kwihutisha iterambere no kuvugurura imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage (NST1) inajyanye nâ€™iya guverinoma yâ€™imyaka irindwi, igaragaza ko ishoramari ryâ€™abanyamahanga ari imwe mu nzira izafasha mu iterambere ryâ€™ubukungu bushingiye ku mubano u Rwanda rufitanye nâ€™ibindi bihugu.
Ghana nâ€™u Rwanda bifitanye umubano wihariye ugamije kunoza imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage babyo.
Ibihugu byombi byasinyanye amasezerano yâ€™ubufatanye mu byâ€™ikirere, yatumye kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2013, Sosiyete Nyarwanda yâ€™Ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir itangira ingendo zigana mu Mujyi wa Accra.
Ingendo za RwandAir zoroheje ubuhahirane hagati yâ€™ibihugu byombi, zinazamura imigenderanire mu bacuruzi nâ€™abashoramari babiturukamo cyane ko mu 2014 Urugaga rwâ€™Abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) rwasinyanye nâ€™Urwego rushinzwe Ubucuruzi muri Ghana amasezerano yâ€™ubufatanye agamije guteza imbere ishoramari mu buhinzi bwa kijyambere, ubukerarugendo, inganda zikora imyenda, ishoramari mu bwubatsi no mu bucukuzi bwâ€™amabuye yâ€™agaciro.

Title: U Buholandi: RDB yijeje abikorera ubufatanye mu iterambere ryâ€™ubukerarugendo
Body:
U Rwanda ruri mu bihugu byitabiriye Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo rya Vakantiebeurs riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi.
U Rwanda ruri mu bihugu byitabiriye Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo rya Vakantiebeurs riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi.
Vakantiebeurs igeze ku munsi wa gatatu yatangiye tariki ya 15, izarangira ku wa 19 Mutarama 2020.
Ku nshuro ya 13 ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda bikora ibijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo bigatanga nâ€™izindi serivisi zijyana nabwo byitabiriye iri murikagurisha ngarukamwaka.
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abaryitabiriye amahirwe yâ€™ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™ igamije gushishikariza abanyamahanga kurusura.
Leta yâ€™u Rwanda binyuze mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) yishimira uburyo ibigo byâ€™ubukerarugendo bitera imbere bikanitabira gahunda zo kumurika ubukerarugendo bwâ€™urwa Gasabo mu mahanga.
Imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs ryitabiriwe nâ€™abayobozi bâ€™ibigo byo mu Rwanda, bagize amahirwe yo guhura nâ€™ibigo bikomeye byâ€™ubukerarugendo ku migabane irimo uwâ€™i Burayi, Amerika, Aziya nâ€™ahandi.
Inyungu ziri muri iki gikorwa zishingiye ku kureba uko hanozwa ubufatanye hagati yâ€™impande zombi, kwerekana ubwiza bwâ€™u Rwanda no gushishikariza abantu kuzarusura.
U Rwanda ruhagarariwe muri iki gikorwa na RDB, Sosiyete Nyarwanda yâ€™Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir [ihagarariwe mu Bubiligi, u Budage no mu Buholandi na Gashumba Charles DamascÃ¨ne], Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi nâ€™ibigo byâ€™ubukerarugendo birimo Amahoro Tours ihagarariwe na Bakunzi Greg, Palast Tours and Travel ihagarariwe na Rutagarama Aimable na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda iyobowe na Mugisha Davson.
Bakunzi Greg yabwiye IGIHE ko kwitabira imurikagurisha hari byinshi babyungukiyemo.
Yagize ati â€œUko tuje twiga ibintu bishya kandi tugahura nâ€™abantu batandukanye kandi buri mwaka abaza badusanga bariyongera. Ibihugu duturanye usanga kuri stand baza kutubaza bati â€˜mubigenza mute ngo mubone abantu benshi bashishikazwa no kuza gusura u Rwandaâ€™.â€™â€™
Muri â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda beretse bagenzi babo bo mu Buholandi amahirwe ari mu bukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™uko yabyazwa umusaruro.
Yavuze ko bitanga icyizere ko imbere ari heza bijyanye nâ€™ubufasha bwâ€™u Rwanda mu guteza imbere ubukerarugendo.
Mugisha Musonera Davson we yavuze ko amamurikagurisha yâ€™ubukerarugendo yafunguriye amarembo u Rwanda.
Ibi bikorwa byâ€™imurikagurisha rigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda byiyongera ku bindi byo kubumenyekanisha birimo amasezerano rwasinye nâ€™amakipe ya Arsenal na Paris St Germain ndetse na Filime ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.
Yakomeje agira ati â€œIkindi ni uko ubukerarugendo bwacu tutakivuga gusa ingagiâ€¦, ahubwo tuvuga nâ€™ibigize Umuco Nyarwanda waho bazasura nâ€™utundi turere twâ€™u Rwanda tukamenyekana, ukajya i Kibeho, i Nyanza, Muhazi, Rusomo nâ€™ahandi.â€™â€™
Umuyobozi ushinzwe kumenyekanisha Ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Linda Mutesi, yavuze ko Leta yâ€™u Rwanda yishimira uko ibigo byâ€™ubukerarugendo bitera imbere.
Ati â€œNtibahwemye kwitabira izi gahunda zo kumurika ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda, ubu bufatanye rero buzakomeza gushyirwamo imbaraga ku mpande zombi nta kabuza.â€™â€™
Yavuze ko stand yâ€™u Rwanda mu Imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs yasuwe cyane nâ€™abo mu bihugu bitandukanye.
Yakomeje ati â€œTwari twabatumiye hano kuri stand yâ€™u Rwanda, bitabiriye ari benshi ku buryo bushimishije. Ibiganiro twagiranye, amakuru twahanye azatuma iminsi tuzamara hano ivamo umusaruro kuko guhura ni inyungu nyinshi.â€™â€™
Linda yavuze ko iterambere ryâ€™ubukerarugendo ridakwiye guharirwa Leta gusa.
Ati â€œIyo urebye muri iyi myaka ishize biragaragara cyane ko ubukerarugendo bwateye intambwe igaragara. Nkatwe ababukora nkâ€™umwuga ni ugushyiraho akacu ntitubiharire gusa Leta. Tugomba kongera ingufu nâ€™umubare wâ€™ibigo bikora ubukerarugendo, tugakomeza kubaka amahoteli nâ€™ibindi bijyanye no kwakira abashyitsi byâ€™ibihe tugezemo no guhugura abakozi nâ€™ibindi.â€™â€™
The Vakantiebeurs ihuza abahanga mu byâ€™ubukerarugendo, harebwa nâ€™uko bakorana. Ni imurika ritegerejwemo abashyitsi 50,000 mu gihe abazamurika basaga 200. Ifatwa nkâ€™amahirwe ku bukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda bwo gukorana nâ€™ubwâ€™u Buholandi nâ€™andi masoko akomeye yabufasha gutera imbere.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

Title: Visit Rwanda yamuritswe mu imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 mu Buholandi (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abitabiriye imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi, amahirwe yâ€™ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™.
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abitabiriye imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi, amahirwe yâ€™ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™.
Imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs riteganyijwe ku wa 16-19 Mutarama 2020. Ryitabirwa nâ€™ibigo bikomeye byâ€™ubukerarugendo ku Mugabane wâ€™u Burayi nâ€™Isi muri rusange.
Muri â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda beretse bagenzi babo bo mu Buholandi amahirwe ari mu bukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™uko yabyazwa umusaruro.
Mu imurikagurisha rya The Vakantiebeurs, u Rwanda ruhagarariwe nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, Sosiyete Nyarwanda yâ€™Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir, Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi nâ€™ibigo byâ€™ubukerarugendo birimo Heritage Safaris, Amahoro Tours, Palast Tours and Travel na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda.
Abayobozi baryitabiriye barimo Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Karabaranga Jean Pierre; Umuyobozi muri RDB Ushinzwe kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo, Mutesi Linda na Ildephonse Kambogo ushinzwe ibijyanye nâ€™Ubusesenguzi mu byâ€™Ubukerarugendo.
The Vakantiebeurs izamara iminsi ine, ihuza abahanga mu byâ€™ubukerarugendo, harebwa nâ€™uko bakorana. Ni imurika ritegerejwemo abashyitsi 50,000 mu gihe abazamurika basaga 200. Ifatwa nkâ€™amahirwe ku bukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda bwo gukorana nâ€™ubwâ€™u Buholandi nâ€™andi masoko akomeye yabufasha gutera imbere.
Umuyobozi uhagarariye Visit Rwanda mu Buholandi, Harry Betist, yavuze ko â€œNi umwanya mwiza wo guhura nâ€™abafatanyabikorwa bacu no kwishimira intambwe ubukerarugendo bumaze gutera no kureba uko itasubira inyuma.â€™â€™
Usibye ibizabera muri The Vakantiebeurs, hanateganyijwe igikorwa cyiswe B2B, aho abaserukiye ibigo bitwara abakerarugendo mu Rwanda bazahura nâ€™ibigo binini byo mu Buholandi bicuruza ubukerarugendo. Iki gikorwa giteganyijwe kubera i LaHaye ku wa 20 Mutarama 2020, cyateguwe na Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi cyitezwemo Abaholandi bagera kuri 35.
Abanyarwanda bazacyitabira barimo; Sifa Uwera wo muri Heritage Safaris, Greg Bakunzi wo mu Amahoro Tours, Aimable Rutagarama wo muri Palast Tours, David Mugisha wo muri Wildlife Tours and Travels na RwandAir.
Kuri ubu isoko ryo mu Buholandi riza mu myanya umunani ya mbere, mu kugira abakerarugendo benshi bakorana nâ€™u Rwanda. Abarusura biyongereyeho 11.9Â %, bavuye ku 4918 mu 2017 bagera kuri 5501 mu 2018.
Ibi bikorwa byâ€™imurikagurisha rigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda byiyongera ku bikorwa bikomeye mu kubumenyekanisha birimo amasezerano rwasinye nâ€™amakipe ya Arsenal na Paris St Germain ndetse na Filime ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.
Imibare yo mu Ukuboza yerekana ko Abanyarwanda 142000 bafite akazi mu bukerarugendo, bageze kuri uwo mubare bavuye ku 90000 bariho mu 2017.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

Title: Larousse yemeye gukosora inyandiko yanenzwe gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Umwunganizi wâ€™Ihuriro ryâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (CommunautÃ© Rwandaise de France, CRF), Me Gisagara Richard, yavuze ko ubuyobozi bwâ€™inzu yâ€™ubwanditsi ikomeye mu Bufaransa, Ã‰ditions Larousse, bwemeye gukosora imvugo bwakoresheje mu nkoranyamagambo yabwo, ko mu Rwanda habaye intambara hagati yâ€™amoko.
Umwunganizi wâ€™Ihuriro ryâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (CommunautÃ© Rwandaise de France, CRF), Me Gisagara Richard, yavuze ko ubuyobozi bwâ€™inzu yâ€™ubwanditsi ikomeye mu Bufaransa, Ã‰ditions Larousse, bwemeye gukosora imvugo bwakoresheje mu nkoranyamagambo yabwo, ko mu Rwanda habaye intambara hagati yâ€™amoko.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Me Gisagara yavuze ko mu gisubizo bamuhaye ku ibaruwa yabandikiye, ubuyobozi bwa Larousse â€œbwiyemeje ko bugiye guhindura ibyanditswe muri iki gitabo kigenewe urubyiruko noneho bugakoresha ijambo nyirâ€™izina, â€˜jenoside yakorewe Abatutsiâ€™ mu gitabo kindi kigiye gusohoka.â€
Imvugo yanenzwe bikomeye yakoreshejwe mu nkoranyamagambo ya Larousse Junior. Iyo nyandiko yâ€™umwaka wa 2020, aho iyo abanditsi iyo igeze ku Rwanda, basobanura ingano yarwo, umurwa mukuru, abaturage nâ€™aho ruherereye, ariko hasi bakagira bati â€œicyo gihugu kimwe nâ€™u Burundi, cyashegeshwe nâ€™intambara hagati yâ€™ibice bibiri byâ€™abaturage bakigize, Abahutu nâ€™Abatutsi.â€
Me Gisagara avuga ko nubwo yishimiye icyo cyemezo cya Larousse cyo guhindura imvugo, atanyuzwe na gato nâ€™ibisobanuro ubuyobozi bwatanze, ko bwahisemo kudakoresha ijambo jenoside, â€œNgo kuko ari igitabo kigenewe abana bâ€™imyaka irindwi kugera ku 11,â€ bityo ngo ntibabasha kumva neza Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Me Gisagara yakomeje ati â€œMu kinyarwanda bavuga ko umwana apfa mu iterura. Ntabwo rero watangira umubwira ibinyoma ngo wizere ko uzabihindura amaze gukura.â€
Yavuze ko agiye kungurana ibitekerezo nâ€™abayobozi ba CRF ngo barebe niba bemera ibyo bisobanuro bya Larousse cyangwa niba bafata izindi ngamba, cyane cyane ko indi nkoranyamagambo nshya ya Larousse ishobora gusohoka mu mwaka utaha.
Byaba bivuze ko abana bose bazaba basoma iyo iri kugurishwa, bagakomeza guhabwa â€œizi nyigisho zinyuranye nâ€™ukuri. Ni ibintu bibabje bigomba kwamaganwa.â€
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo yâ€™Igihugu yo Kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, Dr Bizimana Jean DamascÃ¨ne, aheruka kuvuga ko mu Bufaransa atari ubwa mbere ibikorwa byo gupfobya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bikorwa nâ€™abantu ku giti cyabo, bityo uburyo bazemera gukosora ibyo bakoze bizagaragaza icyemezo cya nyuma kizafatwa.
Ati "Nibakomeza gutsimbarara kuri iyo nyito [bazajyanwa mu nkiko] kuko mu Bufaransa bwose itegeko rihari ryemera ko umuntu ku giti cye, umuryango, ishyirahamwe ndetse nâ€™urundi rwego rwose, rushobora gutanga ikirego rushingiye ku gihari.â€
Mu mpera zâ€™umwaka ushize wa 2019, umwanditsi Charles Onana ukomoka muri Cameroun, nawe yarezwe mu butabera bwo mu Bufaransa nâ€™ishyirahamwe ryâ€™Abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu, kubera ibikorwa bye byo guhakana nâ€™ipfobya rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Inkuru wasoma: Larousse ishobora kujyanwa mu nkiko izira gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi

Title: Umuhanzi Weya Viatora yatumiwe mu Bubiligi mu iserukiramuco mpuzamahanga
Body:
Umuhanzi Weya Marie Viatora yatumiwe mu iserukiramuco rizwi nka Congolisation rizahuriza mu Bubiligi abahanzi batandukanye hagamijwe gusangizanya ubunararibonye ku iterambere ryâ€™umuziki.
Umuhanzi Weya Marie Viatora yatumiwe mu iserukiramuco rizwi nka Congolisation rizahuriza mu Bubiligi abahanzi batandukanye hagamijwe gusangizanya ubunararibonye ku iterambere ryâ€™umuziki.
Iri serukiramuco ryâ€™umuco mpuzamahanga rizabera mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles ahitwa KVS, ThÃ©Ã¢tre Royal Flamand tariki ya 16 Mutarama 2020 guhera saa mbiri zâ€™umugoroba mu gikorwa cyâ€™umukino wiswe â€˜â€˜RÃ©volution rap-une histoire Africaineâ€™â€™.
Weya azanitabira ibirori byâ€™isozwa rya Congolisation Festival biteganyijwe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020.
Uyu muhanzi wâ€™imyaka 23 amaze kumenyekana mu ruhando rwâ€™abanyamuziki bafite impano mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.
Yatumiwe muri Congolisation Festival bigizwemo uruhare nâ€™Ikigo Rwanda Arts initiative (RAI) cyashinzwe na Dorcy Rugamba wiyemeje gufasha abahanzi bâ€™Ababanyarwanda gukora ubuhanzi bwâ€™umwuga bukanabatunga, gifatanyije na ThÃ©Ã¢tre KVS.
Rugamba yabwiye IGIHE ko bahisemo gutumira Weya mu gufasha umuziki we kuzamuka biruseho.
Yagize ati â€œTwatumiye Weya kugira ngo aze yimenyereze akorane nâ€™abahanzi bâ€™umwuga afungure amaso, amenyere. Ibi biri muri gahunda ya Rwanda Arts Initiative aho dufata umuhanzi tukamushakira uburyo bwo kwihugura ku rwego ahura nâ€™abandi kandi ahantu hazwi nkâ€™aha muri KVS. ThÃ©Ã¢tre Royal Flamand ni ahantu hazamuha isura yo ku rwego twifuza na we yifuza kugeraho, azahahurira nâ€™abahanzi bakomeye, azabona ibikoresho nâ€™imikorere yo ku rwego rwâ€™umwuga maze bimubere impamba mu minsi iri imbere.â€™â€™
Yakomeje agira ati â€œUmuhanzi tuzanye kandi ahabwa naho akorera twakwita ko yiherera akiha gahunda akiga gukora no gukoresha igihe cyose afite mu guhanga ari wenyine ibindi yabisize ku ruhande.â€™â€™
Rugamba yakomeje avuga ko bifuza ko Abanyarwanda nka Weya indirimbo zabo mu minsi iri imbere bifuza kuzibona no mu nzu zikomeye zâ€™ubucuruzi bwâ€™ibihangano ku rwego mpuzamahanga nka Fnac mu Burayi kandi zikinjiza amafaranga yatunga abahanzi.
Ubu bufasha buhabwa abahanzi bâ€™ingeri zitandukanye barimo abandika, abaririmba, abakina filimi cyangwa amakinamico nâ€™ibindi.
Rugamba yasabye Abanyarwanda kuzajya gushyigikira Weya no kumuremamo icyizere cyo kuvamo umuhanzikazi ukomeye.
Weya mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko yishimiye kuba yaratoranyijwe mu bahanzi bazitabira iserukiramuco rizabera mu Bubiligi.
Ati â€œTuzahura nâ€™abandi bahanzi turebe icyo twabigiraho, tuzahuza ubwo bunararibonye turebe icyo twakora kinini mu buryo bwagutse.â€™â€™
Iserukiramuco rya Congolisation rizwi nka Festival Afro-Diaspo-Arts riberamo ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo amamurika, imbyino, amakinamico, umuziki, filime nâ€™inama zagutse. Ni ku nshuro ya gatanu rigiye kuba.
Weya azanafashwa gutunganya album ye ya kabiri abifashijwemo na studio zikomeye mu Bubiligi zirimo iya Sunny Side Inc iyoborwa na Nicolas LefÃ¨vre na Bionix ya Christian Dessart afatanyije na Rachid Mir zifitanye imikoranire na Rwanda Arts Initiative.
Muri uwo mushinga aranateganya no gukorana indirimbo nâ€™umuhanzi GaÃ«l Faye, bahuye ubwo uyu muhanzi yamurikaga igitabo cye yise â€œLe Petit Pays.â€™â€™
Weya yavukiye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku wa 9 Nyakanga 1996 mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali. Yatangiye kwiyumvamo impano yo kuririmba ari umwana muto wâ€™imyaka ine.
Ati â€œKuva ndi umwana muto nakundaga kuririmba, aho menyeye ubwenge nisanze ndirimba naba mbabaye naba nishimye; mbese uyu ni umuhamagaro kuri jye numva nta kintu nabisimbuza kuko ni ubuzima bwanjye.â€™â€™
Weya Viatora yanditse indirimbo ye ya mbere ageze mu mwaka wa kane wâ€™amashuri abanza, asoje ayisumbuye ajya muri studio akora indirimbo ya mbere yitwa â€˜Empty Houseâ€™.
Iyi ndirimbo yanyujijwe no ku Ijwi rya Amerika ndetse ituma ahabwa ikiganiro cyanyuze muri CNN.
Uyu muhanzikazi yashyize hanze indirimbo zirimo "Intimba", "Eyes Open Dreaming", "Miracles", "Uwo ndiwe", "Heritage" na "Name is woman". Yanahawe ibihembo bitandukanye mu 2014 na 2016 birimo icya High School Idol nâ€™icya Youth Award.
Weya afite album imwe yasohoye mu 2018, yayikoranyeho nâ€™aba-producers barimo Khrisau, Danny Beats, Jay P na Dr Nganji usanzwe ukorera Green Ferry Music ibarizwamo abasore bakora injyana na Kinyatrap yazamuwe cyane na Bushali.
Imwe mu ndirimbo yaririmbyemo ikamamara cyane ni iyitwa â€˜â€˜Icumu nâ€™Ingaboâ€ yahuriyemo na Prime na Icenova bo muri Green Ferry. Yanakoranye nâ€™abahanzi barimo Mani Martin, Butera Knowless, Peace Jolis, Patrick Nyamitali, Carole Karemera, Samuel Kamanzi, Michael Sengazi nâ€™abandi.

Title: Itsinda ryâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basuye Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi bakiriwe nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, baraganira baranasabana.
Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi bakiriwe nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, baraganira baranasabana.
Kuwa Gatanu tariki ya 10 Mutarama 2020, nibwo Guverineri wâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney yakiriye Itsinda rya Diaspora Nyarwanda rigizwe nâ€™abantu barenga 30 baba mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku Isi.
 Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE Guverineri Gatabazi yavuze ko kwakira abo banyarwanda ari mu rwego rwo kubereka iyo Ntara, bakamenya nâ€™ibyiza bitatse igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati â€œBirimo nâ€™inyungu ku mpande zombie kuko bamenya igihugu cyabo nâ€™ibyiza bigitatse, bakaruhuka mu mutwe kuko abenshi baba bamaze igihe bakora aho muri ibyo bihugu bataruhuka. Natwe batubera abavugizi mu nshuti zabo, imiryango yabo bazanye nayo mu modoka, barara mu mahoteli bagasiga bazamuye akarere mu bukungu, ni bintu byiza cyane tuzakomeza.â€
Gatabazi yavuze ko banaganiriye ku mahirwe atandukanye ari mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyaruguru ashobora gushorwamo imari, akabyazwa umusaruro.
 Guverineri Gatabazi yanabasabye gukomeza gushyira imbaraga mu kwegera urubyiruko no kugerageza kubohora abana bo mu miryango yinangiye idashaka guhinduka, bakava i buzimu bakajya ibuntu.
Yongeye kubasaba gukomeza urukundo bafitiye Igihugu cyâ€™u Rwanda no gukomeza guharanira icyateza imbere umuturage mugenzi wabo, bitabira gushora imari mu bikorwa bitandukanye birimo ubuhinzi, ubukerarugendo, amahoteli, uburezi, ikoranabuhanga nâ€™ibindi.
Yabashimiye uburyo bagiye bategura za Rwanda Days bashyizemo imbaraga bigatuma Perezida Paul Kagame ahacana umucyo, abasaba gukomeza guharanira ko umunyarwanda aho ari hose yarangwa nâ€™imyitwarire myiza, imigenzereze nâ€™imibanire ihesha agaciro Igihugu bityo bikazakomeza gutuma amahanga yose yifuza kuza mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi wâ€™ungirije Perezida wâ€™ishyirahamwe ryâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye mu Mahanga RDGN (Rwandan Diaspora Global Netwerk), Thomas Ntagozera yavuze ko nubwo baba mu mahanga, umutima wabo uhora mu Rwanda.
Ati â€œTuba mu mahanga ariko umutima wacu uba mu Rwanda. Turashimira Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga uko yadushyiriyeho urwego rutugenewe byâ€™umwihariko rukamenya amakuru yacu. Uko tuje twakirwa neza, tugasobanurirwa ibyo twifuza kumenya.â€
Yashimiye ubuyobozi bwâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru uburyo bakirwa dore ko bamaze kuyisura inshuro eshatu.
Abo banyarwanda mu gihe bamaze bari mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, basuye ishuri rya Gisirikare rya Nyakinama, basuye Ishuri rikuru ryâ€™Imyuga nâ€™Ubyumenyingiro rya Musanze banareba nâ€™ibindi bikorwa byâ€™iterambere muri iyo Ntara.

Title: Bahinduye umuvuno! Uko Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bisanga mu gihugu cyabibarutse
Body:
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari izâ€™abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya nâ€™imiryango kwishimira Noheli nâ€™Ubunani.
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari izâ€™abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya nâ€™imiryango kwishimira Noheli nâ€™Ubunani.
Iyo witegereje umwaka wa 2019 ingendo zakozwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda bagana mu biruhuko bya Noheli nâ€™ibisoza umwaka bavuye mu Bubiligi no mu bindi bihugu byâ€™u Burayi ubona ko bidasanzwe, abenshi bahisemo kubikorera mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bahageze mu buryo butandukanye mu mpande zose zâ€™Isi! Hari abahageze kera kubera amateka u Rwanda rwaciyemo mu bihe bitandukanye guhera 1959 na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Muri ubwo buzima usanga hari urubyiruko rwahavukiye cyangwa rwahakuriye, hakaba nâ€™abajyayo bagiye kwiga.
Nyuma yâ€™imyaka 26 Jenoside ihagaritswe usanga u Rwanda nâ€™Abanyarwanda barahinduye imyumvire. Kuri ubu abenshi bishimira kwitwa Abanyarwanda, nkâ€™ikintu bose bahuriyeho.
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi benshi bari barahinduye imvugo ingendo nâ€™indimi, batifuza kwitwa Abanyarwanda cyangwa kwitirirwa u Rwanda kubera amahano igihugu cyari kivuyemo.
Buhoro buhoro, ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Rwanda bwahinduye imyumvire nâ€™imitekerereze kugeza ubwo buri wese yifuje kwitirirwa rwa Rwanda kubera isura nziza rufite ugereranyije naho rwavuye, mu icuraburindi, imiborogo nâ€™amaraso yamenetse.
Ubu Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bazirikana igihugu cyabibarutse, ntibikandagira mu gihe bashaka kugaruka mu gihugu cyababyaye no gutanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka igihugu.
Mu biborohereza mu ngendo harimo no kuba Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubwikorezi bwâ€™Indege, RwandAir, gikorera ingendo mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™Isi mu byerekezo 28 bitandukanye.
Kuva mu ntangiriro za 2019, RwandAir yatangije ingendo zerekeza i Addis Ababa muri Ethiopie; i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, i Guangzhou mu Bushinwa nâ€™i Tel Aviv muri Israel.
IGIHE yegereye abayobozi batandukanye mu gihugu, bayisangiza uko bakiriye kuba Abanyarwanda bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo kandi bishimye.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali, Rubingisa Pudence, yavuze ko mu bikorwa byâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bagaragaza urukundo rwâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati â€œBuri muntu ubona uko u Rwanda rwihuta mu iterambere ari mu mahanga aba ashaka gushyiraho umuganda we, ikindi umuntu yashima ni ubukangurambaga bukorwa na za Ambasade zâ€™u Rwanda hirya no hino ku Isi, aho nâ€™imiryango yâ€™Abanyarwanda itanga uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru muri za Diaspora.â€™â€™
Yakomeje ati â€œIyo bageze mu Rwanda basanga harashyizweho uburyo bwo kwakirwa bwihariye muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga nâ€™Ubutwererane, nâ€™ahandi bagiye hose usanga bakirwa neza kandi byihuse nâ€™ubwo usanga hari serivisi zimwe zigomba kunozwa nabo ubwabo bakabyivugira kugira ngo bikosorwe.â€™â€™
Rubingisa yanavuze ko iyo Abanyarwanda basanze iterambere ryâ€™igihugu bibaha umurava wo kukigarukamo kenshi.
Ati â€œIbi kandi noneho si abo mu mahanga bibaho gusa kuko nâ€™Abanyarwanda baturuka mu zindi ntara usanga baza bagahaha ubumenyi bakanakopera ibyiza bikorerwa mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali bakabijyana mu turere batuyemo.â€™â€™
â€œMu baturuka mu mahanga, abo tuganira banifuza kuza gusangira ubumenyi mu byo bafitemo ubunararibonye bize cyangwa bakoramo bikaba ari ibintu byo kwishimira.â€™â€™
Mu gihe cyâ€™ibiruhuko, Abanyarwanda basura ibyiza nyaburanga biri mu gihugu birimo Ingoro Ndangamurage ziri mu Rwanda, Pariki zâ€™Igihugu zirimo iya Nyungwe, iyâ€™Ibirunga nâ€™ahandi hatuma binjiza amafaranga menshi ku bukerarugendo, bikanazamura ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa byâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu Mahanga muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Maziyateke Sandrine, yavuze ko mu mpera zâ€™umwaka ushize Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga benshi basuye igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati â€œNibyo koko mu mpera zâ€™umwaka twagize abantu benshi baturutse muri Diaspora mu Burayi, Canada, Afurika nâ€™ahandi.â€™â€™
Mu Nama yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Umushyikirano handitswe abantu bagera kuri 377 bavuye mu mahanga.
Yakomeje ati â€œIkindi kiza cyane ni uko nyuma bakomeza kugirana ibiganiro nâ€™inzego zitandukanye mu gihugu. Uyu mwaka bahuye na Sena bayigezaho ibitekerezo nâ€™ibyifuzo nkâ€™Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga. Baganira nâ€™izi nzego havamo nâ€™imyanzuro itandukanye harimo gufatanya cyane mu kurwanya abahezanguni, abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakomeje kwidegembya mu bihugu byâ€™amahanga.â€™â€™
Aba Banyarwanda kandi banaganiriye na Minisitiri wâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Dr Biruta Vincent; uwâ€™Ubutegetsi bwâ€™Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, ubuyobozi bwâ€™Agaciro Development Fund; ubwâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ubwiteganyirize (RSSB); Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) nâ€™ubwa Minisiteri yâ€™Ubutabera baganira ku ngingo zigarukwaho mu bikorwa byagutse nka za Rwanda Day.
Muri ibyo biganiro kandi hanazamo imikoranire ikwiye hagati yâ€™Abanyarwanda bâ€™imbere mu gihugu no hanze mu bijyanye nâ€™ishoramari.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga banahuye nâ€™itsinda riyobowe nâ€™Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, ryabasangije ku muco wo kuba Umunyafurika nyawe (Panafricanist). Ibi biganiro byavuyemo imyanzuro yo gushyigikira iyi gahunda no kuriganiriza abandi Banyafurika bari mu bihugu byâ€™amahanga.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basabye ko gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda zarushaho kwimakazwa bijyanye nâ€™igihe.
Maziyateke yanagarutse no ku biganiro byo gukangurira abana bato kumenya igihugu nâ€™amateka yacyo mu bijyanye nâ€™umuco nâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda, kubaha umwanya ku bitekerezo byabo, abana bakumva ko bafite igihugu cyâ€™ababyeyi babo.
Guverineri wâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yabwiye IGIHE ko Abanyarwanda benshi bakunze kwakirwa mu biruhuko bisoza umwaka.
Ati â€œMu mpera za 2019 Abanyarwanda baje ari benshi mu biruhuko, hari na gahunda iteganyijwe yo kubakira mu Majyaruguru ku bakiri mu Rwanda narabatumiye.â€™â€™
â€œAbo bose hari abaza nko mu Mushyikirano ariko bakazana nâ€™imiryango yabo nâ€™inshuti, bagasura ahantu hatandukanye, uko basura niko bazamura ubukungu kuko bishyura serivisi bahabwa, amahoteli babamo basura ahantu hatandukanye.â€™â€™
Gatabazi yavuze ko hari nâ€™ibiganiro byabayeho bamwe bemera kuzajya batanga amasomo mu bigo byâ€™amashuri atandukanye, abakora ubushakashatsi bakabisangiza amashuri yâ€™u Rwanda nta kiguzi.
Yakomeje ati â€œDufite nâ€™amahirwe ko nâ€™abanangiye kugaruka mu gihugu bohereza abana, abagore ku buryo bagenda bafunguka buhoro buhoro mu bikorwa byo kubaka igihugu. Aho usanga abatarabigeraho ni uko bafite ibibazo byihariye bibareba bya politiki.â€™â€™
Yashimye ko Abanyarwanda benshi bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo bazana ibitekerezo bishya kandi byiza bavanye mu mahanga bishyira itafari ryabo mu kucyubaka.

Title: USA:Abanyarwanda batuye muri leta ya Maine bizihije umwaka mushya wa 2020 (Amafoto)
Body:
Ihuriro ryâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo batuye muri leta ya Maine no mu nkengero zayo, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika, kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 4 Mutarama 2020 bahuriye mu gikorwa cyâ€™ubusabane bishimira ibyo bagezeho mu bihe byaranze umwaka wa 2019, banifurizanya umwaka mushya muhire.
Ihuriro ryâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo batuye muri leta ya Maine no mu nkengero zayo, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika, kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 4 Mutarama 2020 bahuriye mu gikorwa cyâ€™ubusabane bishimira ibyo bagezeho mu bihe byaranze umwaka wa 2019, banifurizanya umwaka mushya muhire.
Icyo gikorwa cyabaye umwanya wo kuganira ku ngamba nâ€™imihigo bigomba kubaranga mu mwaka batangiye wa 2020.
Nkâ€™uko babitangarije IGIHE, ni umunsi waranzwe nâ€™ibiganiro harimo no gushima bamwe mu banyarwanda bafunguye ibigo bitanga akazi na serivise aho batuye muri Maine.
Ibiganiro byagarutse ku ruhare rwâ€™ abo nkâ€™abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga mu iterambere ryâ€™aho bakomoka (mu Rwanda), nâ€™aho batuye.
Mu ijambo rye, Antoine Bikamba uhagarariye ihuriro ryâ€™abanyarwanda baba muri Maine, yashimye ubwitabire nâ€™ubwitange bagaragaje kugira ngo uwo munsi ufite icyo uvuze gikomeye ugerweho, ashimira cyane ba rwiyemezamirimo bafite ibikorwa muri aka karere nâ€™abatanga serivise zitandukanye nâ€™imirimo.
Yibukije ko icyo gikorwa ngarukamwaka cyâ€™ubusabane bwâ€™abanyarwanda batuye Maine kigamije kubaha umwanya wo guhura no kumenyana biruseho cyane cyane abaje vuba bakamenyana nâ€™abamaze igihe.
Kumenyana bituma abantu bafashanya muri byinshi bakunga ubumwe hagati yabo, aho batuye nâ€™aho bakomoka bakabyungukiramo.
Damas Rugaba wigeze kuyobora iri ihuriro ryâ€™abanyarwanda batuye muri Maine, yabibukije gushyigikirana bakirinda icyabatandukanya, bagashyira imbaraga mu iterambere bifuza kugeraho mu buzima bwa buri munsi .
Leopold Ndayisabye na we wayoboye iri ihuriro, yabaganirije ku kamaro kâ€™umuryango wâ€™abanyarwanda, ashimangira ko ugamije guhuza no guharanira iterambere ryâ€™abanyarwanda bose batuye muri Maine,.
Ati â€œMurangwe nâ€™ubumwe bubabere inkingi mu mibereho yanyu ya buri munsi, musangire amakuru abafasha kwiteza imbere. Mutabarane hagize ugira ikibazo hagati yanyu mu ngoâ€.
Kayijuka Frank, Umujyanama wa mbere muri Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Amerika mu ijambo rye yagize ati â€œTwishimira iterambere nâ€™imibereho mwerekana byâ€™umwihariko nkâ€™abanyarwanda muba mu mahanga. Mukomeze guharanira icyabateza imbere kuko nicyo igihugu kibatezeho, uwiyubatse aba yubaka u Rwanda nâ€™aho atuye , mukomeze ubu bumwe mugaragaza kuko abishyize hamwe nta kibananira.â€
Uyu muhango kandi wabereyemo gushimira bamwe mu banyarwanda bakoze ibikorwa byâ€™indashyikirwa bagatangiza ibigo bitanga serivise zitandukanye bigatanga nâ€™akazi.
Mu bashimiwe harimo Mike Mwenedata washinze ikigo â€œRwanda Beanâ€ gikora ubucuruzi bwâ€™Ikawa ivanwa mu Rwanda igacururizwa muri Leta Zunze ubumwe zâ€™Amerika, Manasse Shingiro ufite ikigo â€œCasco Bay Cleaningâ€,Gael Karomba ufite ikigo cyita ku bantu bafite ibibazo byo mu mutwe â€œHappy Haven LLCâ€ , Arthur Sabiti uhagarariye Intercultural Community Center (ICC) ifasha abana mu myigire no mu bindi bitandukanye na Damas Rugaba uhagarariye â€œGreater Portland Immigration and Welcome Centerâ€ ifasha abimukira mu kubahugura mu rurimi rwâ€™Icyongereza ndetse no mu bintu byâ€™ingeri bitandukanye.
Hashimwe na Leopold Ndayisabye wayoboye umuryango wâ€™abanyarwanda muri manda iheruka.
Ihuriro ryâ€™abanyarwanda batuye muri leta ya Maine rifite ubuzima gatozi. Abayobozi baryo bafite inshingano zo gufasha abarigize gukomeza ubufatanye hagati yabo, kwiteza imbere, gusigasira umuco nyarwanda ndetse no kubana neza nâ€™andi mahuriro ari muri iyi leta.

Title: NorvÃ¨ge: Urubyiruko rwasabwe kubakira ku ndangagaciro Nyarwanda nkâ€™umusingi wâ€™iterambere
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge biganjemo urubyiruko bibukijwe ko kubakira ku ndangagaciro na kirazira byâ€™umuco Nyarwanda , ari wo musingi uzabafasha kugira ejo hazaza heza, bagira uruhare mu iterambere ryâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge biganjemo urubyiruko bibukijwe ko kubakira ku ndangagaciro na kirazira byâ€™umuco Nyarwanda , ari wo musingi uzabafasha kugira ejo hazaza heza, bagira uruhare mu iterambere ryâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Ubu butumwa babuherewe mu biganiro byabaye ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019, byateguwe nâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge, bafite intego yo kwigisha urubyiruko rwâ€™Abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu amateka yâ€™u Rwanda.
Uhagarariye Umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda nâ€™inshuti zabo muri NorvÃ¨ge, Mugisha Peter, yashimiye urubyiruko rwitabiriye icyo gikorwa, arubwira ko arirwo bayobozi bâ€™ahazaza, kandi ko rusabwa kwitanga, kugira ubushake no gukoresha neza igihe rufite.
Dr Benda Munyurangabo Richard, Umwarimu muri Kaminuza za Luther King College, Manchester na Chester zo mu Bwongereza, ubu akaba ari gukorana ubushakashatsi na Kaminuza ya Stellenbosch muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo ku ngaruka Jenoside na Apartheid bifite ku bana nâ€™urubyiruko, cyane cyane abavutse nyuma yâ€™ayo mahano, yatanze ikiganiro ku mateka yâ€™u Rwanda mbere na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yagaragaje ibyaranze igihe cyâ€™abami, ubukoloni, impinduramatwara yo mu 1959, amacakubiri, ivangura, irondakoko nâ€™irondakarere, uko Abatutsi bahejwe mu gihugu cyabo, uko bishwe, bakanatotezwa nâ€™ibindi.
Yanavuze kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, igahagarikwa nâ€™Ingabo za RPF zari ziyobowe na Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame; imiyoborere myiza u Rwanda rufite ubu, nâ€™uko Abanyarwanda babashije kwishakamo ibisubizo ku bibazo byâ€™inzitane u Rwanda rwarimo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, atanga urugero kuri Gacaca na gahunda ya â€˜Ndi Umunyarwandaâ€™.
Muhigana FÃ©lix umwe mu Banyarwanda batuye muri NorvÃ¨ge, yatanze ikiganiro kivuga kuri Afurika mu cyiswe â€œPanafricanismeâ€™â€™ asobanura uburyo yatangiye, asaba urubyiruko kugira imyumvire iboneye ku mugabane bavukamo wa Afurika.
Ati â€œMukwiye kugira imyumvire ishaka ibisubizo aho kwibanda ku kunenga ibitagenda. Twese turi bamwe, turi Abanyafurika dufatanye mu rugamba rwo kwiteza imbere no kwihesha agaciro; isoko rusange Nyafurika â€˜AfCTAâ€™ ni urugero rwiza mukwiye kubona.â€
Haganiriwe kandi ku ruhare rwâ€™ urubyiruko mu iterambere ryâ€™ u Rwanda. Umwe witwa Serge yasangije abari muri iyo nama ibikorwa akora mu Rwanda aho afite ikipe yâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru yitwa â€˜Juatotoâ€™ ibarizwa mu karere ka Rubavu, akaba anafite umushinga ugamije guteza imbere injyana ya â€˜Hip hopâ€™ mu Rwanda.
Kayihura Chelsy utuye muri Denmark na we yasangije urubyiruko ibyiza byo kwitabira â€˜Itorero Indangamirwaâ€™ mu Rwanda, ababwira ko ryamufashije kwiga byinshi ku gihugu cye kandi yarushijeho kugikunda no gutegura neza imbere he hazaza.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Urubyiruko rutuye muri NorvÃ¨ge, Gatete Gilles, yabwiye abitabiriye iki gikorwa ko bagomba kwigirira icyizere.
Yitanzeho urugero ko ubwo yigaga, yari afite akazi ka buri munsi, ubu akaba afite Impamyabumenyi yâ€™Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza (Engineer) muri gaz na petrol, yiyongera ku yindi Mpamyabumenyi yâ€™Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya kaminuza mu byo gutunganya amazi; kandi akaba akomeje kwiga abangikanyije amasomo nâ€™akazi ke.
Gatete yasabye urubyiruko kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite muri NorvÃ¨ge.
Umunyamabanga wa mbere muri Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Burayi bwâ€™Amajyaruguru, ufite icyicaro mu Mujyi wa Stockholm muri SuÃ¨de, Umulisa Marie Elise, yashimiye abateguye icyo gikorwa, abatanze ibiganiro nâ€™urubyiruko rwitabiriye.
Yasabye urubyiruko kumenya no gukurikiza indangagaciro Nyarwanda aho ruri muri NorvÃ¨ge.
Ati â€œGukurikiza ibi bizatuma mugera kuri byinshi byiza mukeneye kugira ngo mugire ejo heza, ari nabyo ababyeyi nâ€™igihugu cyacu u Rwanda kibategerejeho kandi kibifuriza.â€
Yakomeje abasaba kumenya ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda ku bataruzi nkuko biririmbwa mu ndirimbo yubahiriza igihugu aho mu gika cya kabiri ikomoza ku muco uhuriweho uranga abenegihugu, ururimi rukabahuza, ubwenge umutima amaboko bikarukungahaza bikwiye, rugatera imbere ubutitsa.
Umulisa yasabye urubyiruko kubizirikana, kandi buri wese mu bushobozi bwe agakomeza guhuriza hamwe imbaraga na bagenzi be, mu rwego rwo kurushaho kubaka u Rwanda rwifuzwa.
Yibukije urubyiruko ko rufite ubuyobozi budahwema kuruzirikana muri gahunda zitandukanye, atanga urugero rwâ€™Itorero Indangamirwa, anarushishikariza kuryitabira.
Ku musozo wâ€™ibiganiro, urubyiruko rwakoze igikorwa cyo kwitoramo abayobozi ndetse abitabiriye iyi gahunda baranasabana.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu rugendo rwo mu bwato rwâ€™amasaha 23, barasabana
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rwâ€™amasaha 23.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rwâ€™amasaha 23.
Ubwato buhagura saa moya zijoro bukazagaruka aho bwahagurukiye saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba zâ€™undi munsi.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri SuÃ¨de, kugira ngo bongere bahure bose umwaka utararangira, barebe ibyakozwe, aho bagifite intege nke bafashanye kuzongera ndetse basabane banifurizanye iminsi mikuru myiza ya Noheli nâ€™ubunani.
 Uyobora umuryango wâ€™Abanyarwanda batuye muri iki gihugu, Madamu Gloria Sebalu, yabwiye IGIHE ko icyo gikorwa cyitabiriwe bishimishije, avuga ko hatangiwe ibiganiro byiza bitandukanye.
Mu biganiro byatanzwe harimo ikigaruka ku gukunda igihugu bakomokamo, gusigasira umuco nyarwanda ndetse nâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda. Hanatanzwe ibiganiro binyuranye bigaragaza uko bashora imari mu gihugu ndetse nâ€™ikiganiro kigisha uko bakwiteza imbere mu buryo bufatika mu gihugu barimo cy SuÃ¨de.
Muri uru rugendo rwâ€™ubwato kandi habayeho no gusabana banasangira amafunguro anyuranye ategurwa muri ubwo bwato .
Mu gusoza uyu mwaka kandi hateguwe umunsi wâ€™ubusabane wâ€™abana, wabereye ahitwa Leos Lekland, haba imikino itandukanye yâ€™abana.
Umuryango wâ€™abari nâ€™abategarugori batuye muri SuÃ¨de nibo bateguye iki gikorwa cyâ€™ubusabane, akaba ari nabo bayoboye gahunda yo kwigisha ururimi nâ€™umuco.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu bihugu bihugu byo mu Majyaruguru yâ€™u Burayi, Nkulikiyinka Christine, aganiriza abana bari bitabiriye uwo munsi, yabasabye gukomeza kwiga ururimi rwâ€™Ikinyarwanda asaba ababyeyi kujya bavugisha abana mu rugo mu Kinyarwanda, bityo bakabunganira ku byo baba bize.
Yagize ati â€œUmwana ntajye avuga Ikinyarwanda ari uko yagiye kukiga rimwe mu kwezi, ntibyaba bihagije ngo akimenye ababyeyi muramutse mutabunganiye.â€
Yasabye abari bahari batajya muri iyo gahunda yo kwiga Ikinyarwanda no kubyina kinyarwanda ko bajya bitabira ndetse abasaba ko babwira abatari baje uwo munsi ibyiza byo kwiga ururimi rwacu no gusigasira umuco.
Abana bishimiye kuba barahuye uwo munsi bagakina, ariko kandi bavuga ko guhura biga Ikinyarwanda byatumye bamenyana baba inshuti, bituma bishimira cyane kwitabira ibikorwa bihuza Abanyarwanda no kumenya igihugu cyabo kurushaho.

Title: Amb. Habimana Saleh yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite
Body:
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bwami bwa Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri icyo gihugu kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yose bafite, abasezeranya ko igihugu cyabo kibari hafi kandi kizakomeza kubafasha.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bwami bwa Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri icyo gihugu kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yose bafite, abasezeranya ko igihugu cyabo kibari hafi kandi kizakomeza kubafasha.
Ni ikiganiro yagiranye nabo ku mugoroba wo ku wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, cyitabirwa nâ€™abiganjemo abanyeshuri biga mu murwa mukuru Rabat. Ni ikiganiro cyabaye ingirakamaro, gihurirana nâ€™uko Abanyarwanda bari bakoraniye mu nama yâ€™igihugu yâ€™umushyikirano, bungurana ibitekerezo ku iterambere ryâ€™igihugu cyabo.
Amb Habimana yabahaye impanuro zitandukanye, anabasezeranya ko nubwo biga kure yâ€™igihugu cyabo batari bonyine.
Yibanze ku kubaganiriza ku mateka yâ€™u Rwanda, ababwira imibereho yâ€™Abanyarwanda bo hambere kugeza ku mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ariko abibutsa ko amateka mabi u Rwanda rwanyuzemo yarangiye.
Yagarutse kuri gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda, ashimangira ko igamije gukumira no kurwanya amacakubiri aho ava akagera. Amb. Habimana yabagaragarije ko bagomba guharanira kuba umwe, bikabafasha kugera ku zindi ntego zikomeye zo kwiteza imbere no guteza imbere igihugu.
Yabibukije inshingano zabo nkâ€™Abanyarwanda
Mu gice cya kabiri cyâ€™icyo kiganiro, Amb Habimana yibanze ku ruhare rwabo nkâ€™Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc, abashishikariza kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite yo kwiga muri iki gihugu.
Yabakanguriye kwirinda ibishuko byabayobya, ahubwo ko bakwiriye gukomeza kugendera ku ndangaciro nâ€™umuco nyarwanda, bikabafasha gukora cyane mu masomo yabo no mu bindi bakora.
Yahise abagenera ishimwe rizajya rihabwa buri mwaka umunyeshuli uzajya ahiga abandi mu byo yiga.
Yabasabye kandi gushyira ingufu mu gufatikanya amasomo yabo nâ€™umuhate wo kumenya indimi, anabakangurira kwita cyane Icyarabu gikoreshwa muri Maroc, cyane ko u Rwanda rurimo kwagura umubano nâ€™ibindi bihugu byâ€™abarabu.
Ni ikiganiro Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc bishimiye, ndetse bashimangira ko bazakomeza kuzirikana inshingano zabo, bakaba indashyikirwa mu byo bakora.

Title: Neretse Fabien yakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 25
Body:
Urukiko rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Urukiko rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Uyu mwanzuro watangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019.
Ubushinjacyaha bwari bwasabiye Neretse gufungwa imyaka 30 ariko Urukiko rutegeka ko afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha yaregwaga.
Ku wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza, Urukiko Mpanabyaha rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi rwaburanishije Neretse, rwamuhamije icyaha cya Jenoside nâ€™ibyaha byâ€™intambara.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 byâ€™intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Neretse yari akurikiranyweho ibikorwa byâ€™ubwicanyi mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi i Nyamirambo no mu Mataba mu yahoze ari Komini Ndusu mu Ruhengeri hagati ya 6 Mata 1994 na 14 Nyakanga 1994.
Yarezwe gushishikariza abasirikari kwica Abatutsi, aho 13 biciwe i Nyamirambo. Yanashinze Umutwe wâ€™Interahamwe mu Mataba, awuha intwaro mbere yo kugaba ibitero ku Batutsi, ariko anabaha ibihembo byâ€™amafaranga.
Icyemezo cyâ€™Urukiko rwa Bruxelles cyo gukatira Neretse imyaka 25 gifite umwihariko kuko ni ubwa mbere u Bubiligi bukurikiranye bukanahana icyaha cya Jenoside hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana.
Mbere ya Neretse, hari Abanyarwanda baburanishijwe nâ€™inkiko zâ€™u Bubiligi hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana ibyaha byibasira inyokomuntu nâ€™ibyâ€™intambara.
Urubanza rwe rwaranzwe nâ€™amagambo ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yavuzwe nâ€™uwunganira Neretse, Me Jean Flamme, aho abari mu rubanza, harimo nâ€™abacamanza basanze arengera avuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri.
Kuva mu ntangiriro yâ€™urubanza rwa Neretse, umwunganira, Me Flamme yakoresheje imvugo ihakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi avuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri. Uyu mugambi we kandi watumye atumira mu rubanza abantu basanzwe bazwiho kuyihakana nka Judi Rever, Joseph Matata, Johann Swinnen nâ€™abandi.
Intego ye kwari ukwerekana ko nta Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yabayeho, ko rero uwo yunganira nta ruhare abifitemo kuko icyaha akurikiranyweho kitabayeho.
Iyi mvugo yatangaje benshi mu rukiko bituma umucamanza asaba uwunganira Neretse kuyirinda. Flamme azwiho kuba umuhakanyi nkâ€™uko yabigaragaje mu rubanza rwa Tharcisse Renzaho yunganiraga.
Neretse yanashyizeho itsinda ryagombaga gutanga ruswa kugira ngo abatangabuhamya bamushinjure, atanga imirima nâ€™amafaranga.
Urubanza rwa Fabien Neretse wâ€™imyaka 71 rwatangiye mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ryâ€™abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja nâ€™ubumushinjura. Nyuma yâ€™iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers nâ€™umugabo we IsaÃ¯e Bucyana nâ€™umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma yâ€™iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Neretse afite iminsi 15 yo kujuririra umwanzuro wâ€™Urukiko rwa Bruxelles.

Title: Urukiko rwo mu Bubiligi rwahamije Neretse Fabien ibyaha bya Jenoside
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, nyuma yo gusesengura ibyatangajwe nâ€™impande zombi, Urukiko rwa Bruxelles rwatangaje ko Neretse Fabien ahamwa nâ€™ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, nyuma yo gusesengura ibyatangajwe nâ€™impande zombi, Urukiko rwa Bruxelles rwatangaje ko Neretse Fabien ahamwa nâ€™ibyaha bya Jenoside nâ€™ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 byâ€™intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Mu byaha yahamijwe nâ€™urukiko birimo ubwicanyi yakoze, gushishikariza abantu kwica, kurema umutwe wâ€™abicanyi nâ€™ibindi yakoreye mu Mujyi wa Kigali nâ€™i Mataba.
Umunyamategeko uhagarariye abakorewe Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Me. Karongozi AndrÃ© Martin, yabwiye IGIHE ko ibyaha byose yarezwe byamuhamye.
Yavuze ko bishimiye ko icyaha cya Jenoside yaburanye ahakana mu gihe gisaga ukwezi urubanza rwari rumaze cyamuhamye.
Ati â€œIkintu cya mbere twishimiye, ni uko icyaha cya Jenoside cyongeye gushimangirwa, ku muntu wayihakanye kuva urubanza rwatangira kugera rurangiye.â€
Mu iburanisha ryâ€™uru rubanza, Neretse nâ€™abamwunganira bakunze kugaragaza ko mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside ebyiri zirimo iyakorewe Abahutu nâ€™iyâ€™Abatutsi ndetse mu riheruka abanyamategeko be banongeyeho iya gatatu ngo yabereye muri Congo Kinshasa.
Me. Karongozi yasobanuye ko mu bantu yashinjwaga kwica, babiri aribo urukiko rutamuhamije kugira uruhare mu rupfu rwabo.
Ati â€œIcya kabiri ni uko ibyaha byose bamureze, byamuhamye uretse gusa abantu babiri barimo Ildephonse waherekeje umwana wari wakomeretse akicirwa kuri bariyeri ngira ngo ni hafi ya Kiliziya Charles Lwanga. Ntibavuze ko ari Neretse kuko ataguye aho barasiye abandi, undi ni uwitwa Rutonesha Sixbert, we yari yihishe mu gisenge cyâ€™inzu ariko nyuma avamo aza kugwa ahandi bavuga yuko yaguye mu bafurere bâ€™Aba-Jesuites i Nyamirambo, ni abo bonyine.â€
Me. Karongozi yavuze ko ari ubwa mbere bibaye mu Bubiligi guca urubanza mu bushishozi nkâ€™ubwo babonye.
Ati â€œKu bindi byaba byose, ibyâ€™i Kigali, abantu yishe, ibyâ€™i Mataba harimo bariya bantu barimo abitwa Mpendwanzi na Nzamwita, ariko cyane cyane nâ€™umubare wâ€™abantu batazwi, biciwe i Mataba. Bivuze ngo perezida asobanuye ko icyemezo cyo kwica abantu, bâ€™Abatutsi kiraturuka no kuri abo bantu bose yagiye yica, interahamwe yari afite amagambo yabwiraga abantu aho yacaga byose yabisobanuye neza ni ubwa mbere bibaye mu Bubiligi.â€
Yavuze ko nkâ€™abanyamategeko batazura inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ariko nibura babona ko batabibagiwe kuko babonye ubutabera.
Yashimye abarokotse bemeye kubaha ububasha bwo kubahagararira ndetse kuri we asanga akazi kakozwe karatanze umusaruro.
Ku wa Kabiri tariki 17 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo urukiko rwari rwasoje kumva abarega nâ€™abaregwa ubwo humvwaga abaregera indishyi, nâ€™uruhande rwâ€™abunganira Neretse mbere yâ€™uko rwiherera rusuzuma ishingiro ryâ€™uko buri ruhande rwireguye.
Perezida wa Ibuka MÃ©moire & Justice, Ryamukuru FÃ©licitÃ©, yabwiye IGIHE ko yashimye ubutabera bwâ€™u Bubiligi avuga ko umwanzuro wâ€™urukiko ubahaye kuruhuka nkâ€™abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ati â€œBiraturuhuye, kuko twategereje amasaha ahagije, iminsi ibiri yari imaze kurenga, twibazaga aho biri bubere ariko biraturuhuye kuko ntabwo yashoboraga kuba umwere ibyaha byose byamuhamaga ibyaha byâ€™intambara ariko icyiza ni uko icyaha cya Jenoside nacyo kimuhamye. Birerekana ubutabera bwo mu Bubiligi nabwo bwakoze umurimo ukomeye.â€™â€™
Yavuze ko guhamwa nâ€™icyaha hari icyo bisobanuye no ku batekerezaga guhakana Jenoside.
Ati â€œUmuntu umwe uhamwe nâ€™icyaha cya Jenoside ni ukuvuga ngo iba yemewe kandi biruhura nâ€™abacitse ku icumu nubwo bitagarura nâ€™umuntu nâ€™umwe ni ubutabera bugaragaje umurimo wabwo.â€
Biteganyijwe ko urukiko ruzatangaza ibihano ku byaba Neretswe yahamijwe ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019.
Uru rubanza rwa Fabien Neretse wâ€™imyaka 71 rwatangiye ku wa 4 Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ryâ€™abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja nâ€™ubumushinjura. Nyuma yâ€™iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers nâ€™umugabo we IsaÃ¯e Bucyana nâ€™umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma yâ€™iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Beckers nâ€™umuryango we bashatse uko bahunga bakava aho bari batuye, kuwa 9 Mata 1994 bajya ku Ngabo za Loni zari mu Rwanda, bahagarikirwa kuri bariyeri bararaswa. Bikekwa ko Neretse ari we wagize uruhare mu ihagarikwa rya Beckers nâ€™umuryango we ndetse akaba yaranagize uruhare mu rupfu rwâ€™abandi bantu icumi bari baturanye .
Aregwa kandi ubwicanyi yakoreye iwa mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Ruhengeri ahitwa i Mataba barimo Mpendwanzi bivugwa ko yagiye kumushaka mu rugo rwe amushinja kuba icyitso cya FPR Inkotanyi nubwo yari Umuhutu.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 byâ€™intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Karirima Ngarambe / Palais de Justice Bruxelles

Title: U Bwongereza: Umunyarwandakazi bikekwa ko yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitabye Imana
Body:
Gatera Cynthia wabaga mu Mujyi wa Nottingham mu Bwongereza yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitaba Imana.
Gatera Cynthia wabaga mu Mujyi wa Nottingham mu Bwongereza yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitaba Imana.
Gatera yaguye mu Mujyi wa Birmingham ku wa Gatandatu, tariki ya 14 Ukuboza 2019, aho yari yasuye inshuti yâ€™umuryango wabo yitwa Eric Gashema.
Uyu mukobwa wâ€™imyaka 31 yageze i Birmingham ku wa Kane, aho yari afitanye gahunda na Gashema yo kujyana mu masengesho.
Gashema yagiye gutabara inshuti ye yapfushije umubyeyi mu Mujyi wa Manchester, ariko ntibajyana, uwo mukobwa aguma mu rugo.
Uyu yerekeje i Manchester nyuma yo gusangira ifunguro rya mu gitondo na Gatera wari umeze neza, wanamusabye kumusigira ibitabo ngo abe asenga.
Amakuru Polisi yo muri ako gace yahawe nâ€™umuturanyi ni uko Gatera yaguye hasi ahagana saa Moya nâ€™igice zâ€™umugoroba. Yari asanzwe afata imiti yâ€™indwara yâ€™agahinda gakabije izwi nka â€™dÃ©pressionâ€™.
Gashema ngo yageze aho yari atuye ahagana saa Yine asanga polisi yahagose, aza kwemererwa kugera mu igorofa rya 19 yabagamo, ahageze asanga idirishya rifunguye ariko Gatera atarimo.
Uyu musore yarebye hasi abona hashyizweho amahema ya Polisi, ahita ajya kubaza aza gusanga ari Gatera witabye Imana.
Umurambo wa Gatera wari ugihari ariko yaba Gashema nâ€™ababyeyi ba nyakwigendera [bahageze saa Sita] ntibabashije kuwubona kugeza utwawe na Polisi ahagana saa kumi zo mu rukerera rwo ku Cyumweru.
Amakuru yizewe IGIHE ifite ni uko Gatera yari amaze igihe kirekire afite dÃ©pression ndetse yafataga imiti ku buryo yari yaratangiye kumererwa neza yiteguraga no gusubira ku ishuri.
Gashema asanzwe ari inshuti nâ€™umuryango wa Gatera, baragenderanira kuko bubatse ubucuti akiri mu Burundi.
Gatera yabyinaga mu itorero aho yanatumirwaga muri gahunda zitandukanye za Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda. Yatangiye kubyina afite imyaka itatu aho yanyuze muri Troupe Urunana yo mu Busuwisi.
DÃ©pression ni indwara irangwa nâ€™agahinda gakabije no kwiheba. Ishobora gufata uwo ari we wese, ku myaka iyo ariyo yose kandi iyo itavuwe ishobora gutuma uyirwaye afata imyanzuro yo kwiyambura ubuzima.
Iyo iyi ndwara itavuwe kandi igira ingaruka zikomeye ku bukungu ndetse nâ€™imibereho muri rusange kuko uyirwaye adashobora kugira icyo yimarira cyangwa ngo agire icyo akora cyamuteza imbere.
